Noono maa apeehny gene Joon kob gene, “Nea yih padh Ngad Boadh nyoge kedea upadhi Eliija wale agamloohngjuog naa arub Moaje ke nyinge yi kitaab Juoge e luogwahy cubi yihr nyoge kaa nying gihn?”
Maa abeehr Joone ngo kea, “Luogwahy mara ge cuba yihru kan, beehda luogwahy mar piih now, abea nud ke dhaano me ne kiino abea kwihyu.
Ngaan nu e nuu ulog beehno ke batiena. Abea ngo unahg ngaa me duohng riha gihn me a be rom goony thool giih wuoy tiene.”
Luub ni ge arob Joone maano e ge anaa yi paan cuohn ne Bathany loo naam Joohrdoan. Anahg kaano e ne na muoj Joone wudh nyoge ke piih ne cub luogwahy yihr gen.
Ruuwow e Joon niid Jeacuu e beehn bange maa arube kea, “Ngaan nu beehn nu e naa gihr remo naa acub Juoge me nahg ne luog adhemuohm yaa wiih piny oogo.
E naa ngaa anaa aruba ke nyinge ge na koohba kaa, ‘Dhaano nud muu ubuodh batiena. Ngaa me tiihye wiihe ne maalo rih tiihya bang gihn ngo abeehdo e nud ke coon e a poohd kuu anyuol!’
A ke nguda ngaa ubuodh batiena ngo kwihya nea ngo unahg ngaa me ngihde. Abea a apiih ne muoj wudh nyoge ke piih Juog bang ungahy Judea ngaan ngo.”

Kaano e Joon arubo ke nying gihn aniide ke wonge kea, “Ngo akwihya kejea ngo unahg ngaa me ngihde. Abea Juog ngaa aoohr an ne muoj wudh nyoge ke piih arubo yihra kea, ‘Wahy Juog uniidi e luung piny wa aweehr ne beehn ne piih wiih dhaano e nuu unahg ngaa muu umuoj wudh nyoge ke Wahy Juog.’

Kaano e Joon arubo ke nying gihn aniide ke wonge kea, “Ngo akwihya kejea ngo unahg ngaa me ngihde. Abea Juog ngaa aoohr an ne muoj wudh nyoge ke piih arubo yihra kea, ‘Wahy Juog uniidi e luung piny wa aweehr ne beehn ne piih wiih dhaano e nuu unahg ngaa muu umuoj wudh nyoge ke Wahy Juog.’
Adiehr muon, Wahy Juog aniida e luung piny ke yoohn Maalo wa aweehr maa upiihe wiih ngo. Kedea ngo teeda teedo yihru kejea ngaan apiihe wiihe e naa waahd Juog e Ngad Boadh nyoge.”
Ruuwow moogo ke batiene gihn nu e Joon anaa ka cuungo ke nyoge ariow kiin jo waahdhe.
Naa aniide Jeacuu e ukahnho ke buud gen, e ake rubo kea, “Ngaan ca niidu e naa gihr remo naa acub Juoge ne Ngad Boadh nyoge.”
Jo waahdh giih ni ariow naa alihng gene gihn arob Joone, e batien Jeacuu abuodh gene buodho.
Naa alog Jeacuue wonge, e niid nyoge ariow me buodh batiene, maa apeehye kea, “Gihn e ne daahdu?”
Maa abeehr gene ngo kob gene, “Ngad puohny yi beed kee?”
Maa abeehre ngo kobe, “Beehnu ubeeh niidu kaa ngo.”
Maa acidh gene keehde kedea uniid gene ka beede kedea uriih gene bange cahng nu uwahdhe kethiehno.
Dhaano acielo kiin yaa ariow anahg Andrya ge umiih Cimoane.
Noono uguoe aay ne cej umen. Naa ayoade ngo e arobe yihr ngo kea, “Ngaan akwany Juoge ne Ngad Boadh nyoge ayoad wane.”
Noono ukahle ngo bang Jeacuu.
Maa amaany Jeacuue bang ngo keraahyo maa arube yihre kea, “Yih Cimoane waahd Joon, awaahn ni, nyingi unahg Ceapaj.” Lum yea beehda leelo neehn Piihter.
Ruuwow keehdo e Jeacuu wiihe apare ne ci yi piny Gaalili. Maa ayoade Pihlihb kedea urube yihr ngo kea, “Mahd rih batiena.”
Pihlihb anahg ngad geen Bedhceada ka beed Andrya kedea Piihtere.

Naa ayoad Pihlihbe Nathaneel, e kobe yihr ngo kea, “Ngaan akwany Juoge ne Ngad Boadh nyoge naa agweehd Moaje ke nyinge yi kitaab Juog kedea ge agweehd agamloohngjuoge ke nyinge ngo beehda Jeacuu waahd Jocebe e ngad geen Naajaread.”
Maa apeehy Nathaneele, “Ne gihn me kony nyoge, me beehn oogo ke yoohn Naajaread ne?”
Kob Pihlihbe, “Beehn uniidi ngo.”
Naa aniid Jeacuue Nathaneel ubeehno e rubo kea, “Ngaan e naa ngad Yijarael me ne cohg ge be rubo ke toohd.”
Maa apeehy Nathaneele kea, “Angeyi ke ne diih kejea a kwaad ngaa me wa gihn nu?”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo yihre kobe, “Yih aniida e yih apiih yi tubo thar dhuuro maano e Pihlihb yih poohd keá naa acuohno.”
Kob Nathaneele, “Ngad puohny! Yih beehda Waahd Juog. Yih beehda ruohdh yaa Yijarael.”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo kea, “Yih ayiiho ke nying gihn aruba kaa yih aniida yi tubo thar dhuuro. Giih mooge me doonge maa ayoohm man ge uniidi.”
Maa arube yihr gen kea, “Gihn daahda ke robo yihru ngo beehda athiir me ne cohg. Maalo ree uyabe kedea uniidu an. A ge beehda dhe yoohn cidh Paar Maalo.”
Yi dahg nihn e kaahny anaa ke robo yi geen Kana ge yi piny Gaalili ni. Miih Jeacuu anudo thiow yi rob kaahny gihn nu,
Jeacuu maa jo waahdhe ge acuohn yi kaahny thiow.
Naa abeehn koonge ne thumo e miih Jeacuu ake rubo yihr waahde kea, “Kuong giih gen athum.”
Kob Jeacuue, “Gihn e naa akahli nyinga yi gihn! Cahng tiihya yea ngo poohd kuu abeehno.”
Maa arub men yihr yaa tiihj giih anaa acub piny ne paahng kuong kea, “Kwaad gihn rob waahda yihru, yugo ngo.”
Yaa Judea yihr gen na naa dhe yoohn luog cing kedea roohd cam ne wuor Juog. Ke nying gihn nu, e daahy
abiihjbeciel giih luog rog ge anudo kaano.
Maa arob Jeacuue ngo yihr yaa tiihj giih ni kea, “Paahngu yihdh daahy ke piih.” Maa apaahng gene daahy cang ne leb leb.
Batiene e Jeacuu acahg rob yihr gen kea, “Tuomu piih yi dag, ucubu gen yihr ukiihy duohng.”
Maa akaab gene piih ukahl gene gen yihr ukiihj.

Piih giih alog Jeacuue ne koongo amaadhe. Abea kaa abeehn koohng nu kii ngo, ngo akwihye. (Anahg yaa atuom piih, ge ne ngahy dhe yoohn kaa abeehn koonge kii ngo.) Noono ubeehn ukiihje ucuohne ngad paajo urube yihr ngo kea,
“Yihdh kahnye giih yug cang, wong koongo e ne kuong ke cubo yihr weehle umodho, batiene e koongo maa acoom ke cubo yihr gen. Abea mari wong koongo apoohd e kani kano uwahdh pinye wa gihn?”

Gihn ni e naa gihn me teeg mar umodho me gaahy nyoge maa ayug Jeacuue. Ngo ayuge Kana ge nii Gaalili. E naa kaa anyoadh Jeacuue kaa amoar Juoge wiihe ne ngaa me duohng. Gihn nu e jo waahdhe ngo ayiih gene ne ngaa me dhiil gene kaa gaahno.
Batien gihn nu, e Jeacuu ke men maa wuud wahn kedea jo waahdhe ge a'aay ne ci geen Kaparnaam ne nahg nihn me noog yea.
Naa adoohng kar Yaan Amono cahng e Jeacuu abeehn ne aay ucidhe Jeruucalem.
Yi laaro gihr wod Juog e yuud nyoge ge ngeew dhahg kedea roohme maa jien oogo kedea yaa waar ngiihny ge apiih buud tharbeaje giih gen, ne waar ngiihny.
Noono ucwaahye thool ne keedo kedea uthube ke kool dhahg maa roohme oogo yi laaro maa ayoade tharbeaje giih yaa waar ngiihny ujwange gen piny kedea uyiere ngiihny ke bang piny.
Maa aciere ngo yihr yaa ngeew jien oogo kea, “Kaabu giih ni ukedhu gen oogo! Laaro gihr Wod Wura e ne logu ne kar cuug.”
Gihn ni abeehn jo waahdhe ne paro wa kaa anaa agweede yi kitaab Juog naa,
“Gihn adeehja gihn me beer ke nying laaro gihr wod Juog yi cwihnya,
umeehg nyoge nahg an.”
Noono ubeehn yaa Judea, ge apahn Jeruucalem, upeehny gene Jeacuu kob gene, “Gihn noono romi ke yugo ne nyoadh ngo kejea yihri nud teeo me romi yug gihn atiihyi awaahn kan?”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo yihr gen kea, “Nea Wod Juog gihn toaru ke piny, e ngo doga kaa geero ucuunge batien nihn adahg.”
Maa acahg yaa Judea ngo ke beehro yihre kob gene, “Wod Juog gihn ageer yi run jiehariow wonge abiihjbeciel kare tooro ugeeri ngo yi nihn adahg!”
Abea Jeacuu ge arube, kuu anahg Wod Juog e naa arube ke nyinge, beehda kuohme e naa arobe.
Batiene kaa acahr Jeacuue e ngo abeehn jo waahdhe ne paro kejea ne nahg gihn me na robe robo. Kaano e gihn agweed yi kitaab Juog kedea giih na robe ge abeehn gene ne yiiho.
Ge anahg Jeacuue geen Jeruucalem, yi nihn Yaan Amono, e giih me teeg me thoohdh me gaahy nyoge ge ayuge kedea ubeehn nyoge me thoohdhe uyiih gene ngo, ne ngaa me gaahn gene ke nying giih nu.
Abea Jeacuu ke kur mare nyoge keá gaahno. Ge keá gaahno bang gihn par dhaano utaahngo ngo ngahye.
Noono e kuu adaahd dhaano me rubo yihre ke nying nyoge mooge. Jeacuu ke ngude gihn nii cwihny dhaano ngo beehde ngahye.
Anaa anudo ke Ujudea me duohng me nyinge Nikoadiihmuj. Ngo anahg ngad akuud yaa lum Juog me cuohn ne Paarijea.

Cahng man, e abeehn ka beed Jeacuue yi diehr waahr maa arube yihr Jeacuu, “Ngad puohny, ngo ngahy wane kejea Juog e naa aoohr yihn. Bang gihn giih tiihyi ge gaahy nyoge, ge be ne romi ke tiihyo nea be ne nahg Juog e naa aoohr yihn.”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo yihre kea, “Athiir gihn daahda ke robo yihri e gen. Nea padh ngaa me cahg ke nyuolo keehdo e dhe yooh tooro yihre me yiih Juoge ngo ne ngade.”
Maa apeehy Nikoadiihmuje kea, “Dhaano ucahg ke nyuolo ke ne diih? Kare tooro me cahge ke duog yea men beere dog kaa nyuolo!”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo kobe, “Athiir gihn roba yihri beehda: ngaa me kuong Juoge ke maa ne ngade tooro nea ngaan ngo kuu acahg kaa nyuolo ke dhe yoohn luogwahy ke piih kedea Wahy Juog.
Jo anyuol won ge naa acub wahy yihro. Abea Wahy Juog e naa acub kuowo yihr wahyo.
Yih keá gaahy yi gihn roba kejea wu cang, wu cahg kaa anyuolo keehdo.

Ka caahdh yame kii ngo ngahda ngo uneehno yihri. Awaahn ni e wiihe log ke kun, batiene e wiihe doge kaa log kun moogo. Abea yih ke ngudi kun beehne kii ngo kwihyi kedea kun cea yea ngo kwihyi. Ngo wa gihn thiow yihr ngaan acub Wahy Juoge kuow wahy yihre.”
Maa apeehy Nikoadiihmuje kea, “Gihn nu ree yuge ke ne diih?”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo kea, “Yih beehda ngad puohny yaa Yijarael me duohng, yihdh giih ni ge be romi ke ngeyo ke ne diih?
Gihn daahda ke robo yihri ngo beehda athiir. Wa rubo kaa nying gihn me ngahj maa aniid wane ke nying wan. Abea kihd dhaano acielo keewu maa ayiih lum arob wane tooro.
Nea giih roba yihru ke nying giih tiihy rog gen wiih piny ge be yiihu, unahg giih roba ke nying giih tiihy rog gen paar Maalo ge nu uyiihu ne?
Bekihd ngaa maa akuong ci Maalo Paar Juog nea padh an, ge Juog naa adoohng ne dhaano utaahngo, e naa ngaa abeehno ke yoohn Paar Maalo.

Moaje ge anaa yi ukang, demaro maa athaahdh wa thuohl ngo anaa atuohye dhe tala utihnge ngo maalo ne thiehdh nyoge. Ke dhe yoohn nu thiow, a ge adoohng ne dhaano utaahngo a udhiil ke tihng maalo wiih yaadh maa ariihw ne boadh nyoge.
A utihng maalo beere kwaad ngaa yiih luma, dhe yoohn boadh wahy me guge tooro yoade yoado.

“Juog yaa wiih piny ge anhyaare wa ka nhyaar wuro nyethene. E naa gihn abeehn Juoge uoohre waahde wiih piny, beere kwaad ngaa yiih lum waahde ngo be dog thoo bang gihn boadh wahy me guge tooro ngo yoade yoado.
Juog waahde keá oohr wiih piny ne kihm nyoge ke gihn me raaj, abea ngo aoohre beere nyoge boadhe boadho.
Ngaa ayiih lum Waahd, e ngaan nu be kihm. Abea ngaa akweer ke yiih lum Waahd, e ngaan nu ke kihmo bang gihn lum Juog keá ayiiho.

Wa kaano e naa ka kihm Juoge nyoge kii ngo, ne ngey yaa rog gen naa awuohj kedea yaa rog gen tooro awuohj. Daahr ge beehda adiehj Juog yoad ke bang Juog kedea ngo abeehn wiih piny. Nyoge adiehj Juog ngo angey gene. Abea keehd maano e ge nhyaar giih anyoohne ukweer gene kaa adiehj beehn ke bang Juog.

Kwaad ngaa koag ke yug giih anyoohne, adiehj rob ke nying Juog be nhyaare kedea adiehj nu be kuonge ke yiiho. Be yiihe bang gihn ngo utudo kejea anyoohne giihe ge beehn adiehj nu ke ne nyoadho yihr nyoge.
Kwaad ngaa tiihy gihn maa akob Juoge kea ngo gihn maa adiehr, e tiihye beehn Juoge ke ne niido. Beehn Juoge ke ne niido bang gihn, gihn atiihye nyoadh ngo kejea Juog wuore wuoro.”
Batiene e Jeacuu kedea jo waahdhe ge a'aay ne cidho ke bang piny Judea. Ge abeehdo kun nu ke nihn me nud keree, maano e ge muoj wudh nyoge ke piih luogwahy.

Joon thiow ngo anaa ne muoj wudh nyoge ke piih ne cub luogwahy. Wudh nyoge amuoje ke ka me cuohn ne Anon ge cahng ke Calim. Ka maa athoohdh piihe yea e naa kaa awaahd nyoge bang Joon beere ge ke muojo ke luogwahy.
(Gihn nu ree ayuge maano e Joon poohd kuu akedh yi thijin.)
Gihn nu, e jo waahdh Joon mooge ge ake thubo ke peehm ke Ujudea ke nying dhog yiehdh luog rog ne wuor Juog.

Kaano maa abeehn gene bang Joon urub gene e ge anahg tiele kejea, “Ngad puohny! Ngaan anaa bangi loo naam Joohrdoan, ge ne rubi ke nyinge, ngo ayoad wane e ngo muoj wudh nyoge ke piih luogwahy kedea nyoge me thoohdh ge non bange.”
Maa abeehr Joone ngo yihr gen kea, “Nea padh Juog e naa arob ngo, e kwaad gihn me wa gihn nu be rom dhaano utaahnge ke tiihyo e keede ubeehn nyoge unon gene bange.
Keehd wun, e gihn na roba ngo ngahyu ge na koohba kaa, ‘A padh Ngad Boadh nyoge. A beehda ngaa maa aoohr Juoge wong maalo nyum Ngad Boadh nyoge.’

A neehn gom athiehg. Nyaakon nyuom beehda gihr athiehg. Abea gom athiehg cwihnye umihno kare noono nea yea buud athiehg. E ne neehn mara, cwihnya med keraahyo gihn me kaal wiihe tooro nea Jeacuu nyinge uwiihj.
Cwihnya med keehd me jwag jo waahdhe rog gen udoohng gene thoohdh kedea jo waahdha ge udoohng noog.
“Ngaa ne wiih piny kan, rubo kaa nying giih yug rog gen wiih piny. Abea ngaan abeehno ke yoohn Paar Maalo ge duohng ukaale wudh nyoge cang
ngo rubo kaa nying gihn aniide kedea gihn alihnge. Abea poohd e ngaa maa yiih lume tooro.
Kwaad ngaa yiih lume nyoadh ngo kejea lum Juog ayoade naa adiehr.
Ngaan aoohr Juoge, rob lum arob Juoge yihre bang gihn Wahy Juog acub yihre utoor gihn me daag.
Juog Wuro, Waahde anhyaare keter kedea uyoade giih nyepinye cang ucube gen yi cinge.
Kwaad ngaa yiih lum Waahd Juog, yihre ne kuowo me be gug. Ngaa kweer ke lum Waahd Juog e cwihny Juog urahnyo ree, yihre utooro kuowo me be gug.”
Akuud yaa lum Juog me cuohn ne Paarijea ngo alihng gene kejea Jeacuu wiih Joon ayoohme yi woj piih wudh nyoge ne cub luogwahy yihr gen.
(Na nahg jo waahdh Jeacuu ge na muoj wudh nyoge, abea padh Jeacuu.)
Ge anaa alihng Jeacuue lum nu e a'aay oogo Judea udoe Gaalili
maano e cor yea piny Camaarya.
Yi Camaarya e ngo atoohng geew me nyinge Ciihcar. Geen ngo cahng ke puohdho gihn anaa acub Jeakobe yihr Jocebe waahde.
Yi puohdh nu naa abuulo me maadh me cuohn ne Abuun Jeakob. Jeacuu naa agoohg yi waahdh, e ngo apiih ne yuohmo wiih abuulo maano e cahng nii diehr wihj.
Kaano e dhaar Camaarya ake beehno ne tuom ke piih. Maa arub Jeacuue yihre kobe, “Muoja ke piih me mahdha.”
(Jo waahdh Jeacuu ge anaa yi geew ne ngiew ke cam.)
Maa abeehr dhaar ni ngo yihre kea, “Yih beehda Ujudea kedea a beehda ngad Camaarya, a peehnyi ke piih maadh ke ne diih?” (Bang gihn Camaarya maa Judea giih nyepinye be laahw gene ke rog gen.)
Kob Jeacuue, “Muuny gihn cub Juoge ngo kwihyi kedea ngaan kwahyo yihri ke piih kwihyi. Nea giih nu ge ni ngahyo, e ne nahg yihn e ne kwahy ke piih kedea yih ne muoja ke piih me cub kuowo yihri.”

Kob dhaare, “Ruohdh! Wa gihn me tuomi piih keehde tooro kedea yi abuulo thuudh! Kee noono e nuu uyoadi piih cub kuowo? Anahg Jeakob kuow wan e naa awii abuun ni piny yihr wan. E ke ngude ke nyethene kedea dhahge maa diehge ge na mahdh kii yea.
Ka moogo e apari kejea yih ne duohng rih Jeakob kuow wan ne!”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo kea, “Kwaad ngaa maadh piih ni, ngo cahg riowe kaa naah keehdo.
Abea ngaa maadh piih cuba, ngo be cahg riowe ke naah. Piih cuba ge udoohng wa aloohn piih yi kuohme. Aloohlo me muoj ngo ke piih cub kuowo kedea umuoje ngo tiehd keehd dhe yoohn kuowo me guge tooro.”
Kob dhaar ni, “Ruohdh muoj an ke kwaad piihi noono. Muoj an beere a be cahg riowe ke naah kedea ubahnge an be beehn kan ne tuom ke piih keehdo.”
Kob Jeacuue, “Cidhi ne cuohn cuori kedea ubeehnu tiehd keehde.”
Maa abeehr dhaare ngo kea, “A beehdo e yihra tooro dhecuow.” Kob Jeacuue, “Lumi athiir ge arobi ngo kejea yihri tooro dhecuow.
Yihri anaa cuow abiihj maa anyuom yihn kedea ngaan beehdi keehde awaahn ni padh cuori maa anyuom yihn. Lubo maa adiehr e naa arobi yihra.”
Maa aduog dhaare ngo yihre kea, “Angeya arumo kejea yih beehda agamloohngjuog.

Ge kuow wan, wa yaa Camaarya, Juog na wuor gene ke wiih good ca ge neehn ke kan kedea e naa ka poohde e ngo wuor wane wuoro yea, abea wu yaa Judea kobu nahge ke Jeruucalem e ne cidh wane yea ne wuor Juog?”
Kob Jeacuue, “Nyaakaahy! Lihng gihn roba yihri naa athiir. Nud ke cahng muu ubahnge nyoge Juog Wuur buu ucahg gene ke wuoro wiih good gihn robi wale yi Jeruucalem.
Wu yaa Camaarya, Juog kwihyu kedea gihn wuor Juog ke nyinge kwihyu. Abea mar wan, wa Judea Juog e ne wuor wane, ke nying gihn nu e naa gihn aay dhe yoohn boadh nyoge ke bang wan.
Cahng arob ngo aguo wahnho. Cahng meehg Wahy Juoge nyoge wuor Juog, wa ka nahge Juog Aciehg. Yaa umeehg Wahy Juoge wuor Juog ge naa yaa adaahd Juoge uwuor gene en.
Juog e naa ngaa cub kuowo kedea Juog rom nyoge kaa wuoro wa ka nahge Juog Aciehg nea ge amuoj Wahy Juoge ke kuowo me nyaahn me meehge gen wuor Juog.”
Maa akoohb dhaare kea, “Ngo ngahya kejea Ngad Boadh nyoge ngo ubeehn. Kedea nea ngo abeehno, e giih nyepinye cang ge urobe yihr wan.”
Kob Jeacuue, “Beehda an e naa Ngad Boadh nyoge. A ge rubo ke yihn!”

Nye kaano e naa kaa aduu jo waahdh Jeacuue ke yoohn geew. Naa aniid gene Jeacuu urubo ke dhaago e ge acwaahng. Abea ngaa maa apeehny dhaar ni tooro kiin gen kejea, “Yih daahd gihn bang Jeacuu?” Thiow ngaa maa apeehny Jeacuu tooro kea, “Yih rob gihn ke dhaar ni?”
Kaano e dhaar nu dag piih gihre awiie ke wiih abuulo udoe geew maa arube yihr nyoge kea,
“Beehnu ne niid ngaa arob giih reje naa atiihya oogo cang. Ka moogo e ngo unahg Ngad Boadh nyoge.”
Maa a'aay nyoge ne ci ne maany Jeacuu.
Abea maano e jo waahdh Jeacuu ge nii ne lug ngo kejea cahme kob gene, “Cedhree! Ngad Puohny tum gihn me thiin ke camo.”
Maa abeehre ngo yihr gen kobe, “A acahmo, abea gihn acama ngo kwihyu.”
Kaano e jo waahdhe ge athubo ke rob ke kiin gen kob gene, “Ka moogo e ngaa maa akahl cam yihre nud!”
Kob Jeacuue yihr gen kea, “Cam mara beehda tiihy gihr ngaa aoohr an uwahdhe ka ukeehla tiihy ngo guge.

Ngahda na ke teedo naa, ‘Adoohng dwahde abiihj ukaj uleela?’ Abea beeh teeda ngo yihru kejea yaa ayiih luma ge ne room ke beel me kaj. Maanyu kaa adoohng uleele kii ngo yi puohdho. Uleela wiihe adoohng kwaar ngo daahd ukaye.
Ngaan kay ngo ke koogo. Kaano e ngaa apuro kedea ngaa akahyo cwihny gen umihno cang.
E naa kaa abeehn gihn ne caal naa, ‘Ngaa moogo ngo ngad puur abea ngaa moogo e naa ngad kaj.’
Wu aoohra ne kaj yi puohdho me padh wun naa apuur ngo. Nyoge mooge ge naa apuro kedea ubeehnu ne yoad gihn me beer yi tiihy gen.”
Abea kiin yaa Camaarya nyoge me thoohdh lum Jeacuu ayiih gene bang gihn akob dhaage kea, “Kwaad giih atiihya cang ge arobe yihra.”
Gihn nu e yaa Camaarya ge abeehn bang Jeacuu maa arob gene ngo yihre kejea beehde keehd gen. Maa abeehd Jeacuue keehd gen ke kar nihn ariow.
Naa alihng gene giih arob Jeacuue e nyoge mooge thiow me thoohdh lum ngo ayiih gene.

Noono maa akoohb gene yihr dhaar ni kejea, “Awaahn ni lume ayiih wane, padh ke nying gihn arobi yihr wan, abea bang gihn wa keed wan lume alihng wane. Ngo angey wane ne cohg kejea e naa Ngad Boadh yaa wiih piny.”
Naa anahg Jeacuue nihn ariow e adoog kuu utiene ne ci Gaalili.
Beehde e gihn maa anaa arob Jeacuue kea, “Ngad agamloohngjuog be kuong yaa paar gene ke yiiho kejea ngo agamloohngjuog.”
Naa awahnhe Gaalili e ngo alor beer mee. Yaa alor ngo beehd yaa aduuo ke yoohn Jeruucalem kaa aniid gene giih anaa atiihy Jeacuue yihdh nihn Yaan Amono.
Kaano e Jeacuu abeehn ne ci Kana, yi Gaalili, geen anaa aloge piih ne koongo yea. Apahno gihr akuumo, me waahde tuu yi geen Kaparnaam, anaa anudo.
Naa alihnge bang Jeacuu kejea ngo abeehno ke yoohn Judea e ngo acidh bang Jeacuu. Acidho ne kway wong ngo beere caa Kaparnaam ne thiehdh waahde ge cahng ke thoo.
Maa arub Jeacuue yihr gen kea, “Nea padh gihn me gaahy nyoge me teeg e ne niidu ke nyingu, e wu be kuong yiiho.”
Kob apahne, “Ruohdh! Beeh cidho ke yihn piow piow e waahda wonge poohd nud.”
Maa arob Jeacuue ngo yihre kea, “Cidhi. Waahdi ubodh.”
Nyin lum Jeacuu ayiihe kedea uthube ke dog paare.
Yi yooh e ake roohmo keehd yaa tiihj giihe maa ateed gene ngo yihre kob gene, “Waahdi ngo adoohng ne ngaa maa abodh.”
Maa apeehnye gen kejea weehne e naa angweehn atwaany waahde. Kob gene, “Atwaany abeehn ne ngweehno yi laahng cahng.”
Maa abeehn apahne ne ngey ngo kejea beehda nye kaa anaa arub Jeacuue yihre kea, “Waahdi ubodh.” Noono e en maa jo paare ge adoohng ne nyoge maa ayiiho.
Gihn nu e naa riown giih gaahy nyoge naa atiihy Jeacuue yi piny Gaalili naa aduue ke yoohn Judea.
Ke batien gihn nu, e Jeacuu abeehn ne ci Jeruucalem bang gihn yaa Judea yihr gen anaa yaay me ge dhiil ci Jeruucalem ke nyinge.
Abea buud ka cuohn ne Ciihb Gead
nud ke paahl. Buud paahl atieg piny ke pehme abiihj kedea uyoad kaano ucuohne ne Paahl gihr Bedhjadha ke dhog Judea.
Amahr nyoge maa atwaany ge abudo ke bang thaahdh pehme. Nyoge maa acoor kedea ngoohde kedea nyoge maa abaahl. Ge akoar piih paahl utihng gene rog gen. [
Bang gihn wuohnjuog na kwaay cidho yi paahl ne ciehr yihdh piih. Nea ge acier, e ngad atwaany ge kuong mono yihdh piih umodho e kwaad atwaany anaa ree ngo uaay.]
Dhaano maa abeehd e atwaany ke kar run dhaano aduuno wonge apaar wonge abiihjbedahg anaa anudo buud paahl.
Jeacuu naa aniide nyin kedea naa angeye ngo kejea abeehdo piny ke twaany ke run me thoohdh, e ngo acidho bang ngo. Noono maa apeehnye ngo kea, “Cwihnyi ne bange uthiehdh yihn ne?”

Maa abeehr nyine ngo kobe, “Ruohdh, yihra tooro dhaano me tihng an ne kedh yihdh piih kaano tihng piihe rog gen. Noono e thuba kaa a tum cidho yihdh piih, e a guo ngaa mooge kaa yoohmo unahge e ne kuong cidho yihdh piih.”
Kob Jeacuue yihre, “Yedh maalo ukaabi belo gihri ucaahdhi.”
Wong kaano e nyin ree ayoade e athiehdh. Noono ukaabe belo gihre uthube thubo ke waahdh.
Gihn ni ree ayuge ke cahng Cabadh ge beehda cahng yuohmo gihr Judea
maa abeehn ruohdh Judea giih Jeruucalem urub gene yihr ngaan athiehdh kob gene, “Loohnge mooge ge beehde e yihdh ge adhahli bang gihn belo gihri kaahni kaahno cahng yuohmo.”
Maa abeehre ngo yihr gen kea, “Ngaa athiehdh an, e naa arob ngo yihra kejea kaaba belo gihra.”
Maa adog gene piehj, “Beehda ngaa e naa arob ngo yihri kejea kaabi belo gihri uci paajo?”
Abea ngaan athiehdh en akwihye, bang gihn nyoge ge athoohdho ke raahyo noono e Jeacuu arwaahnyo yihre kiin nyoge.

Cahng nu e ngaan athiehdh ayoad Jeacuue yi Laaro gihr Wod Juog maa arube yihr ngo kea, “Awaahn ni, yih adoohng ne ngaa maa athiehdh. Wii yug giih adhemuohm beere gihn me raaj me kaal wiih man be pahdh wiihi.”
Kaano e ngo ake aay maa acea ne teed ngo yihr ruohdh yaa Judea kejea beehda Jeacuu e naa athiehdh en.
Noono arumo, uthub ruohdh yaa Judea ke tiehng ngo ater ke nying gihn athiehdhe dhaano cahng Cabadh.
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo yihr ruohdh Judea ne jaahy gihn arob gene kea, “Juog Wura, uwahdhe yi caang rubo awaahn ni, ngo beehde e utiihyo e naa gihn tiihya thiow.”

Ke nying lum nu, e yaa Judea ge athubo ke daahd dhe yooh me nahg gene Jeacuu. Ge daahd unahg gene ngo, padh ke nying gihn atiihye cahng Cabadh, abea ke nying gihn arome wiihe ke Juog naa acuohne ngo ne wahn.

Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo yihr gen kobe, “A rob athiir yihru. A ge adoohng ne dhaano utaahngo ni, gihn me roma tiihyo a keeda tooro. A yug kwaad gihn niida ge tiihy Wura bang gihn kwaad gihn tiihy Wuro e naa gihn tiihy Waahde thiow.
Bang gihn Wuro Waahde anhyaare kedea unyoadhe kwaad giih tiihye yihr Waahde. Adiehr kedea wu ugaahy bang gihn giih me teeg me yoohm muu ni ge unyoadhe yihr Waahde.
Wa kwaad ka beehn Wure utahnge yaa athow kedea ucube kuowo me ne cohg yihr gen, ke dhe yoohn nu thiow e Waahd, kuowo me ne cohg ucube yihr ngaa me daahde.
Thiow Wura ngaa me cahge ke kihme tooro, bang gihn kihm nyoge awiie yi cing Waahde,
beere nyoge cang Waahd dhiil gene kaa wuoro wa kwaad ka wuor gene Wuro. Nea ngaa be wuor Waahd e Juog Wuur ge aoohr Waahde ni, ngo be wuore thiow.

“Adiehr e ne roba yihru, ngaa lihng luma kedea uyiihe lum Juog ngaa aoohr an, e ngaan nu yihre ne kuowo me ne cohg kedea buu ukihm cahng lug. Buu ukihm cahng lug bang gihn thoo aloge ngahye udoohnge yi yoohn kuowo me ne cohg.
Athiir e ne roba yihru, cahng arob ge ulihng duona ngo abeehno awaahn ni. Yaa ulihng duona utiihy gene gihn ateeda yihr gen, ge nuu uyoad kuowo me ne cohg.
Me neehn ka nahge Juog e ne cub kuowo me ne cohg yihr nyoge, ke dhe yoohn nu thiow e Juog Waahde ameehge cub kuowo me ne cohg yihr nyoge,
kedea tee ne kihm nyoge acube yihra a ge adoohng ne dhaano utaahngo ne boadh nyoge ke nying gihn nahga Waahd Juog.
“Wu keá gaahy yi gihn daahda ke teedo yihru awaahn ni, bang gihn nud ke cahng muu ubeehn yaa athow ge beed yihdh leehde giih gen ulihng gene duona ke kar gen cang,
kedea upahr gene oogo yihdh leehde. Jo ayug giih me beeye ge ucahr kedea uyoad gene kuowo me ne cohg. Abea jo ayug giih me reje ge ucahr kedea ge ukihm.

“A be rom yug nyepinye ke teeg mara a keeda kedea nyoge ge kihma kaa dhe yoohn arob Juoge yihra. E naa gihn ngahya lug noono bang gihn a be tiihy gihn daahd aduuna abea a tiihy gihn daahd ngaa aoohr an.
“Nea a rubo yihru kaa nying mar nguda keede, e gihn roba ngo be kuong ke yiiho wa gihn maa athiir.
“Abea Juog Wura e naa arob gihn ngahya ke nyinge kedea ngahya kejea gihn teeda ke nyinge ngo beehda athiir.
Joon e naa ngaa anaa aoohr dhog yihre kedea maa abeehn Joone urobe gihn maa athiir ke nyinga yihru.
Gihn rob dhaan utaahnge ke nyinga padh en ne daahd ne nyoadh ngo kejea a beehda ngaa. A rubo kaa nying gihn arob Joone ke nyinga beere Juog wu boadhe boadho.
Giih atiihy Joone ne kedh nyoge bang Juog ge anaa ake liel wa gihr lamba maa a'ahb kedea ubeehdu ke nye nihn me noog e cwihnyu med ke nying tiihye e liel wa maay lamba ge anaa anhyaaru.

“Abea gihn tiihya nyoadh adiehr me ne cohg ke nyinga, ke dhe yooh me yoohm dhe yoohn mar Joon naa arobe ke nyinga. Giih tiihya beehda Wura e naa acub gen yihra ne tiihyo kedea ge ne rubo ke nyinga maa ge ne nyoadh ngo kejea beehda Wura e naa aoohr an.
Thiow Wura ke ngude ge aoohr an ngo urubo ke loohnge me nyoadh athiir ke nyinga. Keehd me bahnge duone kuu alihngu kedea kuohme kuu aniidu e gihn maa anyoadhe nud ke nyinga.
Kedea wu akweer ke meehg luub Wura beehdo yi cwihnyu bang gihn luma a ngaa aoohre ngo be yiihu.
Wu abuohj ke cej yihdh giih anaa agweed cuohnu kuu e nuu uyoadu dhe yoohn kuowo me ne cohg. Abea ukwihyu ngo kejea giih agweed ge rubo kaa nyinga.
Kedea wu poohd ukweer ke beehn banga beere wu ukwahnyo ke luube noono e kuowo me ne cohg yoadu yoado.
“Padh leej gihr nyoge e ne daahda bang uleej gene an.
Wu beehda kwaad nyoge me ngahya ne cohg: Wu nyoge me be nhyaar Juog.
A abeehno, bang gihn Juog e naa aoohr an ne rob ke nyinge maa akweeru bang gihn aparu kejea padh e naa aoohr an. Abea nea dhaano beehn bangu ke kar wiihe e kuu aoohr Juoge e lume yiihu yiiho.
Cwihnyu umihno nea wu piih ne leej rogu. Abea wu be daahd utiihyu ke dhe yooh me mihn cwihny Juoge rogu uleeye wun. Angahya ne cohg kejea wu akweer ke yiih luma.
“Wudhu keá paru kejea a ucidh ne luom wun yihr Wura. Padh an e nuu uluohmo, abea ngaa uluom wun beehda Moaje ge gaahnu, e nuu uluom wun.
Nea giih agweed Moaje ge nuu yiiho, e luma nuu yiihu bang gihn giih agweed Moaje ge agweed kaa nyinga.
Abea ge bahnge giih agweede kuu ayiihu, e gihn teeda uyiihu kaa naa diih?”
Cahng man ke batien giih nu e Jeacuu abeehn ne ci loo naam duohng gihr Gaalili.
Akuud nyoge me thoohdh ge beehdo e ge na buodh batiene bang gihn giih me gaahy nyoge me thoohdh naa athiehdhe nyoge maa ayuge ke tee Juog ge aniid gene.
Noono e Jeacuu maa jo waahdhe ge ayedh wiih good upiih gene ne puohny nyoge.
Yaan Amono gihr yaa Judea ngo anaa adoohng cahng.
Naa amaahny Jeacuue, e niid amahr nyoge me beehn ka nea yea. Maa arube yihr Pihlihb kobe, “Kee e nuu ungeewo amune yea yihr yaa ni?”
Pihlihb apeehnye wa gihn nu bang gihn adaahd utume ngo. Gihre naa adaahde ke tiihyo ngo abeehde e ngo ngahye.
Maa abeehr Pihlihbe ngo yihre kobe, “Beere e dhaano acielo uyihdo ke nye goan amono e ngo daahd kar ngiihny tiihj cahng acielo me cub yihr nyoge jiehabiihje ariow ge ne rom ngeew amune.”
Ngad oohr acielo me nyinge Andrya ge umiih Cimoane Piihter ni, ayedh maalo urube yihr Jeacuu kea,
“Nyedhoohg nud kan me yihre naa amune abiihj kedea rej ariow cog. Abea rog gen upaahng gene ke ne diih yihr yaa ni thoohdh?”
Maa arub Jeacuue kea, “Robu ngo yihr yaa nu upiih gene piny cang.” (Anahg ka me yea ne lum). Noono upiih nyoge cang. Cuow anudo ge anahg kar alihbe abiihj.
Maa akaab Jeacuue amune, umuohye koohr Juog kedea ucube gen ne paahngo yihr nyoge. Thiow rej ge akaabe umuohye koohr Juog ucube gen ne paahngo yihr nyoge.
Naa athum nyoge ke cam cang, e Jeacuu arubo yihr jo waahdhe kea, “Congu goan amune giih adoohng cang utoor mooge me doohng piny ne rahnyo.”
Noono ucong gene goan amune giih adoohng kedea upaahng gene diide apaar wonge ariow.
Naa aniid nyoge gihn me gaahy nyoge naa atiihye, e ge athubo ke rob kob gene, “Adiehr ngaan beehda Ngad Boadh nyoge naa akob Moaje kejea ngo ubeehn wiih piny.”
Batien kaa amodh Jeacuue ngo kejea yaa ni ge daahd uroony gene ngo ne ruohdh wa ka daahd gene, e ree aloaye oogo ucea wiih good.
Ke wong thiehno, e jo waahdhe ge aci wiih naam duohng
kedea upaahr gene yi baabuur ne dog naam duohng ke ngolo beere ge caa Kaparnaam. Jeacuu anaa atooro bang gen keehd maa ayuudh pinye.
Yi yuudh piny e deeh yamo me teeg ree anaa atihnge kaa athewo yi naam duohng.
Ge anaa akiiw gene baabuur ke kar meale adahg wale angween, e Jeacuu ree angule ke buud baabuur gihn nahg gene yea, uniid gene ngo e ucaahdho ke wudh piih utud gene.
Abea Jeacuu akoohbo yihr gen kea, “Beehda an! Wu keá tud.”
Noono e cwihny gen anaa bange ubeehn Jeacuue bang gen yi baabuur. Kedea kaano piow piow e baabuur aguo wahnh dhe waadh kaa anaa adaahd gene ke cwihny gen.
Ge anaa ayaahng Jeacuue nyoge aliihbe abiihj, e ge anaa aniid yaahy acielo cog kaano acahm gene yea kedea ngo angahy gene kejea Jeacuu kuu anaa a'aay keehd jo waahdhe.
Ruuwow e baabuure mooge ge anudo kaa anaa amuohj Jeacuue koohr Juog ge ayaahnge nyoge kaa amune. Ge anaa abeehno kaa yoohn Tiberya.
Naa angey nyoge ngo kejea Jeacuu kedea jo waahdhe ge tooro kaa anahg gene yea, e ge ayedh yihdh baabuure giih ci Kaparnaam ne daahd Jeacuu.
Naa ayoad nyoge Jeacuu loo naam duohng kaa abeehn gene yea, e ge apeehyo kob gene, “Ngad puohny! Yih awahnh kan ke ne diih?”

Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo kea, “A rob athiir yihru: A be daahdu kaa nying giih me gaahy nyoge naa atiihya ge niidu ke nyingu ni ne nyoadh ngo kejea a beehda Ngad Boadh nyoge, abea ke nying amono naa acamu kedea uyahngu.

Wu keá tiihyo cog ke nyinga abea tiihyu keraahyo ne yiih luma ge cub kuowo me ne cohg yihru. E naa cam gihn ucuba yihru, a ge adoohng ne dhaano utaahngo, bang gihn Juog Wuur e naa akoohbo kejea tiihya beer.”
Maa arub gene yihr ngo kob gene, “Gihn e nuu urom wane ke tiihyo nea wa daahd uyug wane gihn daahd Juoge?”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo yihr gen, “Gihn daahd Juoge utiihyu ngo beehda uyiihu luma a ge aoohr Juoge.”
Batiene e ge arubo yihr ngo kob gene, “Kea noono tiihy gihn me gaahy nyoge uniid wane ngo beere lumi yiih wane yiiho.
Ge kuow wan naa acoon ge anaa amuoj Moaje ke cam me cuohn ne maana yi ukang wa kaa anaa agweede yi kitaab,
‘Cam acube yihr gen ke yoohn Paar Maalo.’ ”
Kob Jeacuue yihr gen kea, “Arob adiehr yihru. Cam gihn acub Moaje yihru padh cam me Moaje e naa acub ngo, abeehno kaa yoohn Paar Maalo. Wura e naa ngaa cub cam me ne cohg yihru ke yoohn Paar Maalo.
A ge abeehno ke yoohn Paar Maalo kedea a ge cub kuowo me ne cohg yihr nyoge wiih piny kan ni, a naa amono gihn acub Juoge.”
Maa apeehy gene, “Ruohdh! Kwaay amono gihn nu kaa cubo yihr wan ke cahng cahngo.”
Maa akob Jeacuue ngo yihr gen kea, “A naa cam ge cub kuowo me ne cohg yihr nyoge ni. Ngaa beehn banga kedea uyiihe luma e ngo be kuong kahje ke naah kedea be nahg riowe thiow.
Abea a rob athiir yihru kejea keehd maa aniidu an, e luma poohd be yiihu.
Kwaad ngaa acub Wura yihra ngo beehn banga udoohnge ne ngad batiena. Kedea ngaa adoohng ne ngad batiena ngo be kuonga ke riem oogo batiena.
Bang gihn a abeehn wiih piny kan ne yug gihn daahd Juoge ngaa aoohr an, abea a kuu abeehn ne yug mara me daahda.
E naa gihn daahd ngaa aoohr an kejea yaa acube yihra ge keá meehga aay oogo batiena kedea meehga gen cahro cahng lug uyoad gene kuow me guge tooro.
Gihn daahd Wura beehda ubeehn kwaad dhaano ungahye ngo kejea a beehda Waahd Juog kedea uyiihe luma. Kaano arumo e kuowo me ne cohg ke cubo yihre kedea meehga ngo cahro yi gug nihn.”
Yaa Judea ge athubo ke ngoan ke piny ke nying gihn arob Jeacuue kea, “A naa amono gihn abeehno ke yoohn Maalo.”
Maa akoohb gene, “Ngahda nyin beehda Jeacuu ge waahd Jocebe ni? Wahn kedea men wa ge ngahyo. Ngo rom rob ke naa diih kea e beehn kaa yoohn Maalo Paar Juog?”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo yihr gen kea, “Cuungu! Wu keá ngoan ke kiin nu.
Ngaa me beehn banga tooro nea padh Wura ge aoohr an ni, e naa akahl ngo banga kedea ngo umeehga cahro cahng gug piny.
Agweed yihdh kitaabe giih agamloohngjuog naa,
‘Beehda Juog e ne puohny kwaad dhaano utaahngo
kedea kwaad ngaa lihngo
kedea ukwaye Juog e ngaan nu beehn banga.’
Bekihd dhaano maa aniid Juog Wuur nea padh ngaa abeehno ke bang Juog. Beehda a cog, e naa aniid Juog.
Beehda gihn maa athiir e ne roba yihru, kwaad ngaa ayiih luma yihre ne kuowo me ne cohg.
A naa amono gihr kuowo me ne cohg.
Ge kuowu amono cuohn naa maana anaa acam gene yi ukang kedea uthow gene.
Abea amono gihn ruba ke nyinge ni, e naa amono gihn abeehn ke yoohn Paar Maalo kedea e naa kwaad amono me nea acam dhaane, e yihre naa kuowo me ne cohg me ngo be thow.

A ke nguda a naa amono gihn abeehno ke yoohn Paar Maalo ge cub kuowo me ne cohg! Ngaa cam amono gihn nu e ubeehdo e be thow. Amono gihn ucuba beehda kuohma e ne cuba beere kuowo me ne cohg nud yihr nyoge wiih piny.”
Noono e yaa Judea cwihny gen arahnyo ke nying gihn arob Jeacuue uthub gene ke peehm ke kiin gen kob gene, “Ngaan kuohme ucube ne camo yihro ke ne diih?”
Kob Jeacuue yihr gen, “A rob athiir yihru: nea padh kuohma a ge adoohng ne dhaano utaahngo e ne camu kedea umaadhu rema, e kuowo me ne cohg tooro yihru.
Ngaa cam kuohma kedea umaadhe rema e ne yihre ne kuowo me ne cohg kedea ngo umeehga cahro cahng gug piny.
Ke nying gihn nu, kuohma e naa cam me ne cohg kedea rema e naa gihn me maadh me ne cohg.
Kwaad ngaa cam kuohma kedea umaadhe rema, e ngaan nu a anweehd keehde.
Juog ge cub kuowo yihr nyoge ni, e naa aoohr an kedea e naa acub kuowo yihra. Ke dhe yoohn nu acielo nu nea ngaa cam kuohma e kuowo me ne cohg cuba cubo yihre.

Gihn ni e naa amono gihn abeehno ke yoohn Paar Maalo. Ngo be room kaa amono gihn acam ge kuowu kedea uthow gene keehd maa acam gene ngo. Abea kwaad ngaa abeehdo e cam amono gihn cuba, yihre unaa kuowo me be gug.”
Giih ni ge arob Jeacuue e upuohnyo yi wod amaad yi paan cuohn ne Kaparnaam.
Yaa buodh batien Jeacuu me thoohdh gihn ni alihng gene kedea urub gene kejea, “Giih robe yihdh gen teeg keter. Ngaa noono rom gen ke yiiho.”
Keehd ngaa maa arob ngo yihre tooro, e ngo abeehn Jeacuue ne ngeyo kejea yaa ni ge ngoan kaa nying giih apuohnye. Noono urube yihr gen kea, “Gihn ni cwihnyu araanye ne?
Nea a ge adoohng ne dhaano utaahngo niidu niido e a adog kara ge ne beeda coon, e wu urob gihn?
Wahy Juog e ne cub kuowo, abea kuowo me cub teeg dhaan utaahnge tooro. Luube giih aroba yihru ni, ge ne meehg wun yoad Wahy Juog ge cub kuowo yihru.
Abea keehd maano, e nyoge mooge kiinu ge poohd be yiih.” (Beehd e ngo ngahy Jeacuue ke coon e yaa ukweer ke yiih lume kedea ngaa uluom ngo.)
Maa abare maalo ke rob kea, “Ke nying gihn nu, e naa gihn aruba yihru kaa ngaa me beehn banga tooro nea padh Wura e ne meehg ngo beehn banga.”
Ke wong cahng nu e yaa abuodh ngo me thoohdh ge ado yihdh miehy gen kedea ubahnge batiene kuu acahg gene ke buodho.
Noono e jo waahdhe kar ge apaar wonge ariow ge apeehnye peehnyo kobe, “Wu daahd uaayu thiow?”
Maa abeehr Cimoan Piihtere ngo yihre kobe, “Ruohdh ngaa e ne cidh wane bange? Abea yih ne cub kuowo me ne cohg yihr nyoge?
Kedea ngo ayiih wane awaahn ni kejea yih naa ngaa aoohr Juoge ge Ngad Boadh nyoge.”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo kea, “Ngahda a naa akwany wun ke karu cang ge apaar wonge ariow ni? Abea dhaano acielo nud kiin nu me ree naa atiihb ukeehg?”
Jeacuu anaa arubo kaa nying Juudo ge waahd Cimoane Yijkaariod. Bang gihn Juudo e naa ngaa ubeehn ne luom ngo keehd me anahge kiin jo waahdhe ge akwanye ge apaar wonge ariow ni.
Ke batiene, e Jeacuu abeehn ne aay ucea Gaalili. Bang gihn cwihnye atooro beehd kiin yaa Judea ke nying gihn jo doong Judea giih beed geen nu ge daahd ngo ke naah.
Abea ge anaa adoohng Yaan Amuoj pinye cahng, e beehd nyoge yihdh abuwe cang ni
e wuud wahn arubo yihre kob gene, “Aayi oogo kan ucii Judea, bang ubeehn jo waahdhi uniid gene giih me teeg me gaahy nyoge ge tiihyi ni.
Ngaa noono mahn nyoge ubahnge gihn tiihyi be ngej nea ngo daahd ubeehn nyinge uwiihje? Me neehn kaano yugi giih me gaahy nyoge e kea meehg gen niido yihr nyoge cang.”
(Keehd wuud wahn e giih tiihy Jeacuue ge kuu ayiih gene.)
Kob Jeacuue yihr gen, “Cahnga poohd kuu abeehno. Abea maru nihn ge uroomo yihru cang.
Yaa wiih piny gihn me maan gene wun ke nyinge ngo tooro. Abea a naa amaan gene bang gihn kwaaya ke rob yihr gen kejea ge tiihy giih me reje.
Cidhu yi yaay, abea mara cahng ucidha yi yaay ngo poohd kuu abeehno.”
Gihn ni ngo ateede kedea udoohnge ne beehdo yi Gaalili ke nihn me noog.
Abea ge anaa a'aay wuud wahne ne ci yi yaay, e ngo abeehn ne cidho. Abea naa acidhe e caahdh e ree be nyoadhe beere ngaa me ngey ngo tooro.
Jo doong yaa Judea ge abuohj ke caahyo e ge daahd Jeacuu ke bang yi yaay maa apeehy gene kob gene, “Ngaan ngo naa kee?”
Nyoge me thoohdh ge ake peehmo ke piny ke kiin gen kob nyoge mooge, “Ngo ngaa me beer.”
Maa nyoge mooge kob gene, “Ngo ngaa me dwaahng nyoge.”
Abea ngaa maa arubo e duone atihnge maalo ke nyinge tooro, bang gihn ge atud ke nying ruohdh Judea.
Ge anahge yi diehr nihn yaay arumo, e Jeacuu abeehn ne ci yi laaro gihr Wod Juog uthube ke puohny kaano.

Jo doong yaa Judea ge abeehn ne gaahy ke raahyo yi dhe yoohn puohny gihre ne puohnye nyoge maa akoohb gene, “Kwaad ngaan kuu akuong ke puohnyo. Giih puohnye ni ge ayoade ke kee, abea ngo kuu acidh yi madharaaja!”
E ngo abeehr Jeacuue kea, “Gihn puohnya padh gihn me a naa apar ngo. Puohny abeehno ke bang Juog ge aoohr an ni.
Ngaa daahd utiihye gihr Juog e ngo ungahye kejea gihn puohnya beehn ke bang Juog wale ngo beehda gihn maa apara a keeda.
Kwaad ngaa rob luub muue keede kwaad ngaan nu daahd leej ke nying ngud mare. Abea kwaad ngaa daahd uleeye ngaan aoohr ngo, e ngaan nu e ne rob athiir kedea padh ngaa me rubo ke toohd.
Moaje ke ngude wu amuoje ke loohnge abea poohd e ngaa maa atiihyo keehd loohnge giih nu kiinu tooro. A daahdu ke naah kaa nying gihn?”
Maa abeehr nyoge ngo kob gene, “Yih amuohl kedea rihi naa atiihb ukeehg. Jo aweehne ge ne daahd yihn ke naah?”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo yihr gen, “Gihr nyepiny acielo me gaahy nyoge ngo atiihya maa agaahyu keter.

Nyedhoohy beehd e ge thoamu thoamo cahng Cabadh neehn kaa arob Moaje kejea thoamu nyethiin cuow. Abea keehd maano, e kuu anaa anahg Moaje e naa ngaa ateed ngo yihru umodho kejea thoamu nyethiin cuowo. Anahg ge kuowu ge naa athob thoam rog nyedhoohg gen.
Nea nyethen thoamu thoamo cahng Cabadh e gihn e naa araany cwihnyu riha ke nying gihn athiehdha dhaano maa abab piny cahng Cabadh?
Wiiu kihm nyoge ke dhe yoohn loohnge mooge abea kihmu nyoge kaa loohng Juog.”
Kaano e nyoge mooge maa yaa Jeruucalem ge athubo ke piehj kob gene, “Ngahda nyin e naa ngaan daahd jo doong Judea ke naah?
Maahnyu e ne ca rubo nyum nyoge kedea gihn me rob jo doong yaa Judea ke nyinge tooro. Ne cohg ngo ngahy gene kejea e naa Ngad Boadh nyoge
Abea ge ubeehn Ngad Boadh nyoge, e ngaa muu ungahy kun abeehne kii ngo utooro. Abea ngaan, kun beehne kii ngo, ngo ngahyo cang.”

Noono ge apuohny Jeacuue puohnyo yi laaro gihr Wod Juog, e puohnyo e ukwaago keraahyo kea, “Aparu kuu angahyu ne cohg kedea kun abeehna kii ngo, ngo ngahyu. A kuu abeehn wiih piny kan kaa dhe yoohn tee mara. Ngaan aoohr an ngo ngaa me rob athiir kedea ngaan nu gihn me nweehd wun keehde tooro.
Abea a beehda anweehd keehde, bang gihn a abeehn ke bange kedea e naa aoohr an.”
Ke nying gihn nu e jo doong yaa Judea ge adaahd umag gene Jeacuu abea ngaa maa atihng cinge maalo ree tooro bang gihn cahng umag gene ngo, ngo poohd kuu abeehno.
Abea nyoge me thoohdh kiin yaa akuud ge yiiho ke lume kedea ukoohb gene, “Nea Kriihjto ubeehn wudhu aparu kejea yihre unaa giih me gaahy nyoge me kaal muu ngaan ne?”
Paarijea mooge ngo abeehn gene ne lihngo e nyoge ge urubo ke nying Jeacuu, noono e gen kedea jo doong yaa lam maa acaakere giih koar Wod Juog ge aoohr gene ne mag Jeacuu.
Gihn nu e Jeacuu arubo yihr gen kea, “A ubeehdo ke wun ke nihn me noog mee kedea a uaay ne dog bang ngaan aoohr an.
A udaahdu abea a buu uyoadu bang gihn wu buu uwahnh ka nahga yea.”
Maa arub yaa Judea ke kiin gen kob gene, “Kee ge daahde ci yea ni, ge bahnge ngo be yoado ni? Ngo ucaa wudh geedh Griihge ge beed jo paaro upuohnye gen ne?
Arobe kea, ‘A udaahdu abea a buu yoadu,’ kedea, ‘Ka nahga yea wu buu uwahnh yea?’ Ngo daahd gihn ke robo yihro?”

Yi cahng thum yaay kedea e naa cahng duohng yi yaay, cahng rub gene ke nying piih me beehn oogo kii Wod Juog ne boadh nyoge e Jeacuu ayedh maalo urube e duone atihnge maalo kobe, “Nea ngaa maa anahg riowe, e kea beehne banga umuoja ngo ke piih me maadhe.
Wa kaa anaa agweede yi kitaab Juog kejea a nuu unahg naam me yea ne piih me boadh wahy nyoge mooge.”

Ge arub Jeacuue ke nying piih e gihre anahg rob ke nying Wahy Juog ge uyoad yaa ayiih lume. Ge arob Jeacuue gihn nu e Wahy Juog poohd kuu anaa acub bang gihn Jeacuu apoohdo e kuu aci Maalo Paar Juog kaa umoar wiihe yea.
Ge alihng nyoge mooge kiin yaa akuude lum ni e ge arubo kob gene, “Ngaan beehda agamloohngjuog me ne cohg.”
Nyoge mooge kob gene, “Ngo beehda Kriihjto.” Abea nyoge mooge kob gene, “Kriihjto ngo akuong beehno ke yoohn Gaalili ne?
Ngahda anaa agweed yi kitaab Juog kejea, Kriihjto ubeehn oogo kii dhe wod paar Deabid ge anahg ruohdh ne? Kedea unyuol yi geen Bedhlehm ge anaa abeed Deabide ne?”
Kaano e nyoge luub gen apaah ke nying Jeacuu.
Nyoge mooge ge daahd umag gene ngo abea ngaa maa ajag cinge rih ngo tooro.
Batiene e acaakere giih koar Wod Juog ge abeehn ne doo caahn bang jo doong yaa lam kedea Paarijea. Gihn nu e ge apeehny gene kejea, “Gihn ge bahnge ngo kuu amagu ukahlu ngo ni?”
Maa abeehr acaakere ngo, “Ngaa maa akuong rob wa kwaad mar nyin nu tooro.”
Maa apeehy Paarijea, “Rogu ameehgu dwaahngo yihre thiow?
Ne ruohdh Judea wale Paarijea maa akuongu ke yoado e ayiiho ke lum Jeacuu ne?
Gahng! Abea beehda nyoge me kwihy loohnge ge naa ayiih lume. Nea wa maano kea beehn Juoge lame gen uyoad gene gihn me raaj.”
Nikoadiihmuj ngad Paarijea ge naa acidho bang Jeacuu coon, arubo yihr nyoge mooge kea,
“Yi loohng gihro ngo padh kare ukihm dhaano e ngo kuu akuong ke peehnyo kedea ungey gihn atiihye.”
Maa angier gene ngo ukoohb gene, “Beer! Ngahda yih beehda ngad Gaalili ne? Kwaan kitaab Juog gihn agweed, nea ngo uyoadi kejea agamloohngjuog maa akuong beehno ke yoohn Gaalili nud?”
Noono maa a'aay gene e ngaa man caa paare.
Abea mar Jeacuu ngo abeehn ne ci wiih good me cuohn ne Ulihbe.
Yi ruung piny ke nyango e Jeacuu aduu yi laaro gihr Wod Juog. Kaano e nyoge me thoohdh rog ge acong gene buude kedea uthube ke puohny gen.
Nye wong kaano e yaa loohng Juog kedea Paarijea dhaago maa amag ke dhecuow abeehn gene ne kahlo kedea umeehg gene ngo cuung nyum gen.
Urub gene yihr Jeacuu kob gene, “Ngad puohny, dhaar ni ngo amag ke dhecuow.
Abea loohng Moaje arubo yihro kejea kwaad ngaa yug awuohj me wa gihn nu e ngo ke bahno ke leele uthowe. Gihn e ne robi ke nyinge?”
Ge apeehyo wa maano bang ne waale beere e urubo ke rob me raaj nyum nyoge, me meehg ngo mago yihr gen.
Abea Jeacuu wiihe akuule piny e ugweehdo yi ngoom ke lweede.
Abea naa apoohde e ge bar maalo ke piehj e wiihe atihnge maalo maa arube yihr gen kea, “Ngaa ree tooro adhemuohm kiinu kare nud unahge en e ne kuong leen umodho ke baahlo ne nahg dhaar ni.”
Maa adoge piny ne gweed yi ngoom.
Naa alihng gene rob gihn ni, e ge athubo ke aay naa acielo acielo. Yaa doonge ge naa akuong aay umodho. Noono udoohng Jeacuue kare keede maa dhaago gihn apoohdo e ucuungo kaano.
Maa atihng Jeacuue wonge maalo upeehnye dhaar ni kea, “Jo akoohbo kejea yih ayug awuohj, ge ne kee?”
Maa abeehr dhaar ni ngo kobe, “Ngaa maa adoohng me kihm an tooro Ruohdh.”
Maa akoohb Jeacuue kea, “A thiow yih be kihma keehd maa atiihyi adhemuohm. Abea cidhi kedea giih adhemuohm ge keá cahg ke yugo keehdo.”

Maa adog Jeacuue rob yihr Paarijea kea, “A naa ngaa meehg nyoge ngahy Juog wa gihr maaj ge meeny yi muudho ungahy dhaane ka cea yea. Ngaa buodh batiena yihre unaa kuowo kedea kaa cea yea ngo ungahye.”
Maa arob Paarijea ngo yihre kob gene, “Wa yih rubo kaa nyingi abea dhaano tooro me koohbo kejea giih robi ke nyingi ge athere. Nea neehn maano e giih robi ngaa me rom gen ke yiiho tooro.”
E ngo abeehr Jeacuue yihr gen kobe, “Bekihde! Keehd me toor ngaa me rob ngo kejea giih roba ke nyinga ge athere, ge athere bang gihn a ne ngahy kun abeehna kii yea kedea kun caa yea.
Nyoge ge kihmu kaa dhe yoohn ukihm mar dhaano utaahngo, abea a be kihmo ke dhaano kejea ngo ayug awuohj.
Abea nea dhaano maa ayug awuohj kihma kihmo e ngo kihma kaa dhe yooh me ne cohg. A ne kihmo ke dhe yooh me ne cohg bang gihn padh a keeda a ne kihmo abea Wura ngaa aoohr an nud ke an.
Nud keehd luube maa agweed yi loohnge giihu kejea nea nyoge ariow ge arob lubo acielo ke nying nyepiny, e lum gen ngo adiehr.
A rob gihn maa adiehr ke nyinga kedea Wura ge aoohr an ni e ne rob athiir ke nyinga.”
Maa apeehny gene ngo kob gene, “Wuru naa kee?”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo yihr gen kobe, “A kwihyu kedea Wura kwihyu? Nea a ne ngahyu e Wura nuu angahyu thiow.”

Luube giih ni ge arobe e puohny nyoge yi laaro gihr Wod Juog, buud kaa acub caanduug gihn thoohr nyoge ngiihny cub ke nying Wod Juog yea. Ngaa maa amag ngo tooro bang gihn padh e naa cahng akob Juoge kejea ngo umag yea.
Maa adog Jeacuue rob yihr gen kea, “A uaay abea wu uthow kaa anyoohne rogu ke nying gihn bahnge giih anyoohne be wiiu. Wu buu uwahdh ka naa yea.”
Ke nying gihn ni e ruohdh yaa Judea ge athubo ke rob ke rog gen, “Ree unahge naah wale gihn? Gihn ge koohbe kejea ka cea yea wo buu rom wahnh yea?”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo yihr gen kea, “Wu beehda yaa wiih piny kan abea a abeehno kaa yoohn Paar Maalo. Wu yaa wiih piny kan abea a padh ngad wiih piny kan.
E naa gihn aroba ngo yihru kejea wu uthow kaa anyoohne rogu nea wu buu uyiiho kejea A Juog wa ka na roba ngo yihru.”
E ngo abeehn gene ne peehnyo kob gene, “Yih naa ngaa?”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo kea, “A Juog wa ka na roba ngo yihru coon.

Yihra ne giih me thoohdh me roma ke robo ke nyingu kedea giih me thoohdh me roma wun ke kihmo ke nying gen. Abea giih nu ge be roma tiihyo ke kar wiiha bang gihn arob adiehj gihn alihnga bang ngaa aoohr an yihr yaa wiih piny kan.”
Yaa alihng giih arobe ngo kuu angey gene kejea ngo rubo kaa nying Juog Wuur.

Noono e ngo arobe yihr gen, “A ge Ngad Boadh nyoge, cahng ugur an maalo rih yaadh maa ariihw e nuu ungeyu ngo kejea a Juog wa ka na roba yihru. Kaano e nu ungahyu ngo kejea a be tiihyo kaa tee mara a keeda bang gihn gihn roba beehda gihn arob Juog Wuure yihra kejea roba ngo yihru.
Kedea wura ngaa aoohr an nud tiehd keehd an. A keá wii kara keeda, ngo nud keehd an ke nying nihn bang gihn gihn tiihya ngo nhyaare nhyaaro.”
Ge arobe giih ni, e nyoge me thoohdh ge abeehn ne yiiho yi lume.
Kob Jeacuue yihr yaa ayiih lume kea, “Nea wu bar maalo ke tiihj keehd luube giih nu apuohnya yihru nu, e wu beehda jo batiena me ne cohg.
Noono e giih beeye naa anyoadh Juoge ge beehnu ke ne ngeyo kedea giih nu beeye ge nuu ulony wun oogo yi bahng.”
Maa abeehr gene ngo kob gene, “Wa naa yaa Juog ne cohg bang gihn wa kwaay Abraahm kedea be ngaa maa akuong doohng ne baahng. Gihn ge rubi kejea wa uluny oogo yi bahng?”
Maa arob Jeacuue ngo yihr gen kea, “A rob athiir yihru! Ngaa koag ke yug adhemuohm ngo beehda baahng adhemuohm.
Paajo be doohng yi cing ubaahng ne maa, bang gihn beehda waahd ngad paajo e ne wii paajo yi cinge.
Nea waahd ngad paajo e naa aluny wun oogo yi bahng, e wu adoohng ne nyoge me tooro yi bahng ne cohg.
Ngo ngahya kejea wu yaa Judea wu beehda kwaay Abraahm. Abea keehd maano e wu daahd unahgu an bang gihn cwihnyu tooro utiihyu ke dhe yoohn apuohnya yihru.
A rob gihn aniida ge anuda buud Wura kedea wu tiihyu gihn alihngu bang weehgu na anahgu yaa agamloohngjuog.”
Maa abeehr gene ngo yihr Jeacuu kob gene, “Abraahm beehda kuow wan.”

Maa aduog Jeacuue ngo kea, “Nea wu ne nahg kwaaye ne cohg, e wu ne ke beehdo ke beehd Abraahme kedea utiihyu giih ne tiihye. Abea awaahn ni wu daahd unahgu an. A ge rub yihru ke nying giih arob Juoge yihru.
Gihn atiihya beehda gihn ateeda giih alihnga bang Juog yihru. Noono e ne daahdu an ke naah.
Gihn me kuu akuong Abraahme ke tiihyo. Wu tiihy kwaad giih na tiihy ge weehgu yaa na tiihyo yihr atiihb ukeehg.”
Maa abeehr gene ngo kob gene, “Ngaa maa anyuol e tuong kiin wan tooro. Yihr wan ne wur wan acielo cog ge beehda Juog ke ngude ni.”

Kob Jeacuue yihr gen kea, “Nea Juog ne nahg wuru ne cohg, e a nuu nhyaaro bang gihn a beehn kaa dhe yoohn bang Juog ke ngude kedea a man kan. A kuu abeehno kaa dhe yoohn mara keeda, abea Wura e naa aoohr an.
Gihn e bahnge gihn roba yea be deadu ni? Yea be deadu bang gihn wu akweer ke lihng luma.

Wu beehda nyethea atiihb ukeehg wuru kedea wu daahd utiihyu giih tiihy weehgu. Atiihb ukeehg gihre beehda nahg nyoge kedea gihn maa adiehr me robe tooro bang gihn gihre maa adiehr tooro. Nea atiihb ukeehg urubo, e rubo kaa luub toohd bang gihn rob toohd e naa gihn ngahye. Ngo ngad toohd kedea toohd yoad ke bange.
Abea mara a rob gihn maa adiehr e naa gihn bahnge luma be yiihu.
Ngaa kiin nu e ne rom rob riha kea a ngad adhemuohm? Nea a urubo yihru kaa athiir e gihn e bahnge ngo be yiihu ni?
Ngaa beehn ke yoohn bang Juog nhyaar lum teed Juoge abea wu ge kuu abeehno ke yoohn bang Juog lum Juog be yiihu.”
Maa apeehny gene Jeacuu kob gene, “Ngahda beehda adiehr e ne rob wane nea wa ukoohbo kejea yih beehda ngad Camaarya kedea rihi ne atiihb ukeehg?”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo kea, “Atiihb ukeehg me ne riha tooro. Gihn nud Wura wiihe moara moaro abea wun, wiiha be moaru.
Cwihnya tooro meehg nyoge moar wiiha ke nying ngud mara. Abea ngaa me daahd nyoge umoar gene wiiha ngo nud kedea ngaan nu e ne rob gihn maa adiehr ke nyinga.
A rob athiir yihru, ngaa yiih luma e ngo be kuong thoo.”

Maa aduog gene ngo yihr Jeacuu kob gene, “Awaahn ni ngo angey wane kejea rihi ne atiihb ukeehg! Abraahm athow kedea yaa gamloohngjuog ge athow kedea yih poohd urubo kejea nea ngaa yiih lumi e ngo be kuong thoo!
Yih ne duohng rih Abraahm kuow wan ge athow ne? Abraahm athow kedea yaa agamloohngjuog ge athow. Wiihi apari kejea yih naa ngaa?”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo kea, “Nea a ne nahg ngaa me moar wiiha a keeda, e gihr nying moar wihj gihn nu ne tooro. Wura ge cuohnu ne Juog gihru ni, e naa Wura ge moar wiiha.
Keehd maan kwihyu en, e ngo beehda ngaa me ngo ngahya. Nea a urubo kejea ngo kwihya, e a beehda ngad toohd wa wun. Ngo beehda ngaa me ngahya kedea luube ge ne tiihya ke gen.
Abraahm ge beehda wuru ni cwihnye anaa amihno ge angahye cahng ubeehna wiih piny kan. Cahng ngo aniide kedea umihn cwihnye.”
Maa aduog gene wiih lubo yihre kob gene, “Runi puud kuu awahdh yi jiehariow wonge apaar abea yih urubo kejea Abraahm aniidi ne?”
Kob Jeacuue yihr gen, “Beehda gihn maa adiehr e ne roba yihru. Ge apoohd Abraahme kuu anyuol e a anudo ke Juog neehn Juog.”
Ke nying lum nu arobe e ge athubo ke kwany leele ne bahn ngo. Abea Jeacuu ree aloaye oogo yi laaro gihr Wod Juog.
Ge anaa acaahdh Jeacuue caahdho tiehd keehd jo waahdhe ni, e dhaano maa anyuol e acoor aniide niido.
Maa apeehny jo waahdhe ngo kob gene, “Ngad puohny beehda adhemuohm gihr ngaa e naa ameehg ngo nyuolo e acoor? Beehda adhemuohme giihe wale adhemuohme giih atiihy ge wahne?”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo kea, “Padh ke nying adhemuohme giihe wale adhemuohme giih ge wahn ge naa ameehg ngo nyuolo e wonge acoor. Abea ngo acoor beere ka tiihy tee Juoge kii ngo ke niido.
Wo cang, laaro giih aoohr an ke nying gen ke tiihyo. Laaro ge ke tiihyo e wong cahng nud bang gihn nea piny ayuudho e ngaa me rom tiihj tooro.
A naa daahr gihn meeny piny cang yihr nyoge ka poohde e a nud wiih piny kan.”
Ge athume ke robe noon ni, e laaw angoale piny unweene lahbo ugwaahye ngo yi wong ngaan acoor,
kedea urube yihr ngo kea, “Cidhi uluogi wongi yi Paahl gihr Ciloam.”
Maa abeehn ngaane ucidhe kedea uluoge wonge maa uduue e piny uneehno yihre.
Kaano e waahd gen kedea kwaad jo na niid ngo coon e ukwahyo, ge athubo ke piehj kob gene, “Ngahda e naa ngaan na piih piny kan ne kwaj e gihn ne?”
Nyoge mooge kob gene, “Beehda en.”
Kedea nyoge mooge kob gene, “Padh en abea beehda ngaa me room keehde.” Gihn nu e nyin ke ngude arubo kea, “Beehda an ge na kwahyo ni.”
Noono e ge ake rubo yihre, “Gihn e naa ayab wongi uniidi nyepinye?”

Maa abeehre ngo kea, “Ngaan cuohn ne Jeacuu e naa anween lahbo ke laaw dhee ugwaahye ngo yi wonga maa arube yihra kea, ‘Cidhi wiih Paahl gihr Ciloam kedea uluogi wongi.’ Gihn nu, naa acidha uluoga wonga e wonga ree ayabe yabo uniida nyepinye.”
Maa apeehy gene, “Ngaan ngo naa kee?”
Maa abeehre ngo kea, “Kaa acea yea ngo kwihya.”
Kaano e arob gene kejea beehn nyine cidhe ke gen bang Paarijea.
Ngo anahg cahng Cabadh ge anaa abeehn Jeacuue unweene lahbo ne yab wong nyin.
Noono e Paarijea nyin adog gene ke peehnyo ke dhe yoohn ayab wonge kii ngo. Maa arobe ngo yihr gen kea, “Lahbo e naa agwaahye yi wonga uluoga wonga kedea piny uneehno yihra awaahn ni.”
Kob yaaj mooge kiin Paarijea, “Ngaan atiihy gihn, padh Juog e naa aoohre, bang gihn atiihye cahng Cabadh.”
Abea nyoge mooge kob gene, “Ngad adhemuohm giih me gaahy nyoge ge be rome ke tiihyo.” Kaano e luub gen awaahj upaah yihdh gene.
Noono e Paarijea ngaan acoor adog gene ke peehnyo kob gene, “Kobi yih athiehdhe uniidi nyepinye. Nea yihr mari e ngo beehda ngaa me ngihde?”
Maa abeehre ngo kea, “Ngo beehda ngad agamloohngjuog.”
Ruohdh yaa Judea apoohd e be yiih gene kejea ngaan ni abeehdo e wonge anaa acoor kedea wonge ayahbo, noono maa acuohn gene wahn kedea men.
Maa apeehny gene gen kob gene, “Gihn beehda waahdu ne? Kobu ngo anyuol e ngo acoor, abea wonge abeehn ne yahbo ke ne diih?”
Maa abeehr ge wahne ngo kob gene, “Adiehr muon, ngo beehda waahd wan abea ngo beehda adiehr thiow kejea anyuol e wonge acoor.
Abea gihn ayab wonge ngo kwihy wane? Ngo beehda ngaa me duohng. Peehnyu ngo ke ngaa ayab wonge. Kare nud yihre ubeehre lumu.”

Gihn ni arob gene ke nying gihn ge atud yihr Ruohdh yaa Judea. Ngo beehda gihn maa agweehg Ruohdh yaa Judea coon kejea ngaa yiih ngo kea Jeacuu beehda Ngad Boadh nyoge, e ngaan nu riem oogo yi wod amaad gihr Judea,
e naa gihn arub ge wahne kob gene, “Ngo ngaa me duohng peehnyu ngo.”
Noono maa acahg gene nyin wonge anaa acoor ke cuohno keehdo urub gene yihr ngo kob gene, “Kuohng rihi nyum Juog. Ngahy wane kejea ngaa athiehdh yihn ngo ngad adhemuohm!”
Noono e ngo abeehr nyine kea, “Kwihya me nahge ngad adhemuohm wale padh ngad adhemuohm. Abea gihr nyepiny acielo e ne ngahya: a anaa acoor kedea piny uneehnu yihra awaahn ni.”
Batiene e ngo apeehny gene keehdo, “Gihn ne cohg e naa ayuge rihi ge ayahb wongi ni?”
Maa abeehre ngo yihr gen kea, “Ngo aroba yihru kedea wu be daahd uyiihu gihn aroba. Gihn ge daahdu ngo ke lihngo keehdo? Ka moogo e wu daahd udoohngu ne yaa waahdhe!”
Noono uyeny gene ngo kob gene, “Yih naa ngad waahdhe abea wa beehda yaa waahdh Moaje. Moaje kuow wan ge acub loohnge yihr wan.
Ngahy wane kejea Juog arubo yihr Moaje. Abea ngaan nu keehd paan abeehne kii ngo kwihy wane.”
Maa abeehre ngo yihr gen kobe, “Gihn ge adogu wiiha ke lyaahbo ni! Wonga athiehdhe abea paan abeehne ke yoohn yi ngo, kwihyu ne!
Beehda gihn me ngahj kejea Juog, gihn kway yaa adhemuohme ngo be cube yihr gen. Juog muoj yaa wuor en kedea utiihy gene gihn daahd Juoge.
Kuu umodho coon ge anaa acag piny ni ngaa e naa akuong ke lihngo kejea wong ngaa maa acoor ayabe?
Nea padh Juog e naa aoohr ngo e kwaad gihn be nea rom ke tiihyo.”
Maa abeehr gene ngo kob gene, “Yih beehda ngad adhemuohm kii yi cahng anyuol yihn. Ngaa noono romi ke puohnyo?” Maa ariem gene ngo oogo yi wod amaad.
Gihn ayug ree anaa abeehn Jeacuue ne lihngo. Noono naa abeehn Jeacuue uyoade nyin keehdo e apeehnye kea, “Lum ngaan adoohng ne dhaano utaahngo ngo ayiihi?”
Maa abeehr nyine ngo kobe, “Ngo beehda ngaa Ruohdh beere lume yiiha yiiho?”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue kea, “Ngo beehde e ngo aniidi awaahn ni kejea a naa ngaan ngo a e gihn rubo ke yihn awaahn ni.”
Maa akob nyine ngo kea, “Ruohdh! Ayiiha.” Kedea uthube ke rung cunge piny nyum ngo ne wuor ngo.

Kob Jeacuue, “A abeehn wiih piny kan ke nying paahng kiin nyoge, beere yaa kwihy Juog, ge neehn nyoge maa acoor, Juog ngahy gene ngahyo kedea beere yaa kang rog gen kejea Juog ngahy gene ge ubeehdo yi muudho neehn nyoge maa acoor.”
Paarijea mooge me kuu ayiiho maa anaa buud gen, gihn arob Jeacuu alihng gene maa apeehy gene, “Nea mare e wa beehda coohre ne?”
Kob Jeacuue yihr gen, “Nea wu ne nahg coohre, e adhemuohm ne tooro rogu. Abea naa akoohbu kejea wu padh coohre e naa gihn poohd e adhemuohm ne rogu noono.
“A rob athiir yihru yaa ge koara koaro wa gihr ngad kwaah. Ngad kwaah e naa ngaan mon yi roog diehg ke dhe wod, abea ngaan mon yi roog ke dhe yooh moogo ngo beehda ngad kahw wale ngad yaahg.
Ngaan mon yi roog ke dhe wod ni e naa ngad kwaah me ne cohg.
Ngad kwaah e ne meehg mon wod kedea duone ngahy diehge. Diehg ge cuohne kaa nying gen naa acielo acielo kedea ukoohle gen oogo.
Nea diehg ge akoohle oogo cang, e caa wong maalo nyum gen kedea ubuodh diehg batiene bang gihn duone ngahy diehge.
Abea ge be kuong pahdh batien ngaa me kwihj gene. Ge goohd oogo rih ngo bang gihn duon ngaa maa aley kwihy gene.”
Ucaale gihn ni arob Jeacuue yihr gen abea yea ngo kuu angey gene.
Noono e Jeacuu arubo keehdo kea, “A rob athiir yihru: A uroomo wa dhe roog ge mon diehge kii ngo.
Kwaad yaa umodho cang naa abeehno e a poohd kuu awahnho ge anahg yaa kahw kedea yaa yaahg kedea gihn arob gene be kuong diehg ke lihngo.
A uroomo wa dhe wod. Kwaad ngaa mon wod ke dhe yoohn banga e ubodho yi gihn me raaj. Ngo rom beehn wod kedea urome cidh oogo maa uyoade ka me beer wa gihr diel e yoad lum ulemo.
Ngad kahw beehn kaa nying kahw kedea ne naahg maa raahnyo. Abea a abeehno bang uyoad kuowo me ne cohg.
“A naa ngad kwaah me ne cohg ge gwaay ree yi thoo ke nying diehg.

Ngad kwaah me koog, padh ngad kwaah me ne cohg bang gihn cwihnye naa bang ngiihny. Ge niide uthuohn e beehn bang diehg, e diehg wiie ke piny kedea ugoohde ke ngweej. Noono e uthuohn diehg mage mago kedea ukeedh mooge.
Ngad kwaah me koog ugoohdo ke nying gihn be dier kedea yihre tooro nhyaahro yi cwihnye ke nying diehg.
“A naa ngad kwaah me beer, wa kwaad ke ngahy Wura an ni kedea ungahya Wura, ke dhe yoohn nu acielo nu, diehga ngahya kedea a ngahy gene. Kedea riha gwaaya ke ne thoo ke nying gen.
“A naa ngad kwaah me beer, wa kwaad ke ngahy Wura an ni kedea ungahya Wura, ke dhe yoohn nu acielo nu, diehga ngahya kedea a ngahy gene. Kedea riha gwaaya ke ne thoo ke nying gen.

Diehg mooge nud me beehda diehga abea ge poohd tooro yi roog. Ge dhiila kaa mahd yihdh diehg giih thiow. Duona udhiil gene ke lihngo kedea umahd gene rog gen bang diehg muu nud, noono udoohng gene ne lwaag acielo kedea yihr gen unaa ngad kwaah acielo.
Wura, a anhyaare ke nying gihn agwaaya wahya yi thoo beere wahy ge cahga kaa yoado ucahra.

Ngaa me rom wahya ke kaabo uthowa tooro. Beehda an ke nguda, an ne gwaay riha yi thoo wa kaa apara ngo. Yihra naa adiehja me gwaaya riha yi thoo kedea yihra naa adiehja thiow me duua wahya riha, ucahra. Gihn nu e naa arob Wura kea tiihya ngo.”
Yaa Judea yihdh gen abeehn ne paah ge alihng gene lum nu arob Jeacuue.
Nyoge mooge me thoohdh kiin gen kob gene, “Yaage! Dhaano ree naa atiihb ukeehg e naa gihn amuohle. Giih robe ge keá lihngu.”
Abea nyoge mooge kob gene, “Luub ni ge padh luub ngaa me ree naa atiihb ukeehg. Ngaa me ree naa atiihb ukeehg wong ngaa maa acoor yabe yabo ne?”
Ngo anahg ruudo kedea nyoge anaa yi Yaan Wod Juog
yi geen Jeruucalem,
kedea e Jeacuu anaa yi laaro gihr Wod Juog kedea ngo ake caahdho ke thar Aar gihr Caloamon.
Kaano e naa acong yaa Judea rog gen buude maa apeehny gene ngo kob gene, “Wa keá meehg koar ke raahyo. Rob lubo maa adiehr yihr wan. Yih naa Ngad Boadh nyoge?”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo yihr gen kobe, “Ngo aroba yihru coon abea wu be daahd uyiihu gihn roba. Giih tiihya ke tee Wura ge nyoadh ngo kejea a naa ngaa.
Abea wu kuu ayiiho bang gihn wu padh diehga.
Diehg giiha gihn roba lihng gene lihngo kedea ge ngahya maa batiena buodh gene buodho.
A ne cub kuowo me ne cohg yihr jo ayiih luma kedea ge be cahg thoo keehdo maa ngaa me rom gen ke yag oogo yi cinga tooro.
Wura ge acub gen yihra ni, e ne duohng rog giih nyepinye cang kedea be ngaa me rom gen ke kaabo oogo yi cing Juog Wura.
A kedea Juog Wura wa beehda acielo.”
Kaano e yaa Judea leele acahg gene kaa kwanyo ne bahn Jeacuu.
Abea Jeacuu arubo yihr gen kea, “Giih me gaahy nyoge me teeg me thoohdh ge ayuga yihru ke tee gihn acub Wura yihra maa aweehne kiin gen e ne daahdu an ke bahno ke nyinge?”

Maa abeehr gene ngo kob gene, “Wa be daahd ubahn wane yihn kaa nying gihn me beer maa atiihyi. Wa daahd ubahn wane yihn kaa nying gihn adhahli Juog kii yih uroomo keehde. Yih beehda dhaano utaahngo now abea yih daahd uyugi rihi ne Juog?”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo yihr gen, “Ngo agweed yi kitaab Juog giihu kejea,
‘A ge adoohng ne dhaano utaahngo
a beehda Juog.’

Nea loohnge giihu ge beehda loohnge maa ather ukoohbo kejea ngaa akahl Juoge lume yihr ngo, ngo beehda Juog e gihn ge koohbu kejea Juog adhahla ge aroma riha keehde. Kare tooro ukoohbu kejea Juog adhahla nea a ukoohbo kaa a waahd Juog kedea Juog wiiha amoare naa aoohre an wiih piny.
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo yihr gen, “Ngo agweed yi kitaab Juog giihu kejea,
‘A ge adoohng ne dhaano utaahngo
a beehda Juog.’

Nea loohnge giihu ge beehda loohnge maa ather ukoohbo kejea ngaa akahl Juoge lume yihr ngo, ngo beehda Juog e gihn ge koohbu kejea Juog adhahla ge aroma riha keehde. Kare tooro ukoohbu kejea Juog adhahla nea a ukoohbo kaa a waahd Juog kedea Juog wiiha amoare naa aoohre an wiih piny.
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo yihr gen, “Ngo agweed yi kitaab Juog giihu kejea,
‘A ge adoohng ne dhaano utaahngo
a beehda Juog.’

Nea loohnge giihu ge beehda loohnge maa ather ukoohbo kejea ngaa akahl Juoge lume yihr ngo, ngo beehda Juog e gihn ge koohbu kejea Juog adhahla ge aroma riha keehde. Kare tooro ukoohbu kejea Juog adhahla nea a ukoohbo kaa a waahd Juog kedea Juog wiiha amoare naa aoohre an wiih piny.
Nea padh tiihy Wura e ne tiihya e wu keá yiiho yi luma.

Abea nea beehda tiihy Wura e ne tiihya e wu dhiil yiiho yi gihn atiihya. Giih tiihya ge dhiilu kaa yiiho beere ngo ngahyu ngahyo ne cohg kejea Juog Wuur beehda anweehd ke an kedea an beehda anweehd ke Juog Wuur.”
Keehdo e ge adaahd umag gene Jeacuu, abea Jeacuu ree abeehn ne loay oogo uaaye.
Batiene e Jeacuu abeehn ne dog dieng naam Joohrdoan kaa anaa athub Joone ke muoj nyoge ke luogwahy yea.
Maa abeehn nyoge me thoohdh bange kedea e ge urubo kob gene, “Keehd me bahnge giih me gaahy nyoge maa atiihy Joone tooro, e giih arobe ke nying nyin ge beehda athere.”
Maa abeehn nyoge me thoohdh uyiih gene lume.
Noono e nyin me nyinge Laajoruj anaa abeehn ne twaany. Ngo anahg ngad geen Bathany. Bathany e naa geen beed Maarya ke Maartha nyemen.
Maarya ge anaa abeehn ne loar wiih Jeacuu ke mow kedea uwuunye tien ngo keehd yiehy wiihe. Anahg Laajoruj umiih gen e naa atwaany.
Noono e ge nyemen lubo aoohr gene bang Jeacuu, kob gene, “Ruohdh gomi ge anhyaari ngo atwaany.”

Naa alihng Jeacuue ngo e arobe kea, “Atwaany Laajoruj padh gihn me nahg en. Gihn ni ree atiihye beere wiih Juog ke moaro kedea e nuu unahg dhe yoohn ubeehn Juoge unyoadhe ka moare wiiha, a ge Ngad Boadh nyoge.”
Maartha maa Maarya kedea Laajoruj umiih gen ge anhyaar Jeacuue keraahyo.
Abea keehd maano, naa alihng Jeacuue lum atwaany Laajoruj e nihn ariow mooge ge adoge ke naah ce thube ke cidho.
Kaano e arobe yihr jo waahdhe kea, “Beehn dogo Judea.”
Maa abeehr gene ngo yihre kob gene, “Ngad puohny! Wa yaa Judea ge adaahd ubahn gene yihn ke leele ka me cahng kan. Yih poohd daahd dog caahn bang gen ne?”

Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo yihr gen kobe, “Ngahda ngahyu kejea bad cahng acielo yea ne caae apaar wonge ariow me romo tiihj yihdh gen ne? Ngaa caahdh ke decahngo kare tooro ucwahnye ke leelo, bang gihn piny cang kedea giih nyepinye ge uneehno yihre.
Abea nea ngaan ngo caahdh kii diehr waahr e kare nud ucwahnye bang gihn piny beehda muudho, gihn me meeny ngo tooro.”
Giih ni ge arobe kedea ubare maalo ke rob yihr gen kobe, “Goma Laajoruj ngo aneno abea adaahd ucaa ne tahnge.”
Maa abeehr jo waahdhe ngo yihre, “Ruohdh! Nea beehda niine e naa anene e atwaanye udoohng beer.”
Abea Jeacuu anaa arubo kaa nying thon Laajoruj, abea jo waahdhe cuohn gene e ngo rubo kaa nying niin Pe'Dihmo now.
Gihn nu e ngo abeehne ne robo yihr gen kejea, “Laajoruj beehde athow.
Abea cwihnya med, ke nying gihn toora buude beere wu uyiiho. Kea noono aayo ucidho ne maanye.”
Noono e Thoamaj (ge cuohn ne kuoy) ake rubo yihr goan jo waahdh Jeacuu kea, “Cidho thiow, beere wo uthoo keehde tiehd.”
Ge anaa awahnh Jeacuue ni e abeehne ne yoado kejea Laajoruj athow kedea yihre ne nihn angween naa akoanye.
Bathany anahg geew me be baahr ke Jeruucalem, ngo anahg kar meale ariow.
Kedea yaa Judea me thoohdh ge anaa abeehn bang Maartha kedea Maarya nyemen bang ne ciihm cwihny gen ke nying thon umiih gen.
Kaa alihng Maarthae ngo kejea Jeacuu nii yooh ne beehno e a'aj maalo ucea ne lor ngo. Abea Maarya adoohng paajo.
Maa akoohb Maartha yihr Jeacuu kea, “Ruohdh nea yih ne naa kan e umiiha be ne thow.
Abea ngo ngahya keehd awaahn ni kan e Juog gihn kwayi ngo cube cubo yihri.”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo yihre kea, “Umiihu ngo ucahr keehdo.”
Maa abeehr Maarthae ngo yihre kea, “Ngo ngahya kejea ucahr cahng ucahr nyoge yi gug piny.”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo yihre kea, “A naa ngaa meehg nyoge cahro kedea an ne cub kuowo yihr gen. Ngaa yiih luma e ngo udoohng ne ngaa me kuow keehd maa athowe
Nea ngaa me kuow maa ayiih luma e ngo be kuong thoo. Gihn ni ngo ayiih Maartha.”
Maa abeehr Maarthae ngo kea, “Ayiih Ruohdh. Ngo ayiiha kejea yih naa Ngad Boadh nyoge ge Waahd Juog ge arob naa ubeehn wiih piny kan.”
Naa athum Maarthae ke rob e acidho ne cuohn Maarya nyemen oogo kiin nyoge. Maa amuonge yi yihdh ngo kea, “Ngad puohny abeehno kedea yih daahde daahdo.”
Naa alihng Maarya lum nu, e ngo aguo yedh maalo ne ci bang ngo.
(Jeacuu apoohd ke kaa anaa ayoad Maarthae ngo yea, e poohd kuu awahnh yihdh miehr).
Kaano e yaa Judea giih anaa wod ne ciihm cwihny Maarya ge athubo ke buodh batiene naa aniid gene ngo e a'aj maalo ke laahdo ne ci oogo, cuohn gene kejea ngo caa wiih liel ne lalo.
Naa awahnh Maaryae kaa anahg Jeacuue yea ni kedea naa aniide Jeacuu, e ree ariedhe piny upahdhe thaahdh tien Jeacuu kedea urube kea, “Ruohdh nea yih ne naa kan e umiiha be ne thow.”
Naa aniid Jeacuue Maarya maa yaa Judea giih abeehno keehde e ge uyuog e cwihnye ake rahnyo kedea uyuog aduune keraahyo.
Maa apeehy Jeacuue kea, “Kuohme akanu kee?”
Maa abeehr gene ngo kejea, “Ruohdh beehn ni uniidi kaa ngo.”
Kaano e Jeacuu piih wonge ake wojo.
Maa arub yaa Judea kob gene, “Maahnyu kaa anhyaare ngo kii ngo.”
Abea nyoge mooge kiin gen kob gene, “Wong ngaa maa acoor ayabe, kare anud yihre ubahnge Laajoruj be ne thoo.”
Jeacuu yea acahg ngeero keehdo ge wahnhe wiih loohro kaa akan kuohm Laajoruj yea. Ngo anahg buur me beehda roony kedea dhee ciehg kaa leelo.
Maa akoohb Jeacuu kea, “Looru leelo oogo dhe liel.”
Maa akoohb Maarthae nyemiih ngaa athow kea, “Ruohdh kuohm dhaano anahg nihn angween yi buur, awaahn ngo ungwaahyo.”
Maa ataahny Jeacuue rih Maartha kea, “Kaa anaa robo yihri ne kejea nea yih yiiho e kaa amoar wiih Juog kii ngo niidi niido?”
Maa akahl gene leelo oogo dhe buur. Noono ubeehn Jeacuue umaahnye maalo maa arube kea, “Abaa Wura koohri amuoja bang gihn alihngi luma.
Ngo ngahya kejea luuba ge beehde e ge yiihi yiiho kedea ngo roba kaa nying yaa ni cuung kan bang ungahy gene ngo kejea yih naa aoohr an.”
Ge athume keehd rob e ake cuohdo e duone ne maalo kea, “Laajoruj beehn oogo.”
Maa abeehne oogo e cinge kedea tiene poohd e ge atuohj ke waaro kedea e wonge abahj ke waaro.
Maa arob Jeacuue ngo yihr gen kea, “Kahlu waay thoo oogo yi kuohme umeehgu ngo ci paajo.”
Noono e amahr yaa Judea giih anaa abeehno keehd Maarya kedea naa aniid gene gihn atiihye, e lum Jeacuu ayiih gene.
Abea nyoge mooge kiin gen ge abeehn ne ci bang Paarijea urob gene kwaad gihn atiihy Jeacuue ge aniid gene ni.
Maa abeehn jo doong yaa lam kedea Paarijea ucuohn gene amaad gihr Akuud Judea; noono upiih gene ne peehny rog gen, “Maahnyu ka beehn nyine utiihye giih me gaahy nyoge me thoohdh!
Nea ngo meehgo ke bar maalo ke yug giih ni, e amahr nyoge giih puohnye ge beehn gene ke ne yiiho noono e apahne giih Roama kar kwaj gihro beehn gene ke ne kaabo kedea utoar gene ngo piny.”
Noono e dhaano acielo kiin gen me nyinge Kaaypaj ge anahg ngaa duohng yaa lam yi wong nu ake rubo kea, “Wu nyoge me gihn me ngahyu tooro.
Ngo kwihyu kejea ngo beer ubeehn dhaano acielo uthowe ke nying nyoge cang yi man beehn paajo ke kare cang uthowe.”

Gihn ni arobe padh lubo me en naa apar ngo ke robo. Abea bang gihn anahg en naa ruohdh duohng yaa lam yi wong nu, e naa ameehg Juoge ngo rob gihn utiihy ree rih Jeacuu: ge uthowe ke nying tien paar yaa Judea.
Kedea padh ke nying tien paar Judea keede e nuu uthowe abea beehda ke nying nyethen Juog ge akeedho ke bang wiih piny cang beere ge kahle ke ka maa acielo kedea umade yihdh gen.
Ke wong cahng nu, e ge athubo ke gweehg dhe yooh me dhiil gene Jeacuu ke naah.
Noono e Jeacuu kuu acahg waahdh naa arwaadh ke kiin yaa Judea. Ngo abeehn ne dag paajo me cahng ke dhe ukang. Kaa adag gene ne beehdo yi ngo keehd jo waahdhe anahg geen Eparem.
Ge anaa adoohng Yaan Amono cahng ni, e nyoge me thoohdh ge athubo ke ci yi geen Jeruucalem ne yug giih kweehr ne koar cahng yaay.
Noono e nyoge ge athubo ke cej ka ne Jeacuue yea kaa anaa acuung gene yi laaro gihr Wod Juog kedea e ge upeehyo ke rog gen kob gene, “Ne ngaa me ngahy ngo kejea Jeacuu ubeehn kar Yaan Amono?”
Abea ka jo doong yaa lam maa Paarijea amor acub gene kob gene nea ngaa ngahy ka ne Jeacuu yea e kea robe ngo beere ngo mag gene mago.
Jeacuu awahnh geen Bathany maano e adoohng nihn abiihjbeciel unahge cahng Yaan Amono. Laajoruj ngaa anaa atahng Jeacuue ucahre yi thoo ngo abeed Bathany.
Cam anaa agwiir Maarthae yihre paar ge Laajoruj. Maartha e naa anaa apiih buud gen kaano acahm gene cahmo. Laajoruj anaa apiih tiehd ke gen ne cam.
Maa abeehn Maarya ukaabe udhoohmo me yea ne mow me ngwaahy me ngiene teeg keter uwiihre tien Jeacuu kedea uwuunye tien ngo keehd yiehj wiihe. Maa abeehn mowe upaahnge yea wod ke ngwahje.
Maa akoohb Juudo Yijkaariod ngad waahdh Jeacuu, ge e nuu ubeehn ne luom ngo kea,
“Gihn ge bahnge mown ni be ne ngeew oogo beere amahr ngiihny me thoohdh ge yoad ge ke paahngo yihr nyoge maa angoohng? Ngiihny ne yoad ge ne nahg kar koog gihr dhaano yi wong acielo.”
Gihn nu kea robo kaa nying gihn anhyaare nyoge maa angoohng, abea ngo anahg ngad kahw me na ukahbo rog ngiihny na cub yihre ne maa. Anahg en ne mag ngiihny yoad yaa waahdh Jeacuue bang nyoge.
Maa abeehr Jeacuue lume kobe, “Wiiu dhaahr ni utiihye gihre ne tiihye. Keá ngaa gied ngo! Ngo beehda gihn maa agwiir ke coon kejea mown ngo akan kaa nying cahng thona.
Yaa angoohng ge beehdo e ge nud ke wun ke cahng cahngo. Abea a buu kwaay nudo ke wun.”
Naa alihng amahr yaa Judea ngo kejea Jeacuu ngo ne Bathany, e ge acidho ne maany Laajoruj ge atahng Jeacuue maalo yi thoo kedea ge acidh thiow ne maany Jeacuu.
Noono e jo doong yaa lam ge athubo ke daahd dhe yooh me nahg gene Laajoruj kedea Jeacuu thiow.
Ge adaahd unahg gene Laajoruj bang gihn beehda ke nyinge e naa abeehn yaa Judea me thoohdh udoohng gene ne yaa Jeacuu.
Ruuwow e amahr akuud yaa Judea ge anaa abeehn yi yaay, ngo alihng gene kejea Jeacuu ngo nii yooh ne beehn Jeruucalem.
Maa atoohng gene ageehbe kedea ucidh gene ne lore e ge ukwaago kob gene,
“Wuoro Juog.
Dooj Juoge ngade ge abeehno ke yoohn Paar Maalo.
Juog dooj ruohdh yaa Yijarael.”
Maa abeehn Jeacuue uyoade akaja maa apaahre wiih ngo wa kwaad kaa anaa agweede yi kitaab Juog,
“Wu keá tudo,
wu yaa Jeruucalem,
maanyu ruohdh ne ca beehn nu
e ne wiih akaja me poohd thiin.”

Giih nu ayug rog gen yihdh gen kuu anaa aguo jo waahdhe ke deado kejea ge beehda giih maa agweed yi kitaab Juog ke nying Jeacuu. Abea batien kaa acahre ke dhe yooh me gaahy nyoge e naa angey gene ngo kejea giih maa agweed ke nying Jeacuu ge aniid gene e rog gen tiihy gene tiihyo.
Amahr yaa anudo keehd Jeacuu ge anaa atahnge Laajoruj yi thoo gihn atiihy ree anaa abeehn gene ne nyaay piny yihr nyoge.
E naa gihn ameehg amahr nyoge beehn ne lor Jeacuu ke nying gihn teeg e anaa ayuge ni.
Maa arub Paarijea ke rog gen kob gene, “Gihn me romo ke yugo tooro ne weey weey. Niidu kaa abuodh amahr nyoge me thoohdhe batiene!”
Anudo ke yaa Griihg maa anaa kiin yaa anaa acidho yi yaay ne wuor Juog.
Noono e ge abeehn bang Pihlihb. (Pihlihb anahg ngad Bedhceada ge beehda geen Gaalili). Gihn nu e ge arubo yihre kob gene, “Ruohdh! Wa daahd ucidh wane bang Jeacuu.”
Maa abeehn Pihlihbe urobe lum nu yihr Andrya kedea uaay gene tiehd ucidh gene ne rob gihn ateed yaa Griihge yihr Jeacuu.

Abea ngo abeehr Jeacuue yihr gen kea, “Cahng ngo abeehno ge ubeehnu wu yaa padh Judea uromu doohng ne nyoge maa ayiih Juoge ne yaae thiow. Gihn nu ree uyuge ge ubeehn Juoge umeehge tee gihre niido ke dhe yoohn gihn utiihy ree riha.
A rob gihn maa athiir yihru. Nea a athow e nyoge me thoohdh Juog beehn gene ke ne ngahyo. Thona uroomo ke wong beehlo nea ke piidho e ngo kuong thoo batiene e ngo utuuyo kedea uciege.

Kwaad ngaa yug gihn nhyaare cog kedea ukoare gihn me pahdh wiihe, e ngaan nu kuowo me guge tooro be yoade. Abea kwaad ngaa nhyaar buodh batiena keehd me padh ngaan ngo Ujudea kedea ubeehn nyoge cang umahd gene rih ngo, e yihre unaa kuowo me be gug.
Kwaad ngaan tiihy yihra dhiile batiena ke buodho beere ngo caa ka nuda yea. Kaano e nuu ubeehn Wura umoare wiih ngaa tiihy yihra keehd me padhe Ujudea.

“Awaahn ni cwihnya urahmo, abea roba gihn? Koohba kaa, ‘Abaa Wura kuohma keá meehg raahm wa ka ngahya raahm gihn uyoada ni?’ Abea utiihya ke ne diih keehdo abea anahg ke nying raahm ngo e naa abeehna wiih piny!
Abaa Wura nyoadh teegi yihr nyoge wiih piny kan.”
Kaano e duol ake lihngo ke yoohn Paar Maalo kobe, “Tee ngo beehde e ngo anyoadha kedea ngo udoga ke nyoadho keehdo.”
Akuud nyoge giih anudo kaano duol alihng gene ke yoohn Maalo maa akoohb nyoge mooge kejea, “Kodh e naa amaahr.” Abea nyoge mooge kob gene, “Beehda wuohnjuog e naa arubo keehde.”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo yihr gen kea, “Duol gihn nu ngo kuu arubo kaa nying kony an, abea arubo kaa nying kony wun.
Awaahn ni e ne beehn Juoge ukihme yaa wiih piny kedea Juog ngad atiihb ukeehg, ge raany wiih ngoom ngo urieme oogo wiih koom.
Abea cahng ugur an wiih yaadh maa ariihw ne naah, e nyoge ge umeehga beehn banga.”
(Gihn nu arob Jeacuue ne nyoadh dhe yoohn ka unahge kii ngo).

Noono e ngo abeehr nyoge yihre kob gene, “Wa arob loohng Moaje kejea Kriihjto ubeehdo e ngo be thow. Gihn ge rubi kobi, ‘Ngaa adoohng ne dhaano utaahngo ngo uthow utihnge maalo.’ Beehda ngaa e naa adoohng ne dhaano utaahngo?”

Noono e ngo arob Jeacuue yihr gen kea, “Daahr meeny piny ngo poohd ubeehdo ke wun ka me thiin mee. Baru maalo ke waahdhu ka poohde daahr nud ke wun beere muudho wu be moale piny. Bang gihn ngaa caahdh kii yi muudho ka cea yea ngo kwihye.
Yiihu luma a ngaa cub daahr yihr nyoge maano e ngo poohd nud ke wun, beere wu udoohng ne nyethen ngaa cub daahr yihr nyoge.”
Ge athume ke rob luube giih nu e Jeacuu a'aay ucea ne pahno ka me be yoad ree yihr gen.
Keehd maano abeehn Jeacuue uyuge amahr giih me thoohdh me gaahy nyoge nyum gen, e poohd e ge ukweer ke lume.
Giih nu cang rog ge ayug gene beere luube giih agamloohngjuog ge cuohn ne Yicaaya ge dhiil pahdh kar gen naa athere wa kwaad kaa agweede naa,
“Juog, bekihd ngaa maa anaa alihng giih arob wane
kedea utoor dhaano maa adead giih tee ge atiihy Juoge.”
Ge kuu ayiiho bang gihn arob Yicaaye thiow kea,
“Kob Juoge kea,
‘Bang gihn wudh gen aciehg gene
ukweer gene ke yiiho,
udoohng wa an naa aciehg wudh gen
utoor ka maa angey gene yi luma.
Ge naa arom ke thiehdho
nea wudh gen be ne ciehg gene.’ ”
Giih ni ge arob Yicaaye bang gihn kaa amoar wiih Jeacuu kii ngo anyoadh yihre yi laahg e naa gihn arube ke nying ngo.
Abea keehd maano, e Judea me thoohdh maa ruohdh paajo lum Jeacuu ayiih gene. Abea ke nying Paarijea e ge atud ke nyoadh rog gen bang gihn ge beehn gene ke ne riem oogo yi wod amaad.
Bang gihn Judea giih nu, nea yihr gen e leej gihn ayoad gene bang nyoge e ne wiihe ne maalo yihr man yoad gene bang Juog.
Kaano e Jeacuu lubo angweele piny ke duol me teeg kobe, “Kwaad ngaa ayiih luma, kuu ayiih lum mara ke nguda abea beehda lum ngaa aoohr an e naa ayiihe.
Kwaad ngaa alog cwihnye ne maany an, e ngaa aoohr an e naa ayiihe.
A beehda daahr gihn abeehn ne meeny wiih piny kedea kwaad ngaa ayiih luma be cahg beehdo yi muudho keehdo.
“Abea ngaa alihng luma kedea akweer ke wuor ngo, e ngo be kihma. A abeehn wiih piny kan ne boadh nyoge. A kuu abeehn ne kihm nyoge.
Kwaad ngaa kweer ke lihng luma kedea luma be yiihe nud ke gihn muu ukihm en. Gihn ukihm en beehda luuba ge ateeda ni ge nuu ukihm en yi cahng gug piny.
Bang gihn, luub roba ge padh luuba abea Wura e aoohr an ni e naa acub tee yihra kedea uteede ngo yihra kejea roba gihn teeda.
Ngo ngahya kejea tee gihn cube yihra ni e naa dhe yoohn boadh wahy me be gug. Neehn maano kwaad gihn roba e naa gihn arob Wura yihra.”

Ke wong thiehno, ge ruuwow e naa cahng Yaan Amono, e ngo angahy Jeacuue kejea cahng aaye oogo wiih piny ne dog bang wahn ngo awahnho. Nhyaahro gihre anyoadhe yihr jo waahdhe ke yoohn thone ge ugure ngahy yaadh maa ariihw.

Kaano anaa apiih Jeacuue maa jo waahdhe ne cam ke thiehno e atiihb ukeehg lubo arobe coon yihr Juudo Yijkaariod waahd Cimoane kejea dewaahy nu e nu uluome Jeacuu. Ngo beehde e ngo ngahy Jeacuue kejea tee acub Juoge yihre ne yug kwaad giih nyepinye cang kedea ngo ngahye kejea e abeehno ke yoohn bang Juog kedea udo bang Juog.

Kaano anaa apiih Jeacuue maa jo waahdhe ne cam ke thiehno e atiihb ukeehg lubo arobe coon yihr Juudo Yijkaariod waahd Cimoane kejea dewaahy nu e nu uluome Jeacuu. Ngo beehde e ngo ngahy Jeacuue kejea tee acub Juoge yihre ne yug kwaad giih nyepinye cang kedea ngo ngahye kejea e abeehno ke yoohn bang Juog kedea udo bang Juog.
Noono e Jeacuu a'aj maalo kedea uthube ke kahl waahny athoohr gihn anaa ree oogo kedea uriiwe waaro moogo yi badhe.
Ke batien gihn nu e Jeacuu athubo ke woj piih yi wal noono maa athube ke luog tien jo waahdhe kedea uwuunye tien gen keehd waaro gihn anaa ariiwe yi badhe ni.
Naa awahnh Jeacuue bang Cimoane Piihter, e Piihter arubo yihre kea, “Ruohdh! Tiena romi kaa luogo ne!”
Maa abeehr Jeacuue ngo yihre kea, “Gihn ni tiihya awaahn ni be ngey ree yihru abea ngo ungahyu cahng moogo.”
Maa abeehr Piihtere ngo yihre kea, “Bekihde! Tiena be kuongi ke luogo ne weey weey!”
Maa acahg Jeacuue ngo ke beehro kea, “Nea tieni be luoga luogo e yihri utoor gihn me nweehd an ke yihn.”
Maa arub Piihtere yihre kea, “Nea wa maano ruohdh e padh tiena cog ge ne luog abea luog cinga kedea wiiha cang.”

Maa akob Jeacuue ngo yihre, “Kwaad dhaano maa aluog beehda tiene cog ge ne dihd, udoge gen ke luogo. Wu cang, wu aluog udoohngu ne nyoge me nyooro tooro rogu abea dhaano acielo kiinu e ne ree ne nyooro.”
Ngo beehde e ngo ngahy Jeacuue e ngaan uluom en. E naa lum yea gihn akoohbe kea, “Dhaano acielo kiinu e ne ree ne nyooro.”
Naa athume ke luog tien gen e waahny athoohr gihre angaabe kedea udoge kare ne piih. Maa apeehnye gen kea, “Gihn ayuga rogu ni yea angeyu ne?
A cuohnu cuohno ne ngad puohny kedea ne ruohdh. Beehda gihn maa kare ucuohnu an ne ngad puohny kedea ne ruohdh bang gihn a ngad puohny gihru kedea ruohdhu adiehr muon.
Me neehn kaan ni aluoga tienu abea a beehda ruohdhu kedea ngad puohny gihru kea noono beehn dhaane kiinu luoge tien wad gen.
Luog tiel anyoadha yihru beere gihn atiihya yugu yugo wa kaano anyoadha ngo yihru.
Athiir e ne roba yihru. Baahng aweehne e ne wiihe ne maalo rih ngaa nahge baahng paare? Wale ngaa e ne wiihe ne maalo, ngaan aoohr wale ngaa aoohr ngo?
Awaahn ni adiehj yihdh luub ni ge angeyu. Kea noono tiihyu ke gen beere cwihnyu umihno.
“A be rubo kaa nyingu cang bang gihn yaa anaa akwanya ge ngahya. Abea gihn agweed yi kitaab Juog ngo dhiil pahdh kare ne rihb wa kaa agweede naa,
‘Ngaa anywaag wane amono keehde,
e naa adoohng ne ngad mahna.’
“Gihn ni ateeda yihru maano e gihn ngo ree poohd keá tiihyo beere nea ree tiihye tiihyo, e ngo uyiihu kejea beehda an e Juog ke nguda, a naa Ngad Boadh nyoge.
