Beeh roba yi lum anaa gweed yi kitaab Juog,
“Ngaa maa atiihy tiihye keá wij ubeehde ke kahj ree.”
Agweed thiow,
“Muor me dihn beel keá mahn ke cam beel giih dihne.”
Nea dhaano abeehn bangi ne luom ngaa me duohng nyum nyoge abea caahdhe e keede e gihre keá yiihi. Kahle nyoge ariow wale adahg maa aniid gihn raaj e tiihy ngaa duohnge.

Kaano arumo e gihn ne keew gen yea maanyi maanyo. Nea ngo ayoadi kejea ngaa duohng gihn me raaj ayuge kea kedh ngo nyum akuud beere gihn atiihye ke ngeyo kedea ubahnge kwaad gihn nu be tiihy nyoge mooge.
Teeda teedo yihri nyum Juog maa nyum Jeacuu Kriihjto Ruohdh kedea nyum wuohnjuog kejea mag luub ateeda yihri, kedea tiihyi keehd gen e giih waal ge be tiihyi kiin nyoge.
Giih ayal yal ge keá yugi nea cingi cubi ke wiih ngaa me roonyi ne tiihy yihr Juog. Beehdi ne ngaa me giih nyooro tooro ree kedea kweer ke giih yaa adhemuohme.
Ke nying atwaany yej gihn koag ke mag yihn, na mahdhi mahdho ke koongo me thiin. Yih keá maadh piih cog.
Awuohje giih nyoge mooge ge guo kaa ngeyo, e ngaan atiihy awuohj ke ngude poohd kuu amag, abea muu nyoge mooge ge be laar ke ngeyo ne weey weey. Ge ngey ke dhecaahn.
Tiihj me beer beehd wa maano tiehd, mooge ge guo kaa ngeyo piow piow. Abea keehd me be neehne ne dahr, e ngo be rom ree kano.

Yaa ayiiho giih apahdh yi cing nyoge me padh yaa ayiiho ne baahng dhiil gene yaa nu ke wuoro kedea tiihy gene beer yihr gen, bang utoor ngaa me rubo ke lubo me raaj ke nying Juog kedea ke nying lum Juog naa ayiih gene.

Keehd yaa ayiiho giih apahdh yi cing yaa ayiiho ne baahng, yaa nu keá dhahl gene. Ge keá dhahl gene ke nying gihn nahg gene nyoge maa ayiiho wa gen. Nea kare ne cohg nea baahng apahdh yi cing yaa ayiiho e dhiil gene tiihj keraahyo bang gihn yaa yoad gihn me beer yi tiihy gen noono beehda nyoge maa ayiiho wa mar gen.
Giih ni ge ne dhiili ke puohnyo utiihy nyoge ke gen.
Kwaad ngaan be puohny giih ateed Jeacuu Kriihjto Ruohdh ge rob lum Juog ukweere ke yiih giih ni unahge ke giih mooge me ne keede ge ne puohnye,
e ngaan nu adoohng ne ngad nhyaam kedea gihn me ngahye tooro.

Ngo uroomo wa ngaa maa aduune athow bang gihn ngo kwaan batien giih me kahl giih weehr maa giih daag cwihny kedea tiel kiin nyoge kedea rob ne yahng rog nyoge. Kwaad ngaan nu kahl giih peehm kiin nyoge me wudh gen tooro kedea wudh gen arahnyo maa adiehr be cahge ke ngeyo. Nyoge maa acub ngo yi cwihny gen kejea yiih lum Juog kahl lonyo.
Yiih lum Juog utoor gihn moogo me daahd dhaane e naa lonyo.
Naa anyuol dhaano e gihr lonyo maa akahle ke en ngo tooro e gihn me aay ke en ngo tooro.
Nea cam nud yihro kedea waare, e gihn keehdo e ne dogo ke daahdo?

Abea kwaad yaa daahd giih lonyo ge pahdh yi cing atiihb ukeehg bang gihn wudh ge tooro kedea cwihny ge ayuohd ne daahd giih me reje. Giih nu ge ne yug gene ne nyoge me reje ubahnge Paar Juog be yoad gene.
Giih me reje tien gen aay ke bang nhyaar ngiihny, nhyaar ngiihny e ne weehg nyoge mooge wii lum Juog kedea uyoad gene giih raahm cwihny.

Abea yih Timodhy naa acubi cwihnyi ne yug lum Juog wiihi keá cub yihdh kwaad giih nu, cub wiihi piny ne tiihy gihn daahd Juoge kedea beehdi ke beehd ngaa maa ayiih lum Juog. Beehdi e yih nhyaar yaa ayiiho wa yihn kedea lum Juog keá wii. Guum giih raahm kedea tiihy gihn me beer yihr nyoge.
Kaal wudh nyoge ke tiihyi ne nyoadh kaa ayiihi lum Juog kii ngo beere yih caa Paar Juog. Anahg Paar Juog e ne cuohn Juoge yihn ne ci yea cahng anaa ayiihi lume nyum nyoge.
Lihng gihn teeda yihri nyum Juog naa acag nyepinye cang, kedea nyum Jeacuu. Jeacuu ngaa kuu anaa atud ke rob tiihye nyum ruohdh cuohn ne Poantuj Pilaato.
Lihng luub nu kedea mag gen beer mee utoor awuohje me yoad Jeacuu Kriihjte rihi cahng ubeehne ne kihm nyoge.
Unahg Juog ge beehda Ruohdh Duohng e keede ge dooje gihn me kaal wiihe tooro, e nu unyoadh cahng umeehge Jeacuu Kriihjto Ruohdho beehno.
Juog keede, e be thow, e beed ka me ryaal wong me ngaa me rom ci kaa ngo tooro; ngo be neehn yihr ngaa maa now kedea ngo be ukuonge ke niido. Wuoro ngo bang gihn ruohdhe be gug. E noono.

Teed ngo yihr yaa ayiiho naa alony ke giih ungoom kan, kejea ge keá nhyaam kedea kwaad giih lonyo me be gaahn ge keá gaahn gene abea gaahn gene Juog ngaa muoj won kaa amahr giih me thoohdh me meehg cwihnyo ngeedho.
Teed ngo yihr gen kejea tiihy gene gihn beer yihr nyoge beere ge ulonyo nyum Juog. Nhyaar gene kony nyoge kedea nywaag gene gihn ne yihr gen ke nyoge.
Wa gihn nu, e giih beeye naa atiihy gene ge neehn giih lonyo maa akan gene yi Dhaahr Juog. Kaano e kuowo maa adiehr uyoad gene ka me neehn kuowo mar Dhaahr Juog cahng moogo.
Yih Timodhy, cub wiihi piny ne cohg ne mag giih acub Juoge yi cingi. Yi keá, piih ne rob ke nyoge me rob giih me maahn ke robo. Yaa peem toohd kejea ge nyoge maa apuohny.
Yaa koohbo kejea ge nyoge maa apuohny beehde dhe yoohn lum Juog arwaahnyo yihr gen. Beehn Juoge dooje wun cang.
II Timothy: A Poal e ne gweehd yihri, yih Timodhy a ge aoohr Jeacuue Kriihjte neehn kaa agweehg Juoge ngo coon. A aoohre ne teed lum Juog yihr nyoge kedea ne nyoadh ngo yihr gen kejea nea Jeacuu yiih gene yiiho, e boadh wahy me be gug yoad gene yoado. Boadh wahy gihn nweehd won keehd Jeacuu Kriihjto.

Timodhy, warga gihn agweeda yihri bang gihn yih neehn nyethiin yeya maa anhyaara ke nying kaa ayiihi lum Juog kii ngo. Beehn Juog Wuure kedea Jeacuu Kriihjto Ruohdho cub gene muuny mar gen kedea doohr mar gen yihri maa duu gene cwihny gen caahn rihi.

Juog koohre muohja muohjo ne naang ke bang dewaahr kedea decahngo. Juog gihr ge wura en ne wuora kedea a beehdo kaa dhe yooh me ne cohg me meehg cwihny Juog mihno riha. E naa gihn beehda ke cwihnya acielo. Ke nying nihn, e kwahya yihr Juog, e wiiha be wul ne kwaj ke nyingi.
Piih wongi ge anaa awoj piny ge poohd para paro. Yih acana keraahyo, a daahd uniida yihn keehdo beere cwihnya naa yum.
Kwaad yiiho gihn ne yihri be wul yi wiiha. Ngo uroomo keehd yiiho mar wongu ge cuohn ne Loaj kedea mar miihu ge cuohn ne Yunij. Ngo dhiila kaa ngahyo kejea yiiho gihri noono ree ujwage.

Ke nying kwaad yiiho gihn ayiihi lum Jeacuu, e naa gihn bera ngo yihri kejea mag muuny Juog gihn ayoadi cahng anaa acuba cinga yi wiihi. Cinga anaa acuba yi wiihi ne dooj yihn kedea ne cub yihn yi tiihy kwaag yaa ayiiho.

Teeda teedo yihri kejea bar maalo ke tiihy nu, bang gihn Juog Wahy Juog acube yihro beere wo be tud. A teeda yihri kejea bar maalo ke tiihyu nu bang gihn Juog wo amuoje ke Wahy Juog me wo be weehge tudo, abea Wahy Juog cub tee kedea nhyaaro kedea dhe yoohn koar rogo.

Nea lum Juog ayiiho beer mee e wiihi be laahy ne rob ke nying Jeacuu yihr nyoge kedea ne rob ngo kejea a beehda gomi. Yih kea tud nea yih ke maa neehn ka beehda kan yi thijin. Dhiil guum neehn mara ke nying Juog bang gihn Juog yih umuoje ke tee me guumi giih me reje.

Anahg Juog e naa par ngo e keede ne boadh wahyo kedea ukwanye won ne tiihy tiihye. Giih nu ge ayug Juoge yihro padh ke nying gihn maa tiihyo yihre, anahg ke nying gihn maa atage kedea ke dhe yoohn muuny mare. Muuny ngo acube yihro, ke nying Waahde Jeacuu Kriihjto. Acube yihro yi nihn umodho e maalo maa piny ge puud kuu acage.

Gihn maa anaa angahyo ke nying gihn atag Juoge ngo atooro. Abea, awaahn ni ngo anyoadhe yihro naa abeehn Jeacuu Kriihjto Ngad Boadh nyoge. Jeacuu, thoo ataaje kedea unyoadhe beehdo me yea tooro thoo yihro ke dhe yoohn kitaab Juog.
Ngahyi kejea lum Juog ke ngude e naa akwany an kedea uyuge an ne ngade me oohre ne rob ke nyinge kedea ne puohny Ciig Beer yihr nyoge cang.

Ke nying tiihy akwany Juoge an yea, e naa gihn ayoada giih raahm rog. Abea keehd maano e wiiha be laahy, bang gihn ngaa acub tiihj yihra beehda ngaa me ngahya kedea ngo gaahna gaahno. Ngo angahya kejea giih atiihya ge pahdh yi cwihnye cang, kedea ke nying giih nu atiihya, a ukooge cahng uduu Jeacuu.
Dhe yoohn puohny maa athiir gihn alihngi banga ngo kea wii. Puohny yaai ke puohny maa athiir. Puohny nyoge ne cohg ke dhe yoohn me yiih gene Jeacuu Ngad boadh won unhyaare.
Wahy Juog gihn beehdo ke won yih ukonye ne mag luube giih beey ge wii Juoge yi cingi.
Ngahyi kejea Piigeluj maa Ehrmojean kedea yaa yiiho giih abeehno ke yoohn piny Aacya ge goohd oogo riha.

Abea Onecipoaruj gihn me beer atiihye yihra. Beehn Juoge dooje Onecipoaruj kedea yaa paare ke nying gihn beer e ayuge. A aliewe tiel me thoohdh kedea umeehge aduuna ngahmo. Wiihe kuu alaahyo ne liew an keehd maa anaa yi thijin,
bang gihn kaa awahnhe ke geen Roama, e athubo ke daahd kara uwahdhe kaa ayoade an.
Beehn Juoge wiie giih me reje naa atiihy Onecipoaruje piny yihr ngo cahng ukihm Juoge nyoge. Ngahyi thiow kaa akonye an kii ngo kaa anaa yi geen Epicoj.
Abea yih waahda, ngahm cwihnyi ke nying muuny Juog gihn nweehd won keehd Jeacuu Kriihjto.
Luube giih anaa alihngi e ge roba robo nyum amahr nyoge puohny gen yihr nyoge me cwihny be diiw rog gen. Puohny gen yihr yaa cwihny be diiw rog gen ne baar gen wong maalo yihr nyoge.
Deed cwihnyi ne guum giih raahm udoohngi ne ujaadya me kag ke nying Jeacuu Kriihjto neehn mara.

Wa maano nahgi ujaadya gihr Jeacuu Kriihjto, wiihi keá cahg ke cub ne tiihy giih wiih ngoom. Nea wiihi cubi ne tiihy giih ungoom e giih adaahd ngaa akwany yihn yi jeaj gihre be rom rog gen ke tiihy yihri wa ka daahde.

Caahdhi kaa dhe yoohn loohng gihr Juog beere gihn me beer yoadi yoado. Yi cohgo ke ngweej ngaa e ne cub gihn me beer yihre? Ngaa cohgi ke dhe yoohn loohng gihn arobe wale ngaa cohgi ke kar wiihe maa atage?
Keehd yi puur. Ngaa en kuong kaj? Ngaa apuro umodho wale ngaa apuro dhe caahn?
Caadh yihdh ucaale giih roba yihri, beere Juog wiihi yabe yabo ungahyi yihdh gen.

Giih beeye ne puohnya ge ngahyi. A upuohnyo kejea Jeacuu Kriihjto en naa Ngad Boadh nyoge, kedea naa athowe e ngo ameehg Juoge cahro ne nyoadh ngo kejea Jeacuu Kriihjto beehda Waahd Juog. Thiow beehda dhaano bang gihn ngo beehda kwaar Deabid, kedea e naa Ruohdh. Kwaayi bange ke paro beere kwaad giih apuohnya yihri tee aduulo cub gene cubo yihri.
Raahm rog me duohng ne riha kedea tiena ge areehg ke gele ke nying giih nu apuohnyo wa ngaa maa atiihy awuohj me duohng. Abea keehd maano e lum Juog be rom ree ke reehgo ke gele wa mar dhaano ukar.

Abea ka me kweera ke giih raahm rog tooro nea raahm riha boadh wahy gihn cub Jeacuue yoad nyoge yoado, boadh wahy me meehg nyoge beehdo ka maa acielo yi Dhaahr Juog e amiihr ke mihn cwihny me be gug ne naang.
Ngahda beehda adiehr kejea,
“Nea wo uthoo keehd Jeacuu,
e wo ubeehdo keehde tiehd Paar Juog.
Nea wo bar maalo ke guum ke nying Jeacuu
e wo unahg ruohdhe tiehd keehde.
Nea wo ukweer ke Jeacuu nea gihn me raaj apahdh wudho,
e ngo ukweer ke won thiow.
Nea yiiho gihro udoohng thiin
e yiiho mare be doohng thiin bang gihn ngo beehda ngaa me lume be waare.
Lume be waare bang gihn wo anhyaare kedea cwihnye ukonye won.”
Luub ni ge ne rob gihn maa athiir.

Timodhy, lubo acielo moogo nud me teeda yihri. Wiihi keá wul ne ber yihdh luub ni aroba yihri yihr nyoge kedea ngweel ngo piny yihr gen ke nying Juog kejea wudh gen kea cub gene ne peem luube me gihr nying gen tooro, bang gihn peem kwaad luub nu wudh yaa ayiiho urahnyo nea ge lihng gene lihngo.
Yug rihi beer mee beere Juog ka beehdi kii ngo nhyaare nhyaaro. Thiow bar maalo ke tiihyi, wiihi keá laahyo ne gihn tiihyi. Puohny lubo maa adiehr ke dhe yooh me ne kew.

Yih kea piih ne rob ke nyoge me puohny giih maa toohd ke nying Juog. Bang gihn yaa peem giih toohd rog gen uyoad gene e ge aay maahdh oogo yi lum Juog neehn ngaa me ree ne ler. Kwaad peehm gihn nu kahl ngwiilo rog yaa yiiho, ngwiilo muu uroomo kaa adhoohlo me dhiil wong dhaano piny: kwaad adhoohlo me be cieg me nahg dhaano ke tuud. Yimoanoj maa Pihltuj ge ne kiin yaa puohny giih toohd.

Yih kea piih ne rob ke nyoge me puohny giih maa toohd ke nying Juog. Bang gihn yaa peem giih toohd rog gen uyoad gene e ge aay maahdh oogo yi lum Juog neehn ngaa me ree ne ler. Kwaad peehm gihn nu kahl ngwiilo rog yaa yiiho, ngwiilo muu uroomo kaa adhoohlo me dhiil wong dhaano piny: kwaad adhoohlo me be cieg me nahg dhaano ke tuud. Yimoanoj maa Pihltuj ge ne kiin yaa puohny giih toohd.

Yaa nu ariow lum Juog abaj gene ulyaahb gene wudh yaa ayiiho. Kob gene kejea ngaa muu ucahg cahro tooro keehdo, bang gihn cahr nyoge wiihe agug. Puohny gen noono kaa ayiih nyoge mooge lum Juog kii ngo yea ngo awuoj gene piih.
Abea toohd now, lum Juog tiene akeehd piny, gihn me lwag yea tooro. Juog yaae ge ngahye kedea ngaan koohbo kejea Juog ayiihe, dhiile tiihy giih me reje ke wiio.
Paajo yea be toohr ke roohd maa agweed kedea muu kuu agweed. Roohd maa agweed ge kahl oogo nea weehno me wuor nud. Abea roohd kuu agweed ge ne tiihy nyoge ke gen yi nihn maa now.
Yaa ayiih Juog ge akweer ke giih puohny yaa toohd, ge ne room keehd roohd maa agweed ge ne cub yihr Juog ne tiihy giih beeye e daahd Juoge.

Kwaad giih reje e yug yaa reje cwihnyi keá cub rog gen, kedea nahge giih meehg yihn yug gihn me beer ge ne cubi cwihnyi ne tiihy gen. Nahgi ngad nhyaaro maa ayiih Juog. Beehd beer mee kedea e cwihnyi med keehd yaa anhyaar Juog kaa aduun gen cang.
Doga kaa bero yihri kejea giih peehm me gihr nying gen tooro, yih keá tiihyo ke gen. Bang gihn kwaad peehm me wa gihn nu nyoge keehg gene keehgo. Wii gen yihr yaa wudh gen tooro.

Cub aduuni piny ne lahm kedea udoohngi ne ngad puohny me beer, bang gihn yaa tiihyo yihr Juog ge beehde e ge be weehr. Ge yaaj me beer ke nyoge kedea ge yaa puohny me be dhaahr ke puohny yaa arwaahnyo.
Yaa cuung yi yoohni, rubi ke rob me ngey gene ngo ne cohg kejea nea wudh gen beer e Juog ge umeehge ngey gihn maa athiir, noono uyiih gene puohny gihri.
Kaano, e wudh gen uyahbo ubodh gene yi boon atiihb ukeehg naa amag gen. Kaano e ge udoohng ne yaa tiihy gihn daahd Juoge.
Dhiil ngo ke ngahyo yih Timodhy kejea buu unahg tiihy me yoohd ne kwaag yaa ayiiho ke nying giih utiihy yaa reje nea beehn Jeacuu acahngo.

Nyoge ge unahg yaa wahro me nhyaar ngiihny. Ge unahg yaa nhyaam me koag ke giih amaahg. Ge unahg nyoge me dhahl Juog. Nyoge me dhahl weehg gen. Ge unahg nyoge me leej kwihy gene kedea ge be tud rih Juog.
Ge unahg nyoge me luube be wii gene piny, nyoge me nhyaahro tooro yi cwihny gen. Nyoge maa yaa waaj giih toohd me kwihj koar rog gen yihdh giih bal. Nyoge me koag ke giih bad, me maan gihn me beer.
Ge unahg nyoge maa yaa luom, me wudh gen be cub gene yi gihn tiihj. Nyoge maa yaa amaahg me nhyaar giih wuohbo. Ge unahg nyoge me nhyaar rog gen abea Juog be nhyaar gene.
Rog gen ayug gene wa nyoge me puoj Juog abea giih yug gene nyoadh ngo kejea tee Juog tooro rog gen. Timodhy, yih keá piih ka maa acielo ke kwaad yaa nu.

Yaa nu ge naa yaa leel rog gen yihdh wuud nyoge ne ci ne mag gom ke maahn me cwihny gen bahw beere wudh gen log gene loo. Maahn maa atiihy thoohn awuohye me doonge. Thoohn giih atiihy gene ge ne meehg wudh gen loo noono udog gene ne tiihy giih reje ge puohny yaa ni yihr gen.
Kwaad maahn nu ge daahd puohny me teed giih reje e nhyaar gene. Gihn nu e ne bahnge puohny maa athiir, e nyoadh lum Juog be yoad gene.
Yaa puohny giih toohd ge uroomo wa Janej maa Jambrej naa acub wudh gen ne dhaahr giih atiihy Moaje, ge nyoge me lum Juog arwaahnyo yihr gen.

Gihn me dier nyoge ke nyinge tooro bang gihn ge beehda nyoge me wudh gen tooro kedea tooy wihj gihr gen noono, ubeehn nyoge me thoohdhe ne ngeyo ka me cahng, toohd gen ungey wa gihn anaa atiihy ree rih Janej maa Jambrej.

Abea Timodhy, yih be room ke yaa nu. Kaa apuohnya kii ngo, ngo ngahyi kedea kaa akaahna riha kii ngo, ngo ngahyi thiow. A abeehdo e a ngaa maa amag gihn ayiiha ke cwihnya acielo. A abeehdo e a ngaa maa anhyaar nyoge ke cwihnya me tar. Kaa aguuma giih reje naa atiihy nyoge riha ge ngahyi. Giih ajohr naa ayug nyoge riha ke bang wudh geedh Antiog maa Lijtera kedea Yikoohnya, ge ngahyi. Giih nu ge ayug riha, abea Juog e naa alwahg an oogo yihdh giih nu cang.

Abea Timodhy, yih be room ke yaa nu. Kaa apuohnya kii ngo, ngo ngahyi kedea kaa akaahna riha kii ngo, ngo ngahyi thiow. A abeehdo e a ngaa maa amag gihn ayiiha ke cwihnya acielo. A abeehdo e a ngaa maa anhyaar nyoge ke cwihnya me tar. Kaa aguuma giih reje naa atiihy nyoge riha ge ngahyi. Giih ajohr naa ayug nyoge riha ke bang wudh geedh Antiog maa Lijtera kedea Yikoohnya, ge ngahyi. Giih nu ge ayug riha, abea Juog e naa alwahg an oogo yihdh giih nu cang.
Adiehr, kwaad ngaan daahd ubeehde ke beehd ngaa maa ayiih lum Juog naa anweehd ngo ke Jeacuu Ngad Boadh nyoge, e ngaa nu giih ajohr ge dhiile kaa yoado.
Abea mar yaa reje, kedea yaa ucahb ge ubar maalo ke raahyo me duohng udwaahng gene nyoge cang kedea udwaahng gene rog gen ke ngud gen.
Abea mari yih Timodhy, mag cwihnyi teeg mee ungeehri yi lum Jeacuu ge alihngi yi dhog wan. Lum Jeacuu ayiihi ne cohg naa athiir bang gihn wan ke ngud wan ngo apuohny wane yihri.
Yih ke ngudi, giih agweed yi kitaab Juog ge angahyi ke coon e yih puud thiin. Luub agweed yi kitaab Juog ge naa ayab wongi kedea uyoadi boadh wahy naa ayiihi Jeacuu Kriihjto.

Kwaad luub agweed yi kitaab Juog ge beeye bang gihn Juog ke ngude e naa meehg gen gweedo. Kitaab Juog beer bang puohny gihn maa athiir yihro kedea nyoadh gihn me raaj yi tiihyo, kitaab Juog e ne yug won teeg beere giih beeye tiihyo tiihyo.
Noono e ngaa tiihy tiihy Juog gihn me riehny yihre ke tiihyo tooro bang gihn ree agwiire beer mee kedea gihn me daag yihr tooro.

Gihn me tiihyi e man cuba yihri. Juog kedea Jeacuu Kriihjto Ruohdh, ge naa cuude giih cuba gihn tiihyi nyum gen. Jeacuu beehda cuud yi tiihy cuba yihri bang gihn unahg en e nuu ukihm nyoge cang cahng ubeehne ne beehd yi Dhaahre ke yaae.

Beehdi e rihi agwiiri ne puohny lum Juog maa adiehr yihr nyoge. Dhiil ngo ke puohnyo yihr gen keehd me toor cwihny gene lihng giih puohnyi ni. Cohg wudh yaai kedea cuow gen nea ge awaahj. Gihn beer e dhiil gene ke tiihyo rob ngo yihr gen. Yih keá dhaahr ne puohny lum Juog yihr gen.

Tiihy giih nu bang gihn cahng ukweer nyoge mooge ke lihng puohny gihn rob athiir yihdh luub Juog ngo ubeehn. Noono udoohng gene e ge cej yaa puohny me puohny kwaad giih daahd gene ke lihngo, giih me be nhyaar Juoge.
Ge ukweer ke lihng puohny maa adiehr kedea ucub gene wudh gen ne lihng giih maa puoge.

Teeda teedo yihri thiow kejea mag cwihnyi ubahnge giih me reje be yugi. Nahgi ngad guum, puohny Ciig Beer ge rubo ke nying Jeacuu yihr nyoge. Yi tiihyi noono tiihyi yihr Juog, tiihyi kwaad gihn romi ke tiihyo utoor gihn me wii piny.
Giih ni ge aroba yihri bang gihn wahya ge awiia yihr Juog maa nihna ge athum wiih piny.
Abea keehd me thowa, e cwihnya med bang gihn giih me teeg yihdh gen acaara kedea lum Juog amaga teeg mee. A rom yuohmo arumo bang gihn tiihya ngo awahdh guge.
Koog gihra ngo akan. Koog gihn cub Jeacuue ngaa ngahy lug yihra Cahng Lug. Ngo ucub yihra kedea yihr yaa abuohj ke koar cahng duu Jeacuue.
Cej dhe yooh me laari beehn banga piow piow.
Demaj ngaa acub wiihe rog giih upiny kan akweer ke beehdo banga. Ngo a'aay ucea geen Thecaaloanika. Kreajen thiow a'aay. Ngo ne Galaadya, kedea Tiihtuj aci Dalmaacya.
Luka e ne ne banga kan cog. Kuung Maarko, keá wii piny. Beehni keehde tiehd beere a konye konyo ke tiihj.
Tiicihcuj ngo tooro thiow bang ngo aoohra Epicoj.
Nea yih ubeehno, kea kuung waaro gihr koohyo gihn anaa awiia Troaj bang Kaarpuj. Kuung kitaabe giiha keehd yihn tiehd, kitaab gihn ngahye abahj ke deehl keá wii piny.
Alekjander ngad thaahdho gihn me raaj atiihye riha. Gihn ngo unahg Juog e nuu ucoal ngo wa kaano atiihye ngo riha.
Yih ke ngudi, koar rihi beer mee utoor gihn me raaj me tiihye rihi. Koar rihi bang gihn ngo ngaa me raany puohny gihro.
Bekihd ngaa maa anaa acuung ke an cahng athuba ke goony nguda nyum lug. Nyoge cang ge agoohd oogo riha. Beehn Juoge wiie gihn nu piny yihr gen.
Abea Juog acuungo ke an ucube tee yihra beere Ciig Beer roma kaa puohnyo kedea ubeehn yaa padh Judea urom gene ngo ke lihngo. Juog a alwahge oogo yi dhe nguu.
Noono e ngo gaahna gaahno kejea Juog a ukonye thiow yihdh giih me reje ge poohd ne wong maalo uwahdhe ka ukedhe an Maalo yi Dhaahre. Puojo Juog ke nihn ke nihn. E noono.
Maahdh Prijkiila kedea Akwiila, maa yaa beed paar Onecipoaruj.
Erajtuj adoohng Korindh, kedea Troapihmuj awiia Mileatuj bang gihn ngo anaa atwaany.
Deed cwihnyi udhiili beehno e ruudo poohd kuu athubo. Yih amaahdh ge Yubuluj, kedea Puuden, maa Linuj kedea Klaawdyae. Yaa ayiiho cang yih amaahdh gene.
Yih ukaahn Juoge ke yoohm rihi kedea beehn Juoge ucube muunye yihri.
Titus: A Poal ubaahng Juog e gihn gweehd yihri. Jeacuu e naa aoohr an ne kahl Ciig Beer yihr yaa akwany Juoge ne yaae. Ateed Jeacuue kejea konya yaa akwany Juoge kedea unyoadha adiehj weehg gen beehdo ke dhe yoohn Juog.
Adiehj ngo beehda gaahno gihro ge gaahno kuowo me guge tooro naa anaa aceg Juoge kea ngo ucube. Ngo aceg ke coon e wiih piny kuu acag, kedea Juog be rubo ke toohd.
Ciig nu ngo anyoadh Juoge awaahn ni kaa yoohn Ciig Beer ge acube yi cinga. Ge e giih puohnya bang gihn Juog ngaa boadh nyoge e naa ateed ngo kejea puohnya gen.
Yih Tiihtuj, yih niida wa nyethiina naa anyuola ke nying gihn nahgo yaa ayiiho.
Beehn Juog Wuure kedea Jeacuu Kriihjto Ruohdh cub gene muuny mar gen kedea doohr mar gen yihri.

E naa gihn awiia yihn yi Kread, bange ne cohg giih adoohng e ge poohd kuu athum ke tiihyo. Kedea ne kwany jo doong yaa ayiiho me tiihyo yi akuud yaa ayiiho kedea ke yihdh miehr wa kaa aroba ngo yihri.

Ngaa kwanyi ne ngaa me duohng nahge ngaa me beer me gihn me raaj be rob ke nyinge, kedea nahge ngaa maa anyuom dhaago acielo cog. Nyethene thiow nahg gene yaa ayiiho. Giih me reje wa giih bad maa dhaahl ge keá tiihy gene ne weey weey kedea nahg gene yaa wuohdo.

Ngaa me duohng nyum nyoge yi tiihy akuud yaa yiiho, nahge ngaa me ree tooro awuohj, bang gihn ngo tiihy tiihy Juog, kedea padh ngad nhyaam, e padh ngaa me cwihnye be cuung ke rahnyo, me be nhyaar liny. Ngaa me be nhyaar muohl ke koongo. Ngaa me cwihnye keá cubo yi daahd giih lonyo.
Ngo beehda ngaa maa ngad wad, maa ngad muuj kedea me nhyaar nyoge. Ngo beehda ngaa me nhyaar tiihy gihn me beer kedea ree wuore wuoro. Ngo beehda ngaa me beehdo ne kew, kedea ree koare koaro.
Ngaa me duohng nyum yaa ayiiho beehda ngaa maa amag lum Juog teeg mee ke cwihnye cang wa ka puohnye, noono e lum Juog cohge kii cwihny nyoge kedea unyoadhe kaa awaahj yaa akweer ke lum Juog.

Ngaa duohng akuud yaa ayiiho dhiil beero bang gihn nyoge me thoohdh kiin yaa ayiiho ge apaahr oogo yi lum Juog, noono e nyoge dwaahng gene dwaahngo e ge rob giih me gihr nying gen tooro, adoohnge yaa koohbo kob gene yaa padh Judea thoam gen nea lum Juog ayiih gene.
Yaa nu, ge dhiil kaa cuowo bang gihn ge beehda nyoge me raany wudh yaa ayiiho ke bang yihdh miehr ke puohny gen noono. Nyoge ge puohny gene kaa giih toohd bang ukoog gen ke ngiihny.
Ngad gen ke ngude me cuohn gene naa agamloohngjuog ngo anaa arobe coon kea, “Wu yaa Kread, wu beehda yaa toohd, wu yaa alyaahb, me thow yi cam wa gihr alwango.”
Lum nu ateede nu ngo adiehr. Nea maano, kea teed ngo yihr gen kejea gihn tiihy gene ngo raaj. Cay gen beere lum Juog yiih gene yiiho beer mee keehdo.
Kedea wii gene giih Judea naa acoon piny kedea luub nyoge maa now me be daahd adiehj lum Juog ke yiiho.

Ngaa be rom cwihnye ke dwaahng yihdh giih anyoohne, gihn me rom anyoohne ke kahl ree tooro keew giih ne buude, abea kwaad nyepiny cang anyoohne rome kaa kahl rog yaa be yiih lum Juog bang wudh ge arahnyo.
Yaa nu ge urubo kejea Juog ngahy gene, abea ge tiihy giih me mahn Juoge. Toohd now, ge nyoge me reje maa awaadh kedea ge yaa dhahl Juog. Gihn me beer me rom gene ke tiihyo tooro.
Abea yihn, puohny yaa ayiiho ke puohny maa athiir.

Puohny yaa doonge unahg gene nyoge me wudh gen kwel, kedea cwihny gen nud. Ge dhiil nahg nyoge me yihr gen ne nhyaaro me teeg, maa ge ayiiho, kedea unahg gene nyoge me guum luube, nyoge me wuor rog gen.

Puohny maahn doonge thiow ke dhe yoohn beehdo me beer. Dhe yoohn maahn maa acub cwihny gen yi tiihy Juog. Rog gen keá yug gene ne yaa waaj, wale yaa nhyaar muohl ke kuong keraahyo. Puohny gene gihn me beer yihr nyoge cang.
Noono arumo unyoadh gene kaa anhyaar maahn thene cuow gen kedea nyethen.

Puohny gene maahn thene unahg gene maahn me rog gen koar gene koaro, kedea me nying gen be ne kal kal kedea miehy gen mag gene maa. Nahg gene nyoge me nhyaar tiihy gihn me beer kedea uwuor gene cuow gen. Neehn maano, e ngaa muu udhahl puohny gihro, wo yaa ayiih lum Juog, ngo utooro.
Ke yoohn nu acielo thiow, robi yihr yaa rihj unahg gene nyoge me cwihny gen nud.
Abea gihn me kaal wudh giih nu cang, nyoadh rihi yihr nyoge, ne ngad tiihy giih beeye. Kedea yi puohny gihri noono, nyoadh rihi ne ngaa me rob giih me doonge maa adiehr.
Kedea robi kaa adiehr yihr nyoge ubahnge gihn robi be dhaahr. Ne maano, e ngaa me maan yihn wiihe ulaahy bang gihn gihn me raaj maa gihr toohd me yoade rogo tooro.
Rubi thiow yihr baahng uwuor gene ruohdhe giih gen beere cwihny umihno rog gen. Ge keá peehmo.
Ge keá kwahdo, abea nyoadh gene rog gen ne nyoge me beer maa ayiih lum Juog. Tiihy baahnge ke gihn me beer cog beere lum Juog wiih ngo moar gene moaro ke nying tiihy gen noono beer nu.
Bang gihn Juog muuny gihre anyoadhe beere nyoge cang boadh wahy yoad gene yoado.

Muuny Juog wo meehge ke kweer ke giih me be daahd Juoge kedea giih meehg adhemuohme cwihnyo yuohd rog gen. Muuny Juog wo yuge yugo ne nyoge me cwihny nud, maa abiohgrwaale kedea me beehdo ke dhe yoohn daahd Juoge.
E wo ugaahno kedea e wo koar Cahng Lug. Cahng uniid teeg Juog kedea ka uduu Jeacuu Kriihjto Ngad Boadh won.
Jeacuu athow ke nyingo ne lwahg won oogo yi cing gihn me raaj kedea ne wuuny awuohje giiho oogo. Noono e naa kaa adoohngo ne nyoge maa joe me nhyaar yug giih me beeye.
Rob giih nu cang yihr nyoge. Yihri ne tee kedea tiihyi keehd teeg nu ne meehg cwihny nyoge ngahmo kedea ne cay gen nea ge awuohj. Rihi keá meehg dhahlo yihr nyoge, rubi ke rob ngaa me duohng.
Teed ngo yihr yaai giih ayiiho uyug gene giih ni: yiih gene loohng yaa mag paajo, kedea wuor gene thuy akuumo. Kony gene thuy akuumo utiihy gene gihn me beer.
Kedea ge keá rubo ke gihn me raaj rih dhaano utaahngo. Abea mag gene gom ke nyoge kedea nyoadh gene beehd beer.

Coon wo anahg abeehle me gihn maa angahyo tooro. E thiow, wo na nahg yaa dhaahl kedea wo na nahg nyoge maa leel yi gihn me raaj. Wo na nahg baahng yihr giih me thoohdh me be daahd Juoge kedea giih meehg adhemuohme cwihnyo yuohd rog gen. Wo na yug giih me reje kedea wo anahg yaa juunho me nhyaar tiihy gihn me raaj rog nyoge mooge. Nyoge na maano maano kedea wo na ke maano tiehd.
Abea Juog Ngad Boadh won, wo aboadhe naa anyoadhe beeye bang gihn ngo beehda ngaa me nhyaar nyoge cang.

Wo keá boadho kaa nying gihn me beer maa ayugo yihre, abea wo aboadhe bang gihn yea angeer ke nyingo. Wo aboadhe naa aluoge won ke piih luogwahy kedea wo aboadhe ke dhe yoohn Wahy Juog ngaa cub kuowo me nyaahn yihro.
Juog muuny ge beehda Wahy Juog ngo awiie yihr Jeacuu Kriihjto Ngad Boadh won, beere Jeacuu utiihyo ke kar wiihe nea Wahy Juog cub cubo yihro.
Bang gihn wo anhyaar Juoge keraahyo, e naa awiie Wahy Juog piny yihr Jeacuu beere kiino ne beehdo me beer keehd Juog, kedea beere kuowo gihn nyaahn e be gug yoado yoado.
A daahd yihn ucubi wiihi rog giih ni beer mee, beere yaa ayiih lum Juog cwihny gen cub gene ne tiihy giih beeye ge kony nyoge cang.
Giih nu ge giih me kony nyoge cang. Wii peehm ke nying giih me ne bihdh, wii loab tien wad me baahr me guge tooro, gihn me kony gene tooro.
Nea ngaa rubo ke rob me paahng yihdh nyoge kea cuow ngo tiel ariow cog. Nea dahg gen bere bero, kea nyiig oogo buude.
Ngahy ngo kejea kwaad ngaan nu yooh maa adiehr ngo awiie kedea adoohng ne ngaa me yug giih me reje. Ngaa maa akihm giih reje ge tiihye.
Artihmaaj wale Tiicihcuj ngo uoohra yihri. Nea dhaano acielo kiin gen ngo awahnho, e kea laar tieni ke tihngo uroohmo yi geen Nikoapolij, bang gihn a daahd unahga ruudo gihr wong kun ca.
Kony Jenaj ngaa apuohny keehd giih yi loohng kedea Apolo beere ge rom thubo ke weel gihr gen. Gwiir giih gen ne daahd gene cang.
Puohny yaao uyug gene rog gen ne nyoge me beeye. Nyoge me yoad giih daahd gene kaa kwahg me padh yaa nyaahbo. Yug gene giih beeye, ubahnge wudh gen be cub gene yihdh giih me padh.
Yih amaahdh wane cang, an maa yaa banga kan. Teed ngo yihr yaa ayiih lum Juog yaa nhyaar won, kejea ge amaahdh wane thiow. Muuny Juog beehde ke won.
Philemon: Yihri yih Pihlmon.

Warga gihn ni aay ke banga a Poal. Awaahn ni a nii thijin ke nying gihn nahga ngad batien Jeacuu Kriihjto. An kedea Timodhy ge beehda umiiho ke nying Jeacuu kedea ge beehda ngad akuud yaa yiiho yih amaahdh wane. Yih beehda gom wan me ne cohg yi tiihj ke nying Jeacuu wa kwaad gihn tiihy wane.
Apya ge beehda nyemiiho ke nying Jeacuu maa ayiiho, ngo amaahdh wane, kedea Arkiihpo ge cuung tiehd ke won yi puohny Ciig Beer maa akuud yaa yiiho ge kway Juog paari ge amaahdh wane thiow.
Beehn Juog Wuur kedea Jeacuu Kriihjto Ruohdh cub gene muuny kedea doohr yihri.
A beehd kaa muohj koohr Juog e wuora nea a ukwahyo ke nyingi.
Koohr Juog muohja muohjo bang gihn ngo alihnga bang nyoge kejea yih poohd kaahn dhe yoohn ayiihi lum Jeacuu Ruohdho kedea yaa ayiih lum Juog ge nhyaari nhyaaro.
A ukwahyo kejea nhyaahro gihn nhyaari yaa ayiiho ge adoohng ne ge wuud miihu kedea ge nyemiihu ke nying Jeacuu yih meehg nhyaahr nu dead yihdh giih beeye cang ge acub Juoge yihro ke nying Jeacuu.
Cwihnya med keraahyo kedea cwihnya ameehgi ngahmo ke nying nhyaahro gihri kedea ke nying kony ge konyi yaa ayiiho.
Nea maano yih be maa ne tiihy gihn daahda utiihyi ngo keehd me nud tee maa acub Jeacuue yihra me maa yihn ne tiihy gihn daahda.

Abea ke nying nhyaahro gihn ayoado bang Jeacuu e ne kwaya wongi beere ngo tiihyi tiihyo. Wongi akwaya, a Poal ge beehda ukiihj e amag yi thijin ke nying puohny lum Jeacuu Kriihjto, kejea konyi Onecimuj. Ge anaa yi thijin e ngo akonya udoohnge ne ngad yiiho noono uroome wa nyethiin yeya.

Abea ke nying nhyaahro gihn ayoado bang Jeacuu e ne kwaya wongi beere ngo tiihyi tiihyo. Wongi akwaya, a Poal ge beehda ukiihj e amag yi thijin ke nying puohny lum Jeacuu Kriihjto, kejea konyi Onecimuj. Ge anaa yi thijin e ngo akonya udoohnge ne ngad yiiho noono uroome wa nyethiin yeya.
Umodho ngo kuu anahg ngaa me ree ne koany yihri ke nying gihn anaa agoohde oogo rihi, abea awaahn ni ngo adoohng ne ngaa me ree ne koany yihro cang.
Onecimuj ge anhyaara wa nyethiin yeya, e aman oohra bangi.
Abea keehd maano e a daahd ngo ubeehde keehd an ka poohde e a nii thijin ke nying gihn nahga ngad batien Jeacuu Kriihjto. A anaa adaahd ngo uluunye kari ne kony an.
Abea a be daahd ubeehde kan nea padh yih naa ayiiho. Ke dhe yoohn ni, nea gihn daahda ngo atiihyi, e ngo atiihyi bang gihn yih ne daahd ngo ke tiihyo, kedea padh thiel e naa athiel yihn ne tiihy ngo.
Ka moogo e Juog e naa ameehg Onecimuj goohd oogo rihi unahge nihn oogo beere nea ngo uduuo e be cahg aay ne weey weey.

Bang gihn ge uduue bangi, e ngo buu unahg ubaahng maa now abea unahg wado ke nying gihn ayiihe lum Jeacuu. Onecimuj beehda ngaa maa anhyaara, abea ngo ngahya kejea ngo unhyaari keter me neehn kaano nahge ubaahngi kedea ngad yiiho nu.
Noono nea yih apahro ke nyinga kejea wo nyoge maa yaa tiihj acielo, kea lor Onecimuj beer mee wa ke ne lori an.
Nea Onecimuj awuohj ayuge rihi wale nea gihn me koohnyi ree nud e kea koohnyi ke an.

Gihn ni beehda an ne gweede ke cinga: A Poal, kwaad gihn daahdi bang Onecimuj ngo ucoala yihri. Abea wiihi keá wul kejea yih be koohnya. Yih koohnya koohnyo bang gihn dhe yoohn beehdo beer ge ayoadi ngo ayoadi ke banga naa ayuga yihn udoohngi ne ngad Jeacuu.
Nea kare nud kea tiihy gihn kwaya yihri yih umiiha ke nying ruohdh. Tiihy gihn kwaya bang gihn wo beehda yaa batien Jeacuu.
Keehd man gweehda yihri ni, e ngo beehde ngahya kejea gihn akwaya yihri ngo utiihyi adhaahr ukaali wiihe.
Gihn moogo me daahda ke robo yihri nud. Gwiir kar beehdo yihra, bang gihn ngo gaahna gaahno kejea Juog wiih kwaj gihru ngo uduue umeehge an lony oogo yi thijin, ne ci ne liew wun keehdo.
Eparuj wu amaahdhe, ngo nii thijin banga ke nying gihn tiihye ke nying Jeacuu Kriihjto.
Thiow Maarko, Arijtarkuj, Demaj kedea Luka ge tiihy ke an, yi puohny Ciig Beer wu amaahdh gene.
Beehn Ruohdho Jeacuu Kriihjte cube muunye yihru cang.
Hebrews: Wu jo wan ge ayiih lum Juog! Ngo beehda gihn me ngahj. Coon Juog na urubo yihr yaa agamloohngjuog ne rob yihr ge kuowo. Noono ubeehn yaa agamloohngjuoge urob gene giih daahd Juoge ke robo yihr nyoge ke dhog yiehdhe me thoohdh.
Abea awaahn ni, naa adaahd Juoge ngo urobe gug loohnge giihe e dhaano aoohre. Ngaan nu cuohn e Waahd Juog. Waahd Juog e naa akwany Juoge ne cub yihdh giihe kedea umeehge ngo cag maalo ge ke piny.

Bang gihn Waahd Juog tee mare room kaa mar Juog, e naa gihn beehn nyepinye uwuor gene leebe kedea ubeehd gene kaa dhe yoohn beehd acub Juoge yihr gen. Waahd Juog gihn acielo ni, e naa agwiir doohr kiin Juog ke won. Doohr ayuge kiino naa anahge ne gihr remo me luog won beere dhe yoohn ci Paar Juog ke yoado. Naa athume ke tiihy gihn acub Juoge yihre, e ngo ado Paar Juog kaa alore yea ucube wiih koom ruohdh ukwiihy Juog.
Waahd Juog wiihe ne maalo yihr wuohdjuog bang gihn nying waahdo, e acub Juoge yihre, be room ke nying man cuohn ne ngad wuohdo. Nying waahdo yihre ne leej me duohng yihr man cuohn ne wuohdo.
Coon, Juog yaay me duohng anaa ayuge ne cub alaam kwaar yihr ngaa me duohng me mag paajo ke nyinge. Wuohdjuog ge anudo thiow. Kob Juoge yihr ngaan ucube alaam kwaar yihr ngo kea,
“Me neehn cahng tihn yih naa ngaan ngahya
naa acuba yaa alaam kwaar ne mag yaa upiny ke nyinga.
A daahd nyoge cang ungahy gene ngo
kejea giih tiihyi ge beehda giih aroba yihri.”
Ea yi lum nu acaadhu beer, ne wuohdjuog maa arub Juoge yihre kejea alaam kwaar acube yihr ngo ne mag yaa upiny ne? Bekihde! Juog kuu akuong rob wa gihn nu!
Gihn arob Juoge cahng acube alaamo anaa agweed yi kitaab. Akob Juoge kea,
“Kihd gihn akob naa wuohnjuog wuore ngaa acuba alaam kwaar yihre
bang gihn beehda ngaa me duohng nyume.”
Gihn arob Juoge ke nying wuohdjuog agweed yi kitaab Juog. Arob Juoge kea,
“Wuohdjuog ge acaga ne wuor an kedea beere ge laara kaa oohro.”
Abea maa arob Juoge ke nying Waahd Juog ngo agweed thiow yi kitaab. Akob Juoge kea,
“Gihn me kahl alaamo oogo yi ngahyi tooro
kedea yih beehda ngaa me nyoge ngahyi kaa maa beer mee.
Yih ngaa maa abiohgrwaal.
Ngaa me nhyaar tiihy gihn me beer
kedea me maan tiihy gihn me raaj.
Ke nying gihn nahgi ngaa maa abiohgrwaal
e naa gihn akwanya yihn ucuba alaamo yihri ne mag yaa upiny ke nyinga.
Cahng akwanya yihn yaa wuohdjuog cwihny gen amihno cang
kedea upuoj gene yihn keraahyo.”
Anaa agweed yi kitaab kejea
Juog arubo yihr Ruohdh alaamo thiow kea,
“Anahg yihn naa acag maalo ge ke piny umodho coon.
Cahng gug piny, maalo ge ke piny
ge utooro unahge yihn nuu udoohng,
bang gihn gihn muu ujag yihn utooro.”
Cahng gug piny, maalo ge ke piny
ge utooro unahge yihn nuu udoohng,
bang gihn gihn muu ujag yihn utooro.”
Juog anaa akuong rob cahng acielo yihr wuohnjuog neehn maa anaa arube yihr Waahd Juog kea,
“Piihi ukwiihya kan wiih koom ruohdh uwahdhe ka utaaya yaa mahni?”
Bekihde! Juog kuu arubo wa gihn nu yihr wuohnjuog. Bang gihn wuohdjuog ge ne oohr bang yaa daahd Juog uboadhe wahy gen.
Nea kare e wudho dhiilo kaa cub piny awaahn ni ne lihng luub ateed yihro, beere wo be cidh ke dhe yooh me raaj.
Ngo ngahy nyoge kejea ngaa be tiihyo ke loohng Moaje e ngaan nu kihm jo doonge kihmo ke gihn me raaj.
Wa gihn nu thiow e wo ukihm ke gihn me raaj nea lum arob ke nying boadh wahy adhaahro. Jeacuu anaa arubo ke nying boadh wahy kedea udog yaa alihng ngo bange ngo ke bero yihro.

Juog, ne nyoadh ngo kejea yaa alihng giih arob Jeacuue ge rob adiehr, e yaa nu ge ameehge yug giih me gaahy nyoge. Thiow ne nyoadh ngo kejea yaa arob giih alihng gene bang Jeacuu ge rob adiehr, e Juog, tee Wahy Juog ameehge yoado yihr gen beere yihdh giih arob Jeacuue ge kwaan gene kwaano beer mee.
Awaahn ni cwihnya ne rob yihru ke nying upiny gihn ubeedo cahng moogo. Yaa unahg ruohdh alaam kwaar upiny nu ge buu unahg ge wuohdjuog.
Bang gihn ngo agweed yi kitaab Wahy Apoong Juog kejea unahg dhaano utaahngo e nuu unahg ruohdh alaam kwaar. Kaa agweede kii ngo e man,
“Juog Ruohdh yih beer ke wan.
Wa anhyaari ne cohg keehd me toor gihr nying wane.
Wiih piny beed wane awaahn ni,
wuohdjuog ge acagi
kedea unahge teeg gen e ne duohng rih mar wan.
Abea wa acahgi ke cwaahngo naa amoari wudh wan,
bang gihn ayugi wan ne ruohdh nyepinye cang
upiny gihn ubeed wane cahng moogo.”

Jo paar wan! A daahd udeadu yi lum ni agweed. Ge anaa akoohb Juoge kejea nahgo ruohdh nyepinye cang, Juog adaahd ngo ubeehn giih nyepinye cang ulihng gene lumo. Yaage! Wudhu paru paro kejea cahng uyug Juoge won ne ruohdh alaam kwaar ka moogo e Juog giih mooge ge ukoye oogo utoor gene yi ruohdh gihro? Bekihde! Abea me neehn awaahn kan, wo padh ruohdhe bang gihn alaam kwaar poohd kuu acub yihro.

Abea keehd me poohde e alaam kwaar kuu acub yihro, e Juog abar maalo ke gwiihro gihre neehn kaa aniido ngo rih Jeacuu. Jeacuu, ge anaa abeehde upiny, e ngo anahg dhaano now me wuohnjuog duohng yihre. Abea awaahn ni batien kaa acahre e Jeacuu wiihe amoar Juoge ucube alaam kwaar yihr ngo ne ngaa mag wiih piny ke nyinge. Alaamo acub Juoge yihre bang gihn ngo abeehn upiny kaa ayoade raahm kuohm kedea uthowe ke nyingo wa kaa adaahd Juoge ngo. Awaahn ngo acub Juoge wiih koom ukwiihye.

Juog ge acage giih nyepinye cang kedea ge e ne muodh gen adaahd dhe yooh me cidho ne beehdo keehde Paare ge amiihr. Ke nying gihn nu e naa abeehn Juoge umeehge Jeacuu yoad raahm kuohm ne waad awiidh ne kedh yaa ayoad boadh wahy Paar Juog.

Beehda Jeacuu e ne meehg won nhyaaro yihr Juog. Gihn nu rome kaa tiihyo yihro, bang gihn ree ayuge uroome ke won ge acag Juoge. E naa gihn cuohne won ne wuud men bang gihn, athiir muon, wo beehda wuud men. Ngo ngahyo kejea ngaa acub Juoge alaamo yihre wo cuohne e ge wuud men bang gihn gihn anaa ateede, ge anaa amihn cwihnye, ngo agweed yi kitaab Wahy Apoong Juog.
Agweed kejea ngaa acub Juoge alaamo yihre cwihnye med ge cuohne won ne ci ne wuor Juog. E naa ka ngahyo ngo noono kejea Jeacuu wo cuohne e ge wuud men.
Agweed thiow kejea ngaa acub Juoge alaamo yihre akoohbo kejea ngo ubeehdo tiehd ke wuud men ge beehda nyethea Juog.
Nyethea Juog ge robe, ge beehda nyoge maa anyuol ke dhaano utaahnge. Jeacuu uroomo ke yaa nu. Adoohng ne dhaano utaahngo beere nea ngo uthoo e dhe yooh yoade yoado me taaye atiihb ukeehg.

Jeacuu abeehno beere e naa ngaa meehg won, ge wuud men, cahro batien thoo. Wo meehge cahro kaa dhe yoohn kaa anaa acahre naa athowe. Ngo ngahyo kejea wo beehda nyoge maa agweed yi thoo bang gihn atiihb ukeehg e ne meehg won tudo yi thoo. E naa gihn ubeehdo e wo utudo yi thoo.
Kuu aniido! Jeacuu abeehn ne boadh won ge ayiiho lum Juog neehn Abraahm! Kuu abeehn ne boadh wuohdjuog!

Adiehr muon ngo abeehn ne boadh won ke nying gihn nu e naa adoohnge ne dhaano uroome ke won ge wuud men. Jeacuu yea angeer naa aniide ngoohng nyingo. Kaano e naa adoohnge ne Ngaa duohng yaa lam yihr Juog ke nyingo beere anyoohne giiho ge wii Juoge ke piny.

Ngo ngahyo kejea Jeacuu yihre ne tee me cube yihro me meehg won kweer ke yug giih anyoohne. Ne cohg giih meehg won pahdh yihdh giih anyoohne ge ngahye bang gihn e ke ngude kwaad giih nu ge anaa ayoade.
Nea neehn maano e kea paru wudhu yaage, wu ge beeye e akwany Juoge ne joe. A daahd uparu wudhu ke nying Jeacuu Kriihjto ngaa aoohr Juoge ne ngaa kony won yi yiiho gihro ne kedh won paar Juog.
Jeacuu atiihyo yihr Juog ngaa akwany ngo ke cwihnye acielo, neehn tiihy atiihy Moaje ke cwihnye acielo naa akwany Juoge ngo ne lwahg yaa Yijarael oogo Micihr.

Gahng ke tien paajo me kuu athubo rih dhaano kedea gahng ke gihn me kuu athubo rih Juog. Ngaa athub dhe wod wiihe e ne nyinge wiihj kiin yaa dhe wod nu cang, wa gihn nu thiow, e nying Jeacuu awiihj ukaale wiih Moaje.

Gahng ke tien paajo me kuu athubo rih dhaano kedea gahng ke gihn me kuu athubo rih Juog. Ngaa athub dhe wod wiihe e ne nyinge wiihj kiin yaa dhe wod nu cang, wa gihn nu thiow, e nying Jeacuu awiihj ukaale wiih Moaje.

Moaje atiihyo ke cwihnye acielo nyum Juog ne lwahg yaa Yijarael oogo Micihr. Bang gihn Moaje atiihyo ke cwihnye acielo ne lwahg yaa Yijarael, e naa gihn bahnge Juog cwihnye kuu adiiw rih ngo kedea Moaje, e naa ngaan na rob ciig na beehn Juoge ne robo yihr nyoge. Abea keehd maano, e ngo anahg ngaa maa anaa akwany Juoge now yi tiihj.

Abea Jeacuu Ngad Boadh nyoge kuu ake kwanyo yi tiihj bang gihn beehda Waahd Juog. Juog cwihnye diiw ree ke ne diih, abea en ne wiihe ne paajo ngaa athub dhe wode ree? Wo beehda yaa dhe wod paan nu. Abea gihn nud, dhe yoohn gaahno gihro maa tee cwihnyo ge ne meehg Juog nweehd ke won unahgo yaa dhe wod nu.
Wa kaano anahge Jeacuu e ne wiihe ne paajo nu, e naa gihn arob Wahy Juoge ngo kea,
“Nea duone alihngu awaahn ni e urubo,
e wudhu keá ciehgu ukweeru ke lihng lum Juog neehn mar ge kuowu
ge cwihny gen anaa abeehn ne daag
ugoohg gene ke guum giih anaa atum Juoge gen
yi waahdh anaa aay gene Micihr.
Noono ge anaa akweer ke lum Juog.”
Wa kaano anahge Jeacuu e ne wiihe ne paajo nu, e naa gihn arob Wahy Juoge ngo kea,
“Nea duone alihngu awaahn ni e urubo,
e wudhu keá ciehgu ukweeru ke lihng lum Juog neehn mar ge kuowu
ge cwihny gen anaa abeehn ne daag
ugoohg gene ke guum giih anaa atum Juoge gen
yi waahdh anaa aay gene Micihr.
Noono ge anaa akweer ke lum Juog.”
Thiow Juog arubo kea,
“Ge kuowu naa acoon
keehd maa anaa aniid gene kuny gihn anaa akonya gen ke run jiehariow,
e poohd dahng e ge akweer ke luma.
En naa gihn arahny cwihnya rog gen
noono ungeya wiiha oogo
kejea ge beehda nyoge me wudh gen teeg,
maa akweer ke lihng luma.
Noono e cwihnya anaa arahnyo keraahyo
ungweela ngo piny yihr gen
kejea bekihd ngaa muu ucuba laahw wihj yihre.”
Jo paar wan, cubu wudhu piny beer mee, beere gahng ke dhaano kiinu me doohng ne ngaa me raaj ukweere ke yiih lum Juog ke cwihnye acielo, caahn e dhe yoohn Paar Juog urwaahnyo yihre.
Nea wu daahd ngo ubahnge dhaano kiinu be pahdh yi utum ukweere ke yiih lum Juog, e kea nahgu nyoge me kony rogu ke nying nihn uyoadu giih kwaan yi kitaab Juog.
Wo unweehd tiehd keehd Ngad Boadh nyoge nea wo ubeehdo beer mee ke yiiho yi cwihnyo wa kaa anaa umodho e adoohngo ne jo yiiho.
Ngo agweed yi kitaab Juog naa,
“Nea duon Juog alihngu awaahn ni,
e wudhu keá ciehgu
wa kwaad gihn anaa ayug ge kuowu coon
naa akweer ke yiih lum Juog.”
Nea maru, anahg yaa kee ge naa anaa aciehg wudh gen ukweer gene ke lihng lum Juog? Yaa nu beehda yaa Yijarael giih anaa alwahg Moaje oogo ke yoohn Micihr.
E thiow, Juog cwihnye anaa abeehn ne rahnyo ke rog yaa weehne yihdh run nu jiehariow? Cwihnye anaa arahnyo ke rog yaa anaa atiihy anyoohne ubeehn gene ne thoo cang yi ukang.
Dahng e naa akuohng Juoge ree kea, “Laahw wihj gihn naa cubo yihr gen buu ucahg gene ke yoado.” Juog anaa arubo kaa nying jo kee? Juog anaa arubo kaa nying yaa aciehg wudh gen ukweer gene ke lume.
Wa kaano aniido ngo laahw wihj gihn cub Juoge kuu ayoad gene bang gihn wudh gen aciehg gene ukweer gene ke Juog.
Nea neehn maano e kare nud yihro uyoado laahw wihj gihn anaa ateed Juoge kejea ngo ucube. Ke nying gihn nu keá cubo wudho piny utoor ngaa me daar ke laahw wihj.
Ciig Beer anaa apuohny yihr yaa Moaje wa kaa apuohnye yihro, abea keehd maano e gihn me beer maa ayoad gene ke nying puohny nu tooro, bang gihn giih apuohny ge kuu ayiih gene naa athere.
Abea wo ge ayiiho, laahw wihj gihn ateed Juoge ngo uyoado, neehn kaa ateede ngo kea,
“Cwihnya anaa arahnyo ukuohnga riha
kejea laahw wihj gihn ateeda kejea ucuba yihr gen,
ngo buu uyoad gene.
Ngo buu uyoad gene
bang gihn giih apuohny yihr gen kuu ayiih gene.”
Lum ni arob Juoge batien kaa anaa athume ke cag giih nyepinye.
Gihn nu, beehde ngo agweed yi kitaab Juog, kejea Juog wiihe anaa adoohng laahw yi beriown nihn naa athume ke cag nyepinye.
Laahw wihj thiow nyoge anaa agweehdo ke nyinge neehn kaa ateeda ngo umodho kaa,
“Laahw wihj gihn ateeda kejea ucuba yihr gen,
ngo buu uyoad gene.”
Yaa alihng Ciig Beer umodho, laahw wihj kuu anaa ayoad gene bang gihn giih apuohny yihr gen kuu ayiih gene. Abea awaahn ni unud ke nyoge muu uyiih Ciig Beer ubeehn Juoge umeehge gen yoad laahw wihj.

Gihn nyoadh ngo kejea Juog laahw wihj ucube yihr nyoge mooge, beehda gihn poohde e maahny bango uwahnhe cahng tihn. Juog Deabid anaa ameehge rob coon, neehn kaa ateeda umodho kejea ngo agweed yi kitaab Juog naa,
“Nea duon Juog lihngu lihngo me neehn tihn noon ni,
e wudhu keá ciehgu ukweeru ke lume.”
Nea Jocwa laahw wihj gihn ateed Juoge nea cubo e gihn e beehn Juoge uwiie won uwahdhe cahng tihn e maahny bango now?
Nea neehn maano, e Juog yaa ayiih lume laahw wihj poohd uyoad gene, wa kaa anaa abeehn Juoge ne yoad laahw wihj yi beriown nihn batien kaa acage nyepinye.
Kwaad ngaa yoad laahw wihj gihn ateed Juoge, e ngaan nu tiihj me ne yihre keehdo tooro wa kaa anaa adoohng wiih Juoge laahw batien cag nyepinye.
Kea noono arumo dhiilo cwihnyo ke deedo beere wo be daar ke laahw wihj.
Lum Juog umono ke rih dhaano umore kuohm ngo cang ne ngey kaa ayiih dhaane lum Juog kii ngo, wale ka beehde e lum Juog tooro yi cwihnye.
Gihn me rome ke kano yihr Juog tooro. Kwaad giih acage cang upiny ge uneehno yihre ne dahr. Noono, e kwaad gihn tiihyo ne dug dhiilo kaa nyoadho yihre.
Wa maano, e yiiho naa ayoado dhiilo kaa maa beer mee, bang gihn Jeacuu Ruohdh e naa Ngaa Duohng yaa lam gihro nyum Juog. Ngo amoon wong maalo bang Juog ne kway Juog ke nyingo.

Ngahyo kejea ngaa duohng gihro kare tooro ubahnge yea be ngeer ke nying gihn be cuungo ke pahdh yihdh giih anyoohne. Adiehr ngaa duohng anaa akuong atiihb ukeehge ke tumo kea e dwaahng ngo neehn man dwaahnge nyoge, abea ngo agoohg utoor awuohj maa atiihye.
Noono, wudho keá laahy ne cidho bang Jeacuu, ge Ngaa Duohng ne kway muuny Juog bange. Bang gihn Jeacuu e naa ngaan muoj won ke muuny Juog wa ka daahdo.
Juog beehde kwaad ngaa duohng yaa lam giih kweehr kwahnye oogo ke kiin nyoge ne tiihj yihr Juog ke nying paajo. Giih kweehr nahge ke piny ne waaj Juog uwiie anyoohne giih nyoge piny yihr gen.

Ngaa duohng, bang gihn ge nahge dhaano, e ngo pahdh yihdh anyoohne thiow wa mar nyoge maa now. Abea keehd maano e nyoge mooge me kwihj nyepinye kedea maa apahdh yihdh anyoohne, cwihny gen rome kaa ciihmo ucohge gen udoohng gene ne nyoge me beeye.
Ngaa duohng dhiile giih kweehr ke nah piny, padh ke nying anyoohne giih nyoge cog abea ke nying anyoohne muue thiow.
Bahng ngaa me teed ngo kea, “Wiiha atihnga maalo uyuga riha ne ngaa duohng.” Abea Juog e keede e ne rom dhaano kwanyo ne ngaa duohng, wa kaa anaa akwanye Aaron coon.
Ree anaa ayuge yihr Ngad Boadh nyoge neehn gihn ni thiow. Ngad Boadh nyoge wiihe keá naa atihng maalo urube kea,
“Riha uyuga ne Ngaa Duohng.”
Abea anahg Juog e naa ateed ngo yihre kedea ugweede yi kitaab Juog ke nying Ngad Boadh nyoge naa,
“Yih beehda waahda kedea me neehn cahng tihn a beehda Wuru.”
Juog arubo thiow ka moogo yi kitaab Juog kea,
“Yih unahg Ngaa Duohng wa kaa anahg Melkiijideg ngaa duohng yaa lam.”
Abea tiihyi, e nahgi Ngaa Duohng, guge utooro.

Kaa anaa abeehd Jeacuue wiih piny kan, e ngo anaa akwahyo ke cwihnye cang e duone atihnge maalo yihr Juog bang umeehge ngo cahro nea ngo uthoo. Ke nying gihn nu akwahye yihr Juog ke gaahno yi cwihnye kedea e lum arob Juoge e naa adaahde ke tiihyo, e naa gihn abeehn Juoge ulihnge kwaj gihr Jeacuu.
Keehd maa anahg Jeacuue Waahd Juog, e ka wuor Juog kii ngo abeehne ne ngahyo kaa dhe yoohn raahm kuohm naa ayoade.
Naa athum Jeacuue cang ke yug tiihy anaa tiihye wiih piny utoor gihn moogo me tiihye, e nyoge cang ge adoohng e dhe yoohn boadh wahy yoad gene kaa nyinge.
Maa arub Juog Ruohdhe yihre kea, “Yih naa Ngaa Duohng yaa lam wa mar Melkiijideg.”

Yihra ne luube me thoohdh me daahda ke gweedo ke nying ka nahg Jeacuue Ngaa Duohng yaa lam wa mar Melkiijideg. Abea dhe yooh me beer me roma gen ke teedo yihru kaa yoado bang gihn gihn rob lum yea be laaru ke deedo.

Awaahn ni, wu anaa awahdh ka me romu nyoge mooge ke puohnyo. Abea ne kee e wu poohd daahd nyoge me puohny wun ke giih umodho e rubo ke nying lum Juog. Wu uroomo wa nyethen me dhoohdho me ge poohd be cahmo ke cam yaa doonge.
Wu uroomo wa nyepelaal e dhoohdho e kwihj keew giih me beeye kedea giih me reje.
Nahgu nyoge me doonge ge rom keew giih me beeye kedea giih me reje ke ngahyo.

Kea noono logo giih umodho ge anaa apuohny yihro ke nying lum Juog ngahdho bang gihn ge giih me ngahyo. Baro maalo ne dead yi lum Juog ge nyaahn ge rob ngo kejea Ngad Boadh nyoge akwany ne Ngaa Duohng yaa lam. Wo keá do yi muudh abeedo e lum Juog kuu ayoado. Kare tooro uriiho kaa duohr anyoohne giiho, noono e lum Juog yiiho kaa nying gihn abaadh yihdho.
Cwihnyo tooro bange unahge ke muoj wihj maa muuny Juog kedea cahro batien thoo kedea cahng ukihm Juog ge ne cahg ke bero ne puohnyo yihro cog.
Nea beehda gihn maa anhyaar Juoge, e wo ubar maalo ne dead yi lum Juog ge rob ngo kejea Jeacuu akwany ne Ngaa Duohng yaa lam.

Baro maalo ke dead yi lum Juog bang gihn nud ke gihn me raaj me yoad won wa mar yaa apaahr oogo rih Juog. Yaaj mooge kiino ge upaahr oogo rih Juog ukweer gene ke lum Juog, keehd maa anaa ayahb wudh gene uyiih gene ke lum Juog kedea ungahy gene giih beeye ge yoad bang Juog, maa ukony Wahy Juoge gen.
Yaaj anudo me cwihny gen amedo ke cahng alihng gene lum Juog. Yaaj me ngahy giih doonge ge poohd ne wong maalo.

Kwaad yaa nu keehd me ngahy gene giih nu, nea ge paahr oogo rih Juog ukweer gene ke lume, e ngo uteeg rog gen. Dhe yooh muu urom gene cwihny gen ke duu caahn utooro uwii Juoge anyoohne giih gen piny, bang gihn ge nyoge maa akweer ke yiih ngo kejea Jeacuu athow kaa nying gen. Gihn nu e ge adoohng ne nyoge maa adog Jeacuu ke gur wiih yaadh maa ariihw keehdo.

Kwaad yaa paahr oogo rih Juog ge uroomo ke puohdho me keehd me cwii kodh wa gihn e beehda moodho cog e ne tuuy. Kwaad puohdh nu tiihj ke ne diih? Nea kare, e moodho gihn adoongo yea dhiil kaa waango. Wa maano thiow, e yaa nu ge ukihm Juog. Abea yaa bar maalo ke dead yi lum Juog ge uroomo ke puohdho me kodh acwii yea ubeehn giih nyepinye ucieg gene beer mee.

Kwaad yaa paahr oogo rih Juog ge uroomo ke puohdho me keehd me cwii kodh wa gihn e beehda moodho cog e ne tuuy. Kwaad puohdh nu tiihj ke ne diih? Nea kare, e moodho gihn adoongo yea dhiil kaa waango. Wa maano thiow, e yaa nu ge ukihm Juog. Abea yaa bar maalo ke dead yi lum Juog ge uroomo ke puohdho me kodh acwii yea ubeehn giih nyepinye ucieg gene beer mee.
Abea keehd maa atoohna wun kejea ukihm Juog nud wa kaa agweeda kan, wu goma, e ngo ngahya kejea wu dhiil Juoge kaa boadho, bang gihn ayiihu lume.
Juog wu ngahye ke nying tiihy beer naa ayugu kedea nhyaahro gihru naa ayugu yihre, wa kwaad kaano beehdu kaa kony yaa ayiiho.
Adaahd ngo ubeehn kwaad dhaane cang kiinu udeede cwihnye uwahdhe cahng thoo, beere kwaad giih lamu ke cwihnyu bang Juog ge pahdh kar gen.
A be daahd ngo unahgu yaa nyaahbo, adaahd ukwanyu batien yaa anaa abuohj ke guum yi yiiho gihr gen uwahdhe kaa ayoad gene muuny Juog.
Ge anaa akoohb Juoge kejea gihn muu uyuge yihr Abraahm nud, e ree anaa akuohnge kea,
“Abraahm, yih adooja.
Yihri unaa kwaayi me thoohdh.
Nea gihn nu be yuga yugo yihri,
e a padh Juog Aciehg.”
Ge anaa akoohb Juoge kejea gihn muu uyuge yihr Abraahm nud, e ree anaa akuohnge kea,
“Abraahm, yih adooja.
Yihri unaa kwaayi me thoohdh.
Nea gihn nu be yuga yugo yihri,
e a padh Juog Aciehg.”
Abraahm kuu anaa adhaahr ke koar, uwahdhe kaa abeehn Juog umuoje ngo ke nyethen.
Dhaano utaahngo ree kuohnge kaa Juog ne nyoadh ngo kejea lume beehda adiehr me be cahge ke waaro.
Juog ree anaa akuohnge ne nyoadh ngo ne dahr yihr yaa aluuny yi dooj gihn acube yihr Abraahm kejea lume be waare.
Ateed Juog kedea ukuohnge ree kea lume be waar ree bang gihn ngo be rubo ke toohd. Noono, e wo yaa agoohd bange ne boadh rogo, ngeyo ngo kejea adiehr gihn gaahno bang Juog dhiile kaa cub yi cwihnyo.

Gihn gaahno, gihn ateed Juoge kea ngo uyuge, e ne meehg cwihnyo doohng teeg utoor gihn me lwag yea. Gihn gaahno ngo dhiilo kaa yoado bang gihn Jeacuu amoono wong maalo bang Juog ne rob ke nyingo. Ngo amoono ka me cahng ke Juog ka me ngo be neehn yihro. Adiehr muon, Jeacuu ngo Ngaa Duohng yaa lam me guge tooro wa mar Melkiijideg ge anahg Ngaa Duohng yaa lam naa acoon.

Gihn gaahno, gihn ateed Juoge kea ngo uyuge, e ne meehg cwihnyo doohng teeg utoor gihn me lwag yea. Gihn gaahno ngo dhiilo kaa yoado bang gihn Jeacuu amoono wong maalo bang Juog ne rob ke nyingo. Ngo amoono ka me cahng ke Juog ka me ngo be neehn yihro. Adiehr muon, Jeacuu ngo Ngaa Duohng yaa lam me guge tooro wa mar Melkiijideg ge anahg Ngaa Duohng yaa lam naa acoon.

Melkiijideg anahg ruohdh Calem lum yea ‘Ruohdh Adoohr Paajo.’ E Melkiijideg lum yea beehda ‘Abiohgrwaal.’ Thiow, ngo anahg Ngaa Duohng yaa lam me lum Juog amage ke cwihnye ne cohg. Abraahm anaa abeehn ne riem batien ruohdh maa apeej waahd umen me nyinge Lod. Waahd umen anaa apeej yi liny maa naa ataaj ruohdh beehde yi dhaahre. Gihn nu e Abraahm ge adoohde upahe gen oogo maa ataaje gen. Yi duu aduu Abraahme e bange alihng Melkiijidege ulore ngo. Melkiijideg abeehn ne yor piih piny rih Abraahm ne dooj ngo. Yihr Judea kwaad giih nud yihr dhaano e goan gen cub piny ne kur Juog. Abraahm yihdh giih anaa apeej ge alwahge e muu ne cub piny ne kur Juog ge acube yihr Melkiijideg bang gihn ngo anahg Ngaa Duohng yaa lam yihr Juog.

Melkiijideg anahg ruohdh Calem lum yea ‘Ruohdh Adoohr Paajo.’ E Melkiijideg lum yea beehda ‘Abiohgrwaal.’ Thiow, ngo anahg Ngaa Duohng yaa lam me lum Juog amage ke cwihnye ne cohg. Abraahm anaa abeehn ne riem batien ruohdh maa apeej waahd umen me nyinge Lod. Waahd umen anaa apeej yi liny maa naa ataaj ruohdh beehde yi dhaahre. Gihn nu e Abraahm ge adoohde upahe gen oogo maa ataaje gen. Yi duu aduu Abraahme e bange alihng Melkiijidege ulore ngo. Melkiijideg abeehn ne yor piih piny rih Abraahm ne dooj ngo. Yihr Judea kwaad giih nud yihr dhaano e goan gen cub piny ne kur Juog. Abraahm yihdh giih anaa apeej ge alwahge e muu ne cub piny ne kur Juog ge acube yihr Melkiijideg bang gihn ngo anahg Ngaa Duohng yaa lam yihr Juog.

Abea keehd maano e Melkiijideg ngaa maa anahg ngad lam giih kweehr yi tien paar gen ngo atooro bang gihn tien paan cuohn ne paar Leabi ge naa yaa doohng ne yaa lam. Thiow cahng anyuole kedea run anahge Ngaa Duohng ge kwihj. Ke nying gihn nu e ne kobe kejea Melkiijideg adoohng wa abeehdo e ngo Ngaa Duohng wa mar Waahd Juog e beehda Ngaa Duohng ne naang.
Melkiijideg anahg ngaa me duohng ne cohg. Maany kaa acub Abraahme kur Juog yihre yihdh giih alwahge naa ataaye ruohdhe yi liny. Abraahm ge beehda kuowo me duohng.
Yihdh loohng giih acub Juoge yihr Moaje, tiihy ngad lam giih kweehr acube yihr yaa Leabi
Melkiijideg padh ngad Leabi abea giih cub piny yihr Juog ge akaabe bang Abraahm uyore piih piny ne dooj Abraahm. Abraahm ge anaa ateed Juoge lume kejea ngo udhiile ke doojo.
Ngaa e ne duohng? Ngaa yor piih piny ne dooj wale ngaa yor piih piny ree? Beehda ngaa yor piih piny rih dhaano e ne duohng.

Yaa lamo tien paar yaa Leabi ge beehda nyoge maa now me nea cahng thon gen abeehno e ge uthoo. Abea mar Melkiijideg ge akaab giih Juog bang Abraahm, ngaa me ngahy ngo kejea ngo athow tooro wa kaa agweede yi kitaab Juog.

Ge anaa aroohm Melkiijidege keehd Abraahm e Leabi apoohd e ngo kuu nyuol. Nea wa gihn nu e nyoadh ngo kejea Leabi giih Juog acube yihr Melkiijideg ka nahge Abraahm ge duohng ree e naa acubo giih Juog yihr Melkiijideg.

Ge anaa aroohm Melkiijidege keehd Abraahm e Leabi apoohd e ngo kuu nyuol. Nea wa gihn nu e nyoadh ngo kejea Leabi giih Juog acube yihr Melkiijideg ka nahge Abraahm ge duohng ree e naa acubo giih Juog yihr Melkiijideg.

Juog, ge acube loohnge, e ngo ateede kejea nahge yaa Leabi ge ne doohng ne yaa lam giih kweehr. Awaahn ni, Melkiijideg beehde Ngaa Duohng yaa lam keehd me padhe ngad dhe wod Leabi. Gihn nyoadh ngo kejea gihn me daag nud yi dhe yoohn ka yug yaa Leabi giih kweehr. Noono e ngad lam me ne keede neehn Melkiijideg ngo ake tuohl ne waar yaa Leabi.
Nea ngad lam giih kweehr awaar, e kare nud thiow uwaar loohnge.

Jeacuu ge arub kitaab Juoge ke nyinge kuu anahg ngad Leabi. Ngo anahg ngad tien paajo me ne keede, tien paajo me yea atooro ngaa maa akuong nahg ngad lam giih kweehr. Ngo anahg ngad tien paan cuohn ne Juuda. Moaje ke ngude ngaan arubo ke nying yaa lam giih kweehr, gihn maa anaa arobe ke nying Juuda ngo atooro ke nying ngad tien paar gen muu udoohng ne ngad lam.

Jeacuu ge arub kitaab Juoge ke nyinge kuu anahg ngad Leabi. Ngo anahg ngad tien paajo me ne keede, tien paajo me yea atooro ngaa maa akuong nahg ngad lam giih kweehr. Ngo anahg ngad tien paan cuohn ne Juuda. Moaje ke ngude ngaan arubo ke nying yaa lam giih kweehr, gihn maa anaa arobe ke nying Juuda ngo atooro ke nying ngad tien paar gen muu udoohng ne ngad lam.
Gihn ni roba yea romu kaa ngeyo beer mee awaahn ni. Ngad lam giih kweehr me dhe yoohn mare ne keede wa mar Melkiijideg ngo atuohl.
Ngo kuu anaa akwany Juoge ne ngad lam giih kweehr ke nying kway maa anahg ngad lam. Abea ngo adoohng ne ngad lam giih kweehr bang gihn ngo acahr kedea be cahg thoo keehdo.
Ngo agweed yi kitaab Juog naa,
“Yih unahg Ngad lam giih kweehr ne naang wa mar Melkiijideg.”

Loohnge giih anaa acub Juoge yihr Moaje nyoge be tiihyo ke gen keehdo bang ge ayiid kedea tee gen tooro. Loohnge giih nu gihn maa adaag anudo yihdh gen noono e yaa lam kar kony won ne cohg anaa atooro yihr gen. Awaahn ni dhe yooh me beer acub Juoge yihro me meehg won nyiig buud Juog uyoado gihn gaahno.

Loohnge giih anaa acub Juoge yihr Moaje nyoge be tiihyo ke gen keehdo bang ge ayiid kedea tee gen tooro. Loohnge giih nu gihn maa adaag anudo yihdh gen noono e yaa lam kar kony won ne cohg anaa atooro yihr gen. Awaahn ni dhe yooh me beer acub Juoge yihro me meehg won nyiig buud Juog uyoado gihn gaahno.
Juog thiow ree akuohnge kejea e rob athiir ne nyoadh ngo kejea gaahno gihn nu dhiil beehno wa kare. Coon Juog ree be na kuohnge ge na kwanye yaa lam giih kweehr.
Abea Juog ree akuohnge kejea e rob gihn maa athiir ge akwanye Jeacuu kea,
“A Juog, a rob athiir kedea wiiha buu uwaara.
Yih akwanya ne Ngad lam giih kweehr ne naang.”
Padh rob Juog kejea lume be waare e ne kahl nweehd kiin Juog keehd nyoge, abea Jeacuu ke ngude e naa akahl nweehd me nyaahn kiin Juog ke nyoge ne nyoadh ngo kejea dhe yoohne ne keede.

Gihn moogo nud thiow me nyoadh ngo kejea dhe yoohn Jeacuu ne keede. Ngad lam giih kweehr gihn acoon ge thowe, e ngad lam moogo luuny kare. Ngaa moogo luuny kare bang gihn tiihye agug be neehn mar Jeacuu e be thow uluuny ngaa moogo kare.
Abea Jeacuu ubeehdo ne naang ne Ngad Lam, noono e ngaa me kwany kare tooro bang gihn tiihye be gug.
Noono, e yaa konye ne nyiig bange ge boadhe boadho ne ced, bang gihn ngo kuow ne naang kedea urubo yihr Juog cog ke nying gen.

Jeacuu e naa Ngaa Duohng yaa lam giih kweehr gihn kony won yihdh nyepinye cang. Cwihny Juog med ree kedea gihn me raaj maa akuonge ke tiihyo tooro. Ngo anaa upiny kan keehd yaa anyoohne, abea awaahn ni ngo apoy oogo kiin gen ne beehdo Paar Juog ka me ne yum.

Jeacuu be room ke yaa lam giih acoon ge koag ke yug giih kweehr ke nying anyoohne giih gen kedea ke nying muu nyoge mooge thiow. Jeacuu anyoohne giih nyoge ge awuunye oogo ne cielo cog ke reme naa awoj piny nyum Juog ne kony nyoge.

Jo doong yaa lam ge ne kwany oogo keew nyoge ke dhe yoohn loohng Moaje, ge anahg nyoge me neehn won me ge riehny giih mooge riehnyo. Abea Jeacuu be neehn gen. Bang gihn Jeacuu, ge anyoadh Juoge ne Ngad Duohng yaa lam, ngo beehda Waahd Juog, ngaa me yihre ne teeg Juog. E naa gihn nahge Ngad Duohng yaa lam me tiihye be gug.
Adiehj dhuola piny, ge teed awaahn ni nyoadh ngo kejea yihro naa Ngaa Duohng yaa lam maa apiih wiih koom ukwiihy Juog.

Ngo ne Kar Kwaj ge wuore yea ne tiihy tiihy nahge Ngaa Duohng yaa lam ke nyinge. Kare noono beehda Juog e naa atiihy ngo ne kar kwaj yea abea padh dhaano e naa atiihy ngo. Caahn e ngo ubeehdo yea ne naang ke beehdo me guge tooro.

Kwaad Ngaa Duohng yaa lam cang beehde e ngo kwany kaa bang lam giih kweehr maa nahg ge piny. Wa gihn nu thiow, e Ngaa Duohng yaa lam gihro yihre dhiil nudo ke gihn me lame kedea me nahge piny yihr Juog.

Jeacuu, Ngaan beehda Ngaa Duohng yaa lam, nea ngo ne naa upiny kan e ngo be ne rom doohng ne Ngaa Duohng yaa lam, bang gihn nud ke yaa lam mooge me lam nyepinye kedea me nahg ge piny ke dhe yoohn loohng Judea.

Yaa lam me lahmo kaa dhe yoohn anyoadh loohng Moaje. Abea keehd maa arom gene dhe yoohn lam gihr gen rih me ne Paar Maalo, e poohd e ka me daag nud. Moaje anaa atiihyo ke wa gihn nu. Bang gihn Kar Kwaj gihn ageere ngo arome ke rih me ne Paar Maalo wa kaa angweel Juoge ngo piny yihre kea,
“Kwaad nyepiny cang yug ngo wa mar yi Paar Maalo
wa kaa anaa ateeda ngo yihri wiih Good.”

Jeacuu, ngaan akwany Juoge ne Ngaa Duohng yaa lam awaahn ni, tiihye wiihe ne maalo, ngo be room keehd tiihy yaa lam giih upiny kan. Anweehd gihn ayug Jeacuue keew Juog keehd yaae ngo beer thiow, bang gihn anweehd gihn nu abeehno kaa dhe yoohn lum Juog e arube kejea, “Wiiha be cahga waaro yi lum akoohba kejea gihn me beer ucuba yihr yaa'a.”
Nea nyepinye ge ne caahdho wa kar gen yi nweehd maa anaa amad Juoge ke nyoge umodho, e gihn me ne cahg moogo ke daahdo ke nyinge ne tooro.
Juog yaae ge acaye kejea ge tiihy giih me reje, maa arube kea,
“Gihn uyuga yi nihn ubeehn,
beehda anweehd moogo me nyaahn e nuu mada keehd yaa Yijarael.
Anweehd umada ke wun
buu uroom keehd maa anaa amada keehd ge kuowu
giih anaa alwahga oogo yi bahng Micihr.
Giih anaa amad wane ke gen
ge kuu abeehn gene ne yugo wa kaa ngo,
noono e ge awiia umaam gene.”
Juog abar maalo ke rob kea,
“Kwaad anweehd gihn ni ateeda
en nuu umada ke yaa Yijarael cahng moogo.
Ge uweehga par loohnge giiha ke wudh gen,
kedea umag gene gen ke cwihny gen.
A uwuor gene ne Juog gihr gen,
kedea umuodha gen ne yaa'a.
Bekihd dhaano acielo kiin gen muu uteed ngo yihr wade kea,
‘Cub wiihi ne ngahy Juog.’
Gihn nu buu uteed bang gihn ungahy kwaad dhaane cang
kejea a beehda ngaa.
Kwaad ngad ngoohngo kedea ngaa alony,
a ungahy gene cang.
Anyoohne giih gen uwiia piny yihr gen,
ubahnge giih reje naa atiihy gene be maa yi cwihnya keehdo.”
Rob ke nying anweehd me nyaahn nyoadh ngo kejea mar umodho adoohng ne gihn maa acoon. Abea nea nyepiny adoohng ne gihn maa acoon e nyoadh ngo thiow kejea adoohng ne gihn me tooro.

Dhe yoohn acoon e naa ayug Juoge ne nweehde ke nyoge ngo beehde ngahyu. Ngahyu thiow kejea loohnge me nyoadh ka yug giih kweehr yihre ge anaa ateede. Yaa lam giih kweehr piny yihr Juog ge na tiihyo kaa loohng nu. Giih kweehr ge na yug ke ka maa ayug ucuohne ne Kar Kwaj Juog. Keehd me nahge dhaano utaahngo e naa ageer Kar Kwaj gihn nu, e ngo arome ke rih Kar Kwaj me ne Paar Maalo wa kaa arob Juoge.

Kar Kwaj yea apaahng naa ariow ke gihn me wa waaro. Kur Dhe Wod e naa kaa acub tharbeajo yea kedea nud ke lama me be meehg thoo. Thiow amono gihn cub piny ne gihr Juog cub kaano. Giih nu ge naa Kar Kwaj kur Dhe Wod.
Kar kwaj ge ne loog waaro e naa kur Dhe Tiel kar Loohng Juog ka nud Juoge yea. Beehda Ngaa duohng yaa lam gihr Judea e ne mon kur Dhe Tiel.

Kur Dhe Tiel yea naa teehdo me yea aguur ke jooro. Adung dung me ngwahje med waang ke wiih teehdo gihn nu. Gihn me wa Uduob maa agweed ke cam numo nud Kar Caanduug. Giih acub Juoge ge naa yi gihn wa Uduob. Leele giih agweed loohng Moaje wudh gen kedea alay jooro me thiin me yea naa amono gihn apahdho ke yoohn Maalo maa goohd gihn na kaahn Aarone ge beed yi Uduob. Leele kedea goohd ge alodh.

Cuure giih wuohdjuog ariow me yihr gen ne boohm ge ne wiih Uduob. Boohm gen alwaay gene piny wa tien cahng ke wiih Uduob. Ge na beehn ngad duohng yaa lame ne yug giih kweehr, e remo yore ke wiih Uduob beere Juog giih reje naa ayug nyoge ree ge be mage yi cwihnye. Adiehr muon giih me thoohdh me rom robo ke nying Kar Kwaj ge nud abea padh cahng rob gen cang e gihn.
Nea Kar Kwaj athum ke gwiiro wa kaano, e yaa lam ge uthubo ke cidho yi kur Dhe Wod ne yug giih kweehr ke nying nihn wa kaa ateed loohng Moaje.

Abea Kur Dhe Tiel padh yaa lam ge ne cidh yea. Beehda Ngaa Duohng yaa lam e ne cidh yea kedea cidh ke ne cielo cog yi wong. Ge cea kur Dhe Tiel, e ngo kaahn remo me beehne ne yor piny ne waaj Juog beere anyoohne giihe kedea giih ayug nyoge e ge kwihj gene ge wii Juoge ke piny.

Wahy Juog daahd unyoadhe ngo kejea wuor Juog ke dhe yoohn loohng Moaje nyoge me thoohdh ge be rom wahdh Kar Kway Juog ge nii kur Dhe Tiel. Ge be rom wahdho bang gihn nyoge gahl kur Dhe Tiel ke oogo. Kaa ngo thiow beehda Ngaa Duohng yaa lam cog e ne cidh yi ngo kedea ne cielo cog yi wong.

Dhe yoohn wuor Juog gihn nu beehda dhe yoohn ka wuor Juog wiih piny kan. Bang gihn kwaad giih lam unahg gen yihr Juog ge beehde e ge ke naah ke nying wong. Keehd me nahg gen ke nying wong e lwahr ke nying ukihm Juog beehde nud.

Nyoge wudh gen kuu awul yi lwahr gihn tud gene yihr ukihm Juog bang gihn, loohng Moaje ge rubo kaa nying giih kweehr ge nahg kedea ke nying remo e yor. Loohng Juog ge naa abuohj nyoge ke tiihj ke gen ke deeh ka ma laaj. Abea awaahn ni ge abeehn Jeacuue uthowe e dhe yooh me nyaahn anyoadhe. Dhe yooh me kony won beere wo be tud keehdo ke nying ukihm Juog.

Dhe yoohn nyaahn ge akwanyo bang Ngad Boadh nyoge ngo ne keede. Ngo ne keede bang gihn Ngad Boadh nyoge dhe yoohn ci Paar Maalo ngo ayabe yihro. En naa gihn adoohng dhe yoohn boadh wahye naa apuogo. Ngo adoohng naa apuogo bang Ngad Boadh nyoge, naa adoohnge ne Ngaa Duohng yaa lam, ngo acaa ka me beer keter. Ngo acaa kur Dhe Tiel ge ne Paar Maalo ge padh dhaano e naa ageer ngo. Abea ge acea kaano ne kway Juog ke nyingo, e rem nyuog wale rem muor maa akaahne ke cinge atooro ne cubo yihr Juog wa mar Ngaa Duohng yaa lam gihr Judea. Beehda reme ge awuoj piny naa ayiihe thoo ke nyingo, e naa ayore piny. Ngo ayore piny ke ne cielo cog, keá yor piny tiel me thoohdh wa mar jo doong lam giih Judea e beehde e remo yor gene ke piny ke nying wong. Bang gihn ayore remo piny ke ne cielo cog, e naa kaa abeehn Ngad Boadh nyoge uyoade boadh wahy me be gug yihro bang Juog me beehde anyoohne giiho wuuny ke oogo.

Dhe yoohn nyaahn ge akwanyo bang Ngad Boadh nyoge ngo ne keede. Ngo ne keede bang gihn Ngad Boadh nyoge dhe yoohn ci Paar Maalo ngo ayabe yihro. En naa gihn adoohng dhe yoohn boadh wahye naa apuogo. Ngo adoohng naa apuogo bang Ngad Boadh nyoge, naa adoohnge ne Ngaa Duohng yaa lam, ngo acaa ka me beer keter. Ngo acaa kur Dhe Tiel ge ne Paar Maalo ge padh dhaano e naa ageer ngo. Abea ge acea kaano ne kway Juog ke nyingo, e rem nyuog wale rem muor maa akaahne ke cinge atooro ne cubo yihr Juog wa mar Ngaa Duohng yaa lam gihr Judea. Beehda reme ge awuoj piny naa ayiihe thoo ke nyingo, e naa ayore piny. Ngo ayore piny ke ne cielo cog, keá yor piny tiel me thoohdh wa mar jo doong lam giih Judea e beehde e remo yor gene ke piny ke nying wong. Bang gihn ayore remo piny ke ne cielo cog, e naa kaa abeehn Ngad Boadh nyoge uyoade boadh wahy me be gug yihro bang Juog me beehde anyoohne giiho wuuny ke oogo.

Jo doong lam giih Judea giih kweehr yihr Juog ge yug gene wa kaa arob loohng Moaje, rem nyoohy wale rem miehre ge yor rog nyoge, daan dhieng ke waango e kuow kedea ulyaahb bur gihre ke piih ne yor rog nyoge. Yaa yor ke giih nu beehda yaa rog gen ne anyoohne kedea nyoge me rog gen naa awiedhe. Giih nu ge yor rih dhaano uwii Juoge anyoohne giihe piny kedea ne luog ngaa me ree naa awiedhe udoohng ree beer umade rog nyoge ne kway Juog ka maa acielo.

Ngad Boadh nyoge ngahyu kejea ree atoor anyoohne. Abea keehd maano e ngo akony Wahy Juoge ne cub ree ne thoo ke nyingo. Giih nu yor rog nyoge ka moogo e nyoge luog gene luogo urom gene beehdo kiin nyoge. Nea remo kedea bur nyoge rom gene kaa luogo, e gihn luog rem Ngad Boadh nyoge beehda gihn me cwihnyo umihn ree. Cwihny umihn ree bang gihn beehda anyoohne giiho ge ne wuunye oogo noono e wo be tud keehdo yi thoo. Nea neehn maano kea puojo Juog ke med cwihny kedea nahge tiihye e ne tiihyo.

Thon ngad Boadh nyoge, e naa adog won ke nweehdo ke Juog. Noono e yaa ayiihe ne joe dooj akobe kejea ge udooje yoad gene yoado. Gihn nu ree rome kaa tiihyo bang gihn Ngad Boadh nyoge athow. Athow beere anyoohne giih ayug yaa anaa anweehd umodho, ge atiihyo ke loohng Moaje, ge wii Juoge ke piny yihr gen.
Anweehd gihro ke Juog wo athubo ke tiihj keehde bang gihn Jeacuu athow adiehr muon. Wa gihn nu thiow leeb dhaano naa acege rob kii thoo.
Giih dhaano naa acege nyoge be thub ke tiihj ke gen e wonge poohd nud.
Keehd dooj gihn anaa akob Juoge kejea ngo uyoad Judea, adaahd gihr remo ne nyoadh ngo kejea thob nyoge tiihj ke luube giih anweehd Judea ke Juog
Gihn nu e Moaje gihr remo anahge piny batien kaa arobe loohng Juog yihr nyoge. Naa athume ke rob e remo akaabe uwuoje ngo yi wan piih me yea ne booge me yore nyoge kedea giih ne Kar Kwaj Juog.
Kaa ayore nyoge kedea giih ne Kar Kwaj e ngo urubo kea,
“Wu adoohng ne nyoge maa ayiih loohnge giih anweehd won ke Juog.
Remo gihn yor rogu nyoadh ngo
kejea loohnge giih ateed Juog yihro ge ne tiihyo ke gen
loohnge mooge tooro.”
Moaje thiow Kar Kwaj ngo ayore kedea uyore giih kweehr ge beed Kar Kwaj.

Adiehr muon, loohng nu anyoadh dhe yoohn nahg gihr remo piny cog. Gihr remo ke naah ne waaj Juog beere cwihnye umihno uwiie giih reje naa atiihy ree piny kedea gihr remo ke naah thiow rog giih me rog gen naa awiedhe ne luog ngahdh gen.

Kwaad giih ayor Moaje remo rog gen, dhaano e naa ayug gen. Ge arom rog liil, muu ne Paar Maalo. Kare nud uyor remo rog gen ne luog ngahdh gen udoohng gene beer yi wong Juog. Abea giih ne Paar Maalo ge beehda tiihy Juog ngahdh gen be rom rem giih kweehre ke luogo. Jeacuu ge acidhe Paar Maalo, ngo akaahn remo maa akaal wiih rem giih kweehr ne cub piny yihr Juog.
Ngad Boadh nyoge kuu anaa caa kur Dhe Tiel gihr Kar Kwaj gihn me ne wiih piny kan. Ngo acaa yi maa arome ree ge liil me nud Paar Maalo ke ngude bang Juog ne kwaj ke nyingo.

Ngaa Duohng yaa lam gihr Judea beehde na ucidho kur Dhe Tiel ne cielo ke nying wong e ngo kaahn remo me yor rog nyepinye. Abea Ngad Boadh nyoge acidho ke ne cielo cog bang Juog Paar Maalo e gihr kweehr me kaahne tooro. Gihr kweehr maa akaahne tooro bang gihn e ke ngude e naa gihr kweehr.
Abea awaahn ni Juog daahd uthaahbe gihn apare ke nying nyoge. Ke nying par gihre noono e naa abeehn Ngad Boadh nyoge wiih piny beere uthoo ke thone noono acielo ne waaj Juog.
Keehd dhaano utaahngo e thoo beehn ree ke ne cielo cog batiene e caa nyum Juog yi lug.

Thon Ngad Boadh nyoge aneehn gihn nu. Ngo athow ke ne cielo cog. Abea thone ngo ne keede bang gihn e naa acub ree ne gihr remo me waaj Juog beere cwihnye umihno uwiie anyoohne piny yihr yaa anhyaar Juog. Jeacuu udog duu. Ngo uduu ne kony yaa ayiih ngo ne cohg kejea Jeacuu uduu kedea ukoar gene beehne. Yi duunge noono gihn muu utiihye ke nying anyoohne ngo utooro bang gihn tiihj ke nying anyoohne ngo atiihye yi beehn umodho ge anaa abeehne.

Loohnge giih anaa acub Juoge yihr yaa Judea ge kuu anahg liil me yoad nyoge giih beey ge daahd Juoge ke cubo. Ge anahg giih me padh liil me nyoadh ngo kejea giih maa liil ge nud. Kwaad kweehr ke loohnge me padh liil, keehd me nahg giih kweehr ke nying wong, e nyoge kony gene ke ne diih? Nyoge be kony gene yi ukihm gihr Juog. E naa gihn nahg giih kweehr ke nying wong. Noono e ge beehde e ge utudo yihr Juog nea wong akaal gene e ge kuu naah.
Yaa na wuor Juog ke dhe yoohn nu, nea ge be ne ke tudo yihr ukihm Juog ukaal gene wong moogo e ge kuu naah e gihn me ne bar gene maalo ke nahg giih kweehr ke nying wong keehdo ne tooro.
Noono e ka me bar gene wiih naahg tooro. Be bar gene bang gihn ge abeehn kar nahg giih kweehr e nyoadhe ngo yihr gen kejea nea giih kweehr be nahg gene nahgo e ukihm Juog ke nying anyoohne nud.
Naa adoohnge e rem miehre kedea nyoohy anyoohne be rom gene wuuny oogo, e naa gihn arub Jeacuue noono yihr Juog ge acahnge ke beehn upiny kan kea,
“Ngo aniida awaahn ni
kejea yih be daahd nyoge unahg gene miehre
kedea nyoohy ne wuuny anyoohne giih gen oogo.
Yih daahd nyoadh dhe yooh moogo
e naa gihn acubi kuohm yihra udoohnga ne dhaano.
Naa adoohnge e rem miehre kedea nyoohy anyoohne be rom gene wuuny oogo, e naa gihn arub Jeacuue noono yihr Juog ge acahnge ke beehn upiny kan kea,
“Ngo aniida awaahn ni
kejea yih be daahd nyoge unahg gene miehre
kedea nyoohy ne wuuny anyoohne giih gen oogo.
Yih daahd nyoadh dhe yooh moogo
e naa gihn acubi kuohm yihra udoohnga ne dhaano.
Cwihnyi be med rog giih kweehr giih cub yihri
ne wuuny anyoohne oogo.
Kaano e aroba yihri kaa, ‘Gihn me roba tooro Abaa!
A aman kan ne tiihy gihn daahdi,
wa kaa agweede yi kitaab Juog ke nyinga.’ ”

Agweed yi kitaab kejea Jeacuu arubo umodho kea, “Ngo aniida awaahn ni kejea yih be daahd nyoge unahg gene miehre kedea nyoohy ne wuuny anyoohne giih gen oogo.” Lum yi gihn arob Jeacuue nyoadh ngo kejea ngaa keá yug giih kweehr ke dhe yoohn loohng Moaje

Gihn anaa adog Jeacuue ke robo batien lum nu anaa agweed thiow, ge arube kea, “Gihn me roba tooro Abaa! A aman kan ne tiihy gihn daahdi.” Luub nu ge anaa awaar dhe yoohn yug giih kweehr yihr Juog. Dhe yoohn acoon ge nahg miehre kedea nyoohy ngo amahn Juoge unahge dhe yoohn nahge rem Jeacuu e ne wuuny anyoohne oogo e naa awiie.
E naa kaa abeehn Jeacuu Kriihjte upiny utiihye yihr nyoge beere anyoohne giih gen wii Juoge ke piny. Jeacuu Kriihjto athow ne cielo cog.
Kwaad dhaano cang kiin yaa lam giih Judea tiihye ne kwaaye kaa yugo ke nying nihn kedea nahg giih kweehr piny na bere bero tiel me thoohdh. Abea keehd maano e anyoohne be kuong gene ke wuuny oogo.
Abea mar Jeacuu, anahg ne cielo cog e naa alame gihr kweehr yihr Juog kedea lame noono acielo nu e naa awuunye anyoohne oogo ne naang. Naa athume e ngo ado Paar Maalo ne piih ukoom ukwiihy Juog.

Awaahn ni ngo nii koar kun caadi uwahdhe cahng uyug Juoge yaa mahne ne upahm me nyuohne. Jeacuu anyoohne giih jo ayiih Juoge ge awuuny oogo ke dhe yoohn reme noono awuoj oogo ne cielo cog ne waaj Juog. Gihn maa acahg Juoge ke daahdo tooro ne wuuny anyoohne kaa alame ree piny ne cielo cog.

Awaahn ni ngo nii koar kun caadi uwahdhe cahng uyug Juoge yaa mahne ne upahm me nyuohne. Jeacuu anyoohne giih jo ayiih Juoge ge awuuny oogo ke dhe yoohn reme noono awuoj oogo ne cielo cog ne waaj Juog. Gihn maa acahg Juoge ke daahdo tooro ne wuuny anyoohne kaa alame ree piny ne cielo cog.
Wahy Juog thiow anaa arobe umodho kejea
Juog arubo kea,
“Gihn ni e naa anweehd gihn umad wan keehd gen
yi nihn ubeehn.
Loohnge giiha uweehga nieng yi cwihny gen
upar gene ge paro.”
Maa abar Wahy Juoge maalo kejea ateed Juoge kea,
“Anyoohne giih gen uwiia piny yihr gen,
uduoga cwihnya caahn yihdh giih reje naa atiihy gene.”
Anyoohne giih nyoge awii Juoge piny, noono e kare tooro ucahg yaa lame giih kweehr nah piny keehdo.

Yaage, nea giih beeye ge aroba ke nying Jeacuu yihru yihdh gen kuu adhaahru, e wo dhiil gaahno kejea wo wahdh bang Juog yi Kar Kwaj gihn ne Paar Maalo. Wo uwahdh kaano bang gihn rem Jeacuu Juog awaaje ubeehne unhyaare won kedea uwiie anyoohne piny yihro.
Thon Jeacuu e naa acub dhe yoohn beehdo me nyaahn yihro, bang gihn ge acea Paar Juog, e dhe yooh ayabe yihro utoor gihn me gahl won nea batiene buodho buodho.
Gihn me gahl won tooro bang gihn Jeacuu Ngaa Duohng en ne wiih ne Paar Juog. Kwahyo ke nyinge ne boadh won, wo ge ayiih Juog.

Awaahn ni Juog wo ayiihe ne yaa tien paare bang gihn anyoohne giiho ge awuuny Piih Juog naa acub yihro oogo. Lwahr me ne rogo tooro ke nying ukihm Juog bang gihn Jeacuu reme ameehge woj piny ke nyingo. E won ke ngudo arumo nahge ke kway Juog kedea wuor nyinge ge naa giih cubo cwihnyo ne tiihy gen.

Gihn moogo me dhiilo ke tiihyo beehda ubahnge dhe yoohn nyaahn naa anyoadh Jeacuue be wiio piny kedea ubeehdo e wo gaahn dooj gihr Juog. Wo ubeehdo ke dhe yoohn nu bang gihn Juog gaahno gaahno kejea be rob toohd bang gihn Jeacuu uduu wa kaa ateede.
Wa kaano nahgu nyoge me beehdo kaa dhe yoohn Jeacuu, e kea noono nhyaaru rogu beere rogu konyu konyo.
Thiow wudhu keá waaru ubahnge wudhu be cubu ne kway Juog wa mar yaa waar wudh gen. Ne cohg baru maalo ke ciihm cwihnyu wa kaa angahyu ngo kejea cahng duu Jeacuu adoohng cahng.

Baro maalo ke tiihy giih nu anyoadh dhe yoohn nyaahn gihr Jeacuu. Baro maalo ke gen bang gihn gihn moogo tooro me waaj Juog nea padh rem Jeacuu ge awoj piny ke nyingo. Nea ngaa kweer ke rem Jeacuu e maano beehda dhieny mare e keede, bang gihn giih beeye ge ayoad ke nyinge ge ngahj.
Ke nying gihn nu e keá ngaa yug awuohj uaaye yi dhe yoohn anyoadh Jeacuue, bang gihn Juog dhaano kihme kihmo. Yaa kweer ke lum Juog, ukihm gihr gen beehda maaj e ne thoohr Juoge gen yi ngo.
Ukihm na cub jo doong Judea yihr ngaa dhahl loohng Moaje ngahda ngo ngahyu? Ngaa nu ke bahno ke leele uwahdhe ka thowe nea arob nyoge ariowe kejea adiehr muon ngo akweer ke loohng Moaje.

Nea ngaa akweer ke loohng Moaje ke kihmo ke thoo, e ngaa ayug awuohj rih Jeacuu ukihm mare unaa ngihde? Ngaa maa adhaahr waahd Juog ucwiide ngo! Ngaan nu atiihy gihn me raaj ne cohg! Bang gihn gihn ayug Jeacuue Paar Maalo ubeehn Juoge uwuunye awuohye giiho oogo, ngo adhaahre! Thiow kuohm Wahy Juog adhahle naa ayenye ngo keehd maa anahge Wahy Juog e naa akony ngo! Ngaan nu ukihm ke ukihm muu maane ree.
Beehda gihn maa ateed Juoge kedea ugweede yi kitaab kejea nyoge me reje ge ukihme. Agweed naa Juog arubo kea,
“Buu unahg ngaa moogo e nuu ucoal gihn raaj ge atiihy jo reje,
unahg an e nuu ukihm gen ke gihn me raaj.”
Agweed naa Juog arubo thiow kea, “A naa ngaa ukihm jo'a nea ge awuohj.”
Unahg gihn me raaj nea dhaano awuohj atiihye rih Juog, bang gihn ukihm gihr Juog raaj ne cohg.

Jo paar wan! Paru wudhu rog giih anaa ayug rog gen umodho yihdh nihn anaa ayiihu lum Juog. Nyoge anudo kiin nu maa anaa amag lum Juog e lwahr tooro rog gen. Yaa nu ge anaa amaan maa ayug giih ajohr rog gen kejea beere wudh gen waar gene waaro ukweer gene ke lum Jeacuu. Abea kihde now, ge angeehr ne yiih lum Jeacuu.

Nyoge mooge kiin nu ge adihn wa gihr beel uyaahl gen nyum nyoge. Giihu mooge ge apeej yi nyingu, abea kihde now cwihnyu kuu arahnyo, bang gihn gaahnu lonyo gihn uyoadu Paar Juog. Wu kuu atud ke wahyu ne kony jou ge batien gen riem kedea wu kuu atud ne ci yi thijin ne kony jou ge amag.

Nyoge mooge kiin nu ge adihn wa gihr beel uyaahl gen nyum nyoge. Giihu mooge ge apeej yi nyingu, abea kihde now cwihnyu kuu arahnyo, bang gihn gaahnu lonyo gihn uyoadu Paar Juog. Wu kuu atud ke wahyu ne kony jou ge batien gen riem kedea wu kuu atud ne ci yi thijin ne kony jou ge amag.
Teeg aduulo gihru noono kedea ngabo ke nying lum Jeacuu ge keá wiiu bang gihn koog me duohng uyoadu ke nying gen.
Wu keá dhaahr ne tiihy gihn daahd Juoge beere giih beeye ge akob Juoge kejea ge ucube yihru ge yoadu yoado.
Wa agweed kejea adoohnge ka me thiin ubeehn Jeacuue. Ngo padh ngaa muu ucahg gaalo.
Yaa ubar maalo e ge be dhaahr ke yiih lum Juog, Juog cwihnye umed rog gen.
Abea wa wo abar maalo e wo be dhaahr ke yiih lum Juog! Nea neehn maano, ke nying yiiho gihro, e Paar Juog uyoado.
Jo wan! Gaahn Juog lum yea beehda yiiho kejea gihn ateed Juoge kea ngo uyuge beehda adiehr kedea ngo upahdh kare ne cohg keehd me bahnge ngo poohd kuu atiihy Juoge.

Gaahno gihn nu thiow e ne weehg won yiiho kejea Juog e naa acag maalo ge ke piny kedea giih ne yihdh gen. Gihr nyepiny maa anudo atooro maa atiihy Juoge keehde. Kwaad gihn robe, e ree tiinge ke kare. Arubo kejea beehn maalo ge ke pinye kedea giih ne yihdh gen nud gene. Gihn nu, e ngo abeehn wa kar dhee wa ka niido gen. Ngaa me be gaahn Juog, be yiihe kejea giih nud ge acag Juoge kaa lum abeehn oogo yi dhee e gihn me ni yi cinge tooro. Juog cwihnye med rih ngaa gaahn ngo kejea lume ree tiinge ke kare. Ke nying gihn nu, e naa amihn cwihny Juoge rog yaa acoon ke nying gihn anud kwaad gaahn nu yihr gen.

Gaahno gihn nu thiow e ne weehg won yiiho kejea Juog e naa acag maalo ge ke piny kedea giih ne yihdh gen. Gihr nyepiny maa anudo atooro maa atiihy Juoge keehde. Kwaad gihn robe, e ree tiinge ke kare. Arubo kejea beehn maalo ge ke pinye kedea giih ne yihdh gen nud gene. Gihn nu, e ngo abeehn wa kar dhee wa ka niido gen. Ngaa me be gaahn Juog, be yiihe kejea giih nud ge acag Juoge kaa lum abeehn oogo yi dhee e gihn me ni yi cinge tooro. Juog cwihnye med rih ngaa gaahn ngo kejea lume ree tiinge ke kare. Ke nying gihn nu, e naa amihn cwihny Juoge rog yaa acoon ke nying gihn anud kwaad gaahn nu yihr gen.

Abel ne keew yaa acoon ge agaahn Juog. Ke nying gaahn Juog, e gihr kweehr me beer maa ayoohm mar Kaayn umen anahge piny yihr Juog.
