Juog cwihnye abeehn ne mihno rih Abel bang gaahno gihre ucuohne ngo naa abiohgrwaal. Gihn ayug Abel ke nying Juog beehda loohng yihro me nyoadh kar tiihy gihn me beer yihr Juog keehd maa athow Abele.

Ngo agweed yi kitaab Juog kejea Enog thiow anahg ngaa maa agaahn Juog keraahyo ubeehn Juoge umihn cwihnye rih ngo. Ke nying gaahno gihre noono, e Enog kuu athow ukoanye, abea ngo atihng Juoge maalo paare ke kuohme cang utoor liene.
Juog cwihnye be rom mihno rih dhaano me Juog be gaahne. Kwaad ngaa daahd gihr nyepiny bang Juog dhiile ngo ke yiiho kejea Juog nud kedea gaahne Juog kejea wiih gaahno gihre be taay piny.

Gaahn Juog e naa naa aweehg Nooh yiih gihn ateed Juog yihre ke nying gihn muu uyug ree me poohd kuu aniide. Anaa ateed Juoge kejea tiihy Noohe yaahy me duohng bang gihn kodh ucwii uboar piny cang. Lum Juog abeehn Noohe ne yiiho utiihye yaahy. Yaahy nu e naa abeehn en ne kony ke jo paare ne dug. Abeehn Noohe ne nyoadho ke gaahno gihre kejea nyoge mooge ge anahg nyoge me reje. Juog cwihnye amihno rih Nooh ke nying gihn abahnge gihn arobe keá piemo.

Abraahm thiow lum ateed Juog yihre kejea wiie paan beede piny ne ci piny me nyaahn ngo ayiihe bang gihn agaahne Juog. Noono, uwiie paare piny ne ci piny anaa ateed Juoge kejea ucube yihr ngo. Abraahm aneehn ngaa maa apiir wiihe dom bang gihn ka cea yea akwihye.

Abraahm lum Juog ayiihe ucea ne beehdo naa aley yi piny agweehg Juoge ne cubo yihre. Abraahm kedea jo paare ge abeehdo yihdh abuwe. Juog thiow arubo yihr kwaay Abraahm Yijaag kedea Jeakob ke nying piny nyaahn. E naa gihn abeehd gene yihdh abuwe ke nying gihn ayiih gene leeb Juog ke gaahn Juog yi cwihny gen.
Abraahm anaa akoar ngo beere caa ne beehdo Paar Juog naa ageer umiihre. Beehda paajo me be ryaahr ne weey weey.

Ke nying gihn ayiih Abraahme lum Juog, e naa adhiile yihdo ke nyethen keehd maa anaa angey wihj oogo kejea ngo ataaj ke wiihe. Bang gihn Abraahm anaa agwag ke gwaa me kare atooro uyihde ke nyethiin. Caara ciihe thiow anaa agwag, ge anahg nyoge maa akoar thon gen. Abea keehd maano, e Abraahm gaahn agaahne Juog yea ngo keá lwago bang gihn angahye kejea Juog gihre naa ateede dhiile kaa tiihyo.
Abraahm wiihe kuu abeehn ne taaj uthowe ke wiihe now bang gihn kwaaye ge anaa athoohnho unyoohr gene ne nyigraa wa ciehr yi maalo ge be rom kwaano.

Yaa anaa agaahn Juog cang ge athow e giih ateed Juoge kejea ge ucube yihr gen ge poohd kuu ayoad gene. Abea keehd maano e gihn utiihy Juoge cahng moogo ke nying giih nu ngo angahy gene. Gihn nu e naa ameehg cwihny gen mihno kedea ubeehd gene e ngo teed gene teedo yihr nyoge kejea ge beehd upiny kan e ge aleye.
Yaa teed ngo kejea ge beehda aleye nyoadh ngo kejea ge gaahn piny mar gen me beed gene ne paar gen.
Yaa nu, keehd maa angahy gene ngo kejea ge beehda aleye, e ngo anaa angahy gene kejea paan aay gene yea padh paar gen, bang gihn nea ne par gene wa maano, e kar do dhecaahn paan acoon anudo yihr gen.

Cwihny gen atooro do dhecaahn paan acoon bang gihn ge agaahn paajo maa akaal wiih paan nu ke beero. Paar Juog ke ngude e naa gaahn gene. E naa gihn akaab Juoge gen ne joe kedea ugwiire paajo yihr gen ne kar beehdo.
Juog arubo yihr Abraahm kea,
“Dhe wod paari ukoad uthoohnh kwaayi
wa cier yi maalo kaa nying Yijaag waahdi.”

Kedea Juog anaa ado rob yihr Abraahm kejea nahge waahde ge acielo cog ne gihr remo yihr Juog. Abraahm kuu anaa akweer bang gihn gaahne Juog kejea dhe yooh uyuge unahge Yijaag e nuu meehg paare koad. Adiehr muon Juog Yijaag ameehge bodho.
Juog arubo yihr Abraahm kea,
“Dhe wod paari ukoad uthoohnh kwaayi
wa cier yi maalo kaa nying Yijaag waahdi.”

Kedea Juog anaa ado rob yihr Abraahm kejea nahge waahde ge acielo cog ne gihr remo yihr Juog. Abraahm kuu anaa akweer bang gihn gaahne Juog kejea dhe yooh uyuge unahge Yijaag e nuu meehg paare koad. Adiehr muon Juog Yijaag ameehge bodho.
Juog arubo yihr Abraahm kea,
“Dhe wod paari ukoad uthoohnh kwaayi
wa cier yi maalo kaa nying Yijaag waahdi.”

Kedea Juog anaa ado rob yihr Abraahm kejea nahge waahde ge acielo cog ne gihr remo yihr Juog. Abraahm kuu anaa akweer bang gihn gaahne Juog kejea dhe yooh uyuge unahge Yijaag e nuu meehg paare koad. Adiehr muon Juog Yijaag ameehge bodho.
Yijaag Juog agaahne kejea waahde ge ariow, Jeakob kedea Yijaaw, ge udooj Juoge.
Jeakob, ke gaahn mare yi cwihnye, naa agwage udoohnge cahng ke thoo, e goohd gihre akaabe upiihe kar bahbe ne kway Juog udooje nyethen Jocebe waahde.

Jocebe abeehdo e ngo gaahne gaahno kejea Juog yaa Yijarael joe ge ulwahge oogo Micihr. E naa gihn arobe ngo naa acahnge ke thoo kea, “Yaage! Nihna ge athum, abea nea a uthoo, e cuua keá wiiu kan, kaahnu gen ke wun bang gihn ngahya kejea wu ukahl Juog oogo Micihr.”

Miih Moaje kedea wahn ge anahg nyoge thiow me gaahn Juog. Anaa arob jaah gihr Micihre kejea kwaad nyethiin cuow me nyuol maa ngad Yijarael dhiile ke naah. Abea naa anyuol Moaje e ngo akan ge mene ke dwahde adahg bang gihn anahg nyethiin maa awuob kedea agaahn gene kejea ngo ukoar Juoge ubahnge be nahg yaa Micihre. E naa kaa abeehn nyaar jaahe ukaabe ngo udoonge ke paar jaah.
Ke nying gaahno gihre thiow e naa adoohnge ne ngaa me duohng, e Moaje akweer ubahnge tien paar gen be waare, ucuohne ne waahd nyaakon Micihr.

Noono ukweere ke deeh lony paar jaah ge nahge yea maa abeehne ne kony yaa paar gen kaa ayoade giih ajohr neehn gen. Akweer ke bar maalo ne beehdo ne Umicihr bang gihn adaahd wuor Juog yaa Yijarael. Kuu adaahd ukweere ke wuor Juog yaa paar gen unahge ke joohy mooge ge ne wuore ke nying giih lonyo. Lonyo me gihr nyinge tooro.
Beehde e gihn maa acube yi cwihnye kejea guum giih me reje ke nying Ngad Boadh nyoge akaal wudh giih lonyo ge yi dhaahr jaah. Ge aguum thiow bang gihn ngo agaahn koog gihn me poohd ne wong maalo.

Gaahn agaahn Moaje Juog e naa ameehg ngo aay ke joe Micihr keehd maa angahye ngo kejea jaah cwihnye raaj ke nying waahdh gen. Keehd maa angahye raahy cwihny jaah e ngo abar maalo ke waahdhe bang gihn Juog gaahn gaahno kejea ge ukonye.

Anahg ke nying gaahno gihre thiow e naa akobe ngo yihr yaa Yijarael kejea beehn dhaane nahge gihr remo kedea yore remo dhe wod. Arobe wa gihn nu beere nea wuohnjuog gihn uoohr Juoge remo yoade yoado dhe wod e kayo maa nyethiin cuow be nahge.

Yaa Yijarael ge a'aay Micihr ge anahg nyoge maa agaahn Juog thiow. Juog agaahn gene bang gihn naa abeehn Juoge upaahnge yihdh piih naam duohng ne ngudo ke piny e ge kuu atud. Ge kuu atud bang gihn angahy gene kejea Juog ge umeehge ngudo uwahdh gene wiih agala e ge caahdh ka piny kaa me piih toor yea. Abea naa aluuny jeaj Micihre ke batien gen e Juog piih aduoge kar gen umud gene utoor ngaa maa abodh.

Thiow yaa Yijarael giih anaa ateehng geen Jeriiko, ge anahg nyoge maa agaahn Juog. Naa awahnh gene Jeriiko e ge kuu athubo ke paahr ke wiih roog ne maahd yaa yi geew. Abea ge athubo ke wen geew bang gihn agaahn gene kejea Juog roog ujwange piny beere ge mon yi geew. Adiehr muon, yi beriown nihn e Juog roog ajwange piny.

Dhaago me nyinge Raahb anahg ngaa maa agaahn Juog thiow e naa gihn akane yaa Yijarael ge anaa akwahl rog gen yi geew ne leng. Ge akane bang gihn cwihnye anaa yiih lum Juog. Ke nying yiiho gihre, e naa abahnge kuu anahg ge anaa anahg yaa Yijarael yaa anaa yi geew.

Yaa nu ge anahg nyoge maa anaa anhyaar Juoge ke nying gihn agaahn gene Juog. Abea kuu anahg ge keed gen ge naa amihn cwihny Juoge rog gen. Nyoge mooge anudo me neehn Gidion kedea Barag maa Camcon kedea Jepethaa kedea Deabid maa Camweel kedea yaa agamloohngjuog mooge.

Yaa nu thaahy me thoohdh ge ataay gene yi liny kedea nyoge me ne cam nguu kedea me ne waang ke maaj maa me ne nahg ke tong ge ameehg gene bodho. Keehd me ci gene yi liny e ge noog, e tee cub Juoge cubo yihr gen utaay gene teehng me teeg. Giih nu cang ge ameehg Juoge tiihyo yihr gen bang gihn Juog cwihnye amedo rog gen bang gihn Juog agaahn gene.

Yaa nu thaahy me thoohdh ge ataay gene yi liny kedea nyoge me ne cam nguu kedea me ne waang ke maaj maa me ne nahg ke tong ge ameehg gene bodho. Keehd me ci gene yi liny e ge noog, e tee cub Juoge cubo yihr gen utaay gene teehng me teeg. Giih nu cang ge ameehg Juoge tiihyo yihr gen bang gihn Juog cwihnye amedo rog gen bang gihn Juog agaahn gene.

Maahn maa agaahn Juog gaahno ge anudo thiow. E thow waahd gene, e ge ugaahno kejea ge umeehg Juog cahro. Adiehr muon, ge na meehg Juoge ke cahro ke nying gaahno. Yaa nu ge beehda nyoge maa ayiih lum Juog ukony Juoge gen. Abea nyoge mooge anudo thiow maa agaahn Juog abea ge kuu akony Juoge yihr yaa akweer ke lume kejea wii gene lum Juog beere ge ke lonyo. Ge adhiil ke naah naa akweer gene bang gihn ge gaahn koog gihn uyoad gene wong maalo Paar Juog.

Mooge ge ayaahr uyeny gen kedea upuohd gen ke ngeero. Mooge dahng ge areehg ke gele uthoohr gen yi thijin. Mooge kiin gen ge anahg kaa naah ajohr me neehn yaa abahn ke leele kedea mooge wudh ge angol oogo kedea muu akeehn ke toong. Mooge ge atud ke wahy gen, ugoohd gene ke cing gen now utoor gihn maa akaab gene. Noono upahdh gene yi deeh ngoohngo me booge ge ne kaahn gene. Giih nu cang ge agwaahy gene rog gen ukweer gene ke waar rog gen ke nying gaahno gihn gaahn gene Juog kejea gihn me beer ucub Juog yihr gen cahng moogo.

Mooge ge ayaahr uyeny gen kedea upuohd gen ke ngeero. Mooge dahng ge areehg ke gele uthoohr gen yi thijin. Mooge kiin gen ge anahg kaa naah ajohr me neehn yaa abahn ke leele kedea mooge wudh ge angol oogo kedea muu akeehn ke toong. Mooge ge atud ke wahy gen, ugoohd gene ke cing gen now utoor gihn maa akaab gene. Noono upahdh gene yi deeh ngoohngo me booge ge ne kaahn gene. Giih nu cang ge agwaahy gene rog gen ukweer gene ke waar rog gen ke nying gaahno gihn gaahn gene Juog kejea gihn me beer ucub Juog yihr gen cahng moogo.

Keehd maa anahg gene nyoge me beey, e ge akaahn nyoge me reje ke cing nyooro utoor kar beehde yihr gen ubeehd gene ke wiih ngweej ke maam ke bang yi ukang kedea yihdh bung kedea wudh goode maa yihdh wuud leele. Keehd maano amaam gene, e ge amaam kaa nying gihn gaahn gene Juog kejea ge udooje.
Yaa nu cang, Juog cwihnye amedo rog gen ke nying gihn agaahn gene gihn ucub Juoge yihr gen cahng moogo. Abea ngo ngahyo kejea giih nu ge kuu anaa ayoad gene ge apoohde e ge kuow.
Ge kuu ayoad gene bang gihn Juog dhe yooh me nyaahn abeehne ne nyoadho ne boadh wahy. Yaa nu cang kedea won boadh wahy yoado ke bang Jeacuu ge akwany Juoge ne Ngad Boadh nyoge.

Amahr yaa nu agweehda ke nying gen nu ge nyoge maa agaahn Juog. Ge maahny bango ke ka beehdo kii ngo. Nea maano, e kea wiio giih anyoohne ungooro kwaad gaahno gihr gen beere Juog cwihnye umihno rogo thiow. Ngooro gen utoor gihn me gahl won ne yoad kaa agwiir ke nyingo.

Thiow nahge Jeacuu e naa ngaa ngooro bang gihn beehde en, e ne meehg won gaahn Juog. Nahge en, e ne ngooro, bang gihn naa ayug nyoge me reje giih ajohr ree kedea uyaahle uwahdhe kaa anahge, e yea kuu abaadh ungaj wonge. Giih reje naa atiihy ree ge keá paro ke nying mihn cwihny gihn koar ngo Paar Juog. Awaahn ni Jeacuu ne Paar Juog ngo apiih wiih koom ukwiihy Juog.

Paru wudhu yihdh giih ajohr giih reje naa ayoad Jeacuue bang yaa reje ge amaan ngo kedea paru wudhu ke kaa anaa aguume giih nu kii ngo. Paru giih nu ne deed cwihnyu beere kwaad guume noono ngooru ngooro umagu lum Juog beer mee.

Deedu cwihnyo bang gihn yaa ater Jeacuu giih anaa maan ngo, wong ngo anaa dhiil gene ke rwaahnyo. Abea maru, ngweehn yihr mar Jeacuu, bang gihn yaa ateru ge daahd uwiiu lum Juog, kihd ngwiilo maa akedh gene rogu tooro. E naa gihn dhiilu cwihnyu ke deedo uguumu wa mar Jeacuu.
Wudhu keá wul yihdh luub tee aduulo naa ateed Juoge yihru neehn nyethene wa kaa agweede naa,
“Jo'a! Beehda gihn me beer
nea Juog e ne lume lihngu
beere wu be waahj
kedea cwihnyu keá ne ngog nea wu acuow Juoge
bang gihn Juog daahd ucohge wun
udoohngu ne nyoge me beeye.
Wudhu keá wul kejea
beehda ke nying gihn anhyaar Juoge wun
e ne cuowe wun.
Kedea wudhu keá wul
kejea wu beehda nyethene
e naa gihn cuowe wun.”
E naa gihn dhiilu giih ajohr ge ayoadu ke nying Jeacuu ke guumo bang gihn Juog e ne daahd ngo wa gihn nu ne dhe yooh me puohnye wun. Ne wuro me cinge be tihnge maalo ne puohny nyethiine?
Nea ngaa kweer ke dhe yoohn puohny mar Juog e ngaan nu padh nyethiin Juog, ngo beehda nyethiin maa awaadh.

Yihro ne weeho me cuow won. Kedea ge nhyaaro nhyaaro ke nying gihn puohny gene won. Nea weeho ge upiny ge nhyaaro nhyaaro kedea ulihngo lum gen, kea dhiilo wuro ge ne Maalo ke nhyaaro keraahyo kedea lihngo lume beer mee. Bang gihn wahyo ge naa yi cinge.

Ge weeho wo puohny gene beere gihn me beer tiihyo tiihyo yihr gen kedea yihr paajo. Abea mar Juog, wo apuohnye beere gihn me beer yoado yoado kedea udoohngo beer wa en. E naa gihn bahnge puohny Juog be gug noono.
Puohny me yoohd tooro kedea giih raahm kuohm ge ke yoado thiow. Abea batien kaa angeyo giih apuohny yihro beer, e cwihnyo amihno bang gihn dhe yoohn beehdo me beer ayoado.
Nea neehn maano kea ngahm cwihnyu kedea yugu rogu ne yaa guum ke nying lum Juog kedea baru maalo ke gaahn Juog.
Ngahm cwihnyu bang gihn ge niid yaa ayiiho giih cej dhaahr, e cwihny gen ungahmo wa maru. Noono e ge bar maalo ke yiih lum Juog.
Jo paar wan! Beehdu e rogu konyu konyo beere dhe yoohn beehdo maa awuob yoadu yoadu kedea beehdu e wu nhyaar Juog. Kwaad beehdo ke dhog yiehdh nu ge ne meehg dhaano cidh Paar Juog.
Koaru rogu beer mee utoor ngaa me do caahn ukweere ke muuny cub Juoge ne boadh nyoge, udoohnge wa nye winy dihb wong naam.

Doohngu ne nyoge me cwihnyu nud utoor ngaa me kaab maahn nyoge. Thiow, ngaa keá dhaahr dooj gihn cub Juoge yihre. Ngaa keá dhaahr ngo wa mar Yijaaw. Yijaaw dooj acub Juoge yihre unahge kayo, ngo adhaahre ungeewe doohnge oogo yihr umen ke nying cam.

Gihn ayug ree batiene kaa angeewe doohnge oogo ngo ngahyu. Wahn akweer naa anaa abeehne kejea dooj wahne en ke dooj kayo. Ka maa arome wiih wahn ke waaro tooro keehd maa abuohje ke kway wong wahn ke piih wong.

Yaage! Wu abeehn ka me gihn me tudu ke nyinge tooro. Kaa abeehnu yea padh wiih Good Ciihna kaa anahg ge kuowu yea. Wiih good me ge kuowu ge anaa atud. Ge atud yi deeh maay ake liel wiih good kedea deeh muudho amoal wiih good piny maa maahny kodh thiow.
Ge atud yihr duon Juog ge rubo e uyaay wa bayo. Duon nu e naa ameehg nyoge kway wong Moaje kob gene, “Cedhree rob ngo yihr Juog ubahnge be rubo yihr wan.”
Ge kuu atud ke yi duol keede abea ge amag lwahre yi gihn arob Juoge kea,
“Kihd ngaa beehn buud Good gihn.
Keehd dhieng wale diel keá meehg beehno.
Ngaa cood yi lum ni,
e ngo ke bahno ke leele uwahdhe ka uthowe.”
Keehd Moaje thiow ngo anaa atud adhaahr ukoohbe kea,
“Riha adoohng e ngo urihg ni yi lwahr.”

Abea rogu ne dwaar yaage! Wu kuu abeehn kar lwahr wa mar ge kuowu kaa anaa alihng gene duon Juog e urubo yea. Abea maru wu abeehn Paar Juog ne beehdo ka maa acielo keehd amahr wuohdjuog ge ulor wun ke med cwihny.

Yaa cuohn Juoge ne joe ge nying ge agweed Juoge piny ge uyoadu. Nyoge maa athow e Juog cwihnye med rog gen ge uyoadu, yaa nu cang ge uyoadu e ge beed yi mihn cwihny. Juog cwihnye umihn rogu kedea ukihme yaa atiihy giih me reje ke gihn me raaj.

Jeacuu uyoadu thiow Paar Juog. Jeacuu ge reme awoj piny ke nyingu ne wuuny anyoohne giihu oogo reme be rom ke rem Abel. Naa aniid Juoge rem Abel e ngo akoohbo kejea Kaayn ukihme. Abea naa aniide rem Jeacuu e akoohbo kejea anyoohne giih nyoge ge awiie piny.

Nea neehn maano kea cubu cwihnyu piny utoor ngaa me koohbo kejea, “Nea lum Juog wiia wiio, e gihn me raaj me uyoad an tooro.” Yaa anaa atoohn Moaje ke ukihm Juog nea ge akweer ke lihng lum Juog naa arobe, ge anaa adhiil Juoge ke kihmo. Abea ukihm mar yaa nu uthiin yi ukihm maro nea wo ukweer ke lum Juog ge akahl Jeacuue yihro.

Umodho coon, duon Juog piny anaa amede ne med medi ge anaa atihnge duone maalo ne rob yihr yaa Yijarael. Batien rob nu, e Juog lume me teeg anaa arobe kea, “Cahng udoga piny ke medo, buu unahg piny keede e nuu naa med medi, maalo thiow ree uyahnge!”
Yi lum arob Juoge nyoadh ngo kejea piny maa maalo kedea giih ni yihdh gen ge utooro kedea giih me be rom rahnyo ge nuu udoohng.

Ngahda cwihnyo dhiil mihno yi gihn utiihy Juoge. Gihn uraanye kwaad giih gug kedea udoohng ke wone maa giih be rom rahnyo ne yaa dhaahre. Kea noono muohjo koohr Juog kedea wuoro ngo ke dhe yooh me beer unahge tiihye e ne tiihyo.
Thiow mago giih agweehg Juoge ke nyingo beer mee ubahnge Juog wo be kihme ke gihn me raaj.
Nhyaaru nyoge cang naa acielo acielo wa kaa anhyaar yaa yiihe rog gen kii ngo.

Loru ngaa maa aley beer bang gihn keehd ngaa maa aoohr Juoge ne tiihy gihn me beer, e rom dhaane kaa goongo e kwihj kejea beehda Juog e naa aoohr ngo wa kwaad kaa anaa ayuge ree yihr nyoge mooge. Noono, dhiilu gihn me beer ke yugo uloru nyoge maa aleye ugoongu gen yihdh miehyu.
Konyu yaa amag yi thijin kedea uyuog cwihnyu rog gen ke lalo me wa wu naa amag ke ngudu. Yuog cwihnyu thiow rog yaa apahdh yi bahng ke lalo me romu kii bahng maru.

Nyuohm beehda gihr Pe'Dihmo me beer yihr nyoge cang nea yaa anyuom rog gen nying gen be ne kal kal. Ngo raaj nyum Juog nea dhaago cuore wiie ke piny ucaahye ke cuow. Kedea ngo raaj nyum Juog thiow nea dhecuow ciihe wiie ke piny ucea ne caahyo ke maahn. Noono e ukihm Juog uteeg rog kwaad cuow caahyo ke maahn kedea maahn caahyo ke cuow. Yaa rihj kedea nyetheamaahn giih nying gen ne kal kal thiow ge ukihm Juoge.
Dhaano cwihnye keá loge ne nhyaar ngiihny, abea muohje koohr Juog ke nying gihn ne yihre, wa kaa ateed Juog ngo kea,
“A buu uaay uwiia wun yi ngoohngo ne bango yihr jo mahnu.”
Ngahda ngo alihngo yi dhe Juog e gihn arobe ke nyingo? Kea noono deedo cwihnyo arumo urubo e lwahr tooro rogo kejea,
“Juog e naa ngaa ngahy gihra ne daahda.
Ngaa noono e nuu cahga tudo yihre
kejea gihn me tiihye riha nud?”

Jo doonge giihu naa acoon lum Juog anaa puohny gene yihru, caahn e giih nu apuohny gene ge dhiilu ka paro utiihyu ke dhe yoohn ateed gene yihru. Thiow paru kaa abeehd gene kii ngo kiinu uwahdhe kaa athow gene. Ngooru dhe yoohn beehdo gihr gen noono.

Wudhu keá meehgu loo yihr kwaad yaa toohd me puohny luube me ne keede, me be roohm ke loohng Juog. Kwaad luub nu koany tooro rog gen bang gihn ge weng wudh nyoge oogo kejea cam ke wuoro. Yaa anaa alihng luub nu ge abeehn ne doohng yi tarwaa e adiehr maa ayoad gene tooro. Caahn e wu awaahn ni, weehgu lum Juog mon yaa aduunu umagu ngo teeg mee, bang gihn Jeacuu Kriihjto cog e naa Ngad Duohng yaa lam yihru ne naang. Noono e kare tooro uteede naa ne ngaa me rom beehno ke lubo me ne keede.

Wudhu keá meehgu loo yihr kwaad yaa toohd me puohny luube me ne keede, me be roohm ke loohng Juog. Kwaad luub nu koany tooro rog gen bang gihn ge weng wudh nyoge oogo kejea cam ke wuoro. Yaa anaa alihng luub nu ge abeehn ne doohng yi tarwaa e adiehr maa ayoad gene tooro. Caahn e wu awaahn ni, weehgu lum Juog mon yaa aduunu umagu ngo teeg mee, bang gihn Jeacuu Kriihjto cog e naa Ngad Duohng yaa lam yihru ne naang. Noono e kare tooro uteede naa ne ngaa me rom beehno ke lubo me ne keede.
Yaa lam giih na tiihyo ke loohnge giih Judea naa acoon, kare tooro yihr gen keehdo ucahg gene mahd bango kar lam gihro ge nyaahn ne nywaag dooj gihr Juog gihn acube yihro.

Yaa doong lam giih Judea giih kweehr na nahg gene ke piny umon gene kur Dhe Tiel e remo kaahn gene kaahno ne cub piny beere anyoohne giih nyoge luog oogo. Remo cog e ne na kaahn jo doong yaa lam giih Judea ne ci kur Dhe Tiel, abea wanye ge be daahd ge na woj dom kaa me nyoge tooro yea.
Wa kaano bahnge wanye ge be na daahd, Jeacuu thiow anaa abeehn ne thoo ke dom ka me nyoge tooro yea, beere anyoohne luoge ke oogo ke reme naa awoj piny.
Wo thiow kare nud umahdo bange dom kaano athowe yea beere ajohr gihn ayug ree guumo guumo tiehd keehd en.
Wo naa ne yuohmo now upiny kan, abea padh e naa paajo yihro. Paaro beehda maa ateed Juoge kejea uyoado cahng moogo Paar Juog.

Wa maano, leeyo Juog uwuoro ngo. Giih kweehr ge cubo yihr Juog kaa dhe yoohn leej kedea wuohdo gihn anyoadh Jeacuue. Arobo ke dhogo ne dahr nyum nyoge kejea Jeacuu e naa Juog, abea ke dhe yoohn nu arobo ngo wa maano kejea Jeacuu beehda Juog, e wo neehn nyoge maa acub gihr kweehr yihr Juog.

Thiow Juog be daahd gihr kweehr gihn cub yihre ke ngude cog, abea keehd aley e ne kony dhaane e ngaan nu akony Juog. Noono e Juog cwihnye med yi kuny gihn nu keraahyo. Wa gihn nu e nyoge dhiilo kaa konyo.

Wahyu naa yi cing jo doongu ge dier ke wun. Ge upeehny Juoge ne teed dhe yoohn kaa akaahn gene wun kii ngo. Noono, e kare nud uwuoru gen, maa uyugu gihn teed gene kejea tiihyu ngo. Lihngu luub jo doonge giihu beere wu kaahn gene kaahno ke cing me beer. Abea nea luub gen adhahlu, e wu kaahn gene e cwihny gen reje. Caahn e adiehr me yoadu bang gen tooro.
Wudhu keá waadhu ne kwaj ke nying wan. Ngo ngahy wane ne cohg kejea yihdh wan tar kedea cwihny wan athoohr Juog ne tiihy gihn me beer yihru naa acielo acielo.
Juog thiow akwaya ke cwihnya cang ke nyingu kejea konye an ulaara dog bangu.

Jeacuu Kriihjto e naa ngaa ngahy wahyo ke koalo kedea e ne koar won oogo yi gihn me raaj. Ngo ameehg Juoge cahro naa acube ree ne gihr kweehr me nweehd won ke Juog ne naang ke dhe yoohn reme naa awoj piny. Kwayu Juog ngaan doohr nyoge uyabe yooh me beer yihru beere gihn daahde tiihyu tiihyo wa kare. Juog daahd won ke boadho uwaahdho ne jo yiiho. Jeacuu ke ngude e naa ngaan acub Juog ne boadh won. Wa maano e ngo uke wuoro ke wong ke wong. E noono.

Jeacuu Kriihjto e naa ngaa ngahy wahyo ke koalo kedea e ne koar won oogo yi gihn me raaj. Ngo ameehg Juoge cahro naa acube ree ne gihr kweehr me nweehd won ke Juog ne naang ke dhe yoohn reme naa awoj piny. Kwayu Juog ngaan doohr nyoge uyabe yooh me beer yihru beere gihn daahde tiihyu tiihyo wa kare. Juog daahd won ke boadho uwaahdho ne jo yiiho. Jeacuu ke ngude e naa ngaan acub Juog ne boadh won. Wa maano e ngo uke wuoro ke wong ke wong. E noono.
Dhog gihn ni agweeda yihru yea cieg mee. Caahn e nyingu akwaya jo paar wan kejea cubu cwihnyu piny ulihngu gihn ateeda beer mee.
Ngahyu ngo kejea ngado ge cuohn ne Timodhy ngo alony oogo yi thijin, abea nea ngo alaar wahnh banga, e wa udhiil bahr bangu tiehd keehde ka me cahng.
Teedu ngo yihr jo doonge giihu kedea jo yiiho cang kejea ge amaahdh wane. Thiow wu amaahdh yaa geen Itaalya.
Juog akwaya ubeehdu cang ke yoohm rogu e noono.
James: Beehda an, a Jeamij ge ubaahng Juog kedea ubaahng Ruohdh Jeacuu Kriihjto an ne gweehd yihru wu Judea ke karu noono nahgu tien miehr apaar wonge ariow, wu ge akeedho ke bang upiny cang. Wu amaahdha.
Jo'a mihn cwihnyu keraahyo nea wu apahdh yihdh giih utum me thoohdh.
Bang gihn ngo ngahyu nea ka yiihu kii ngo ke tumo e naa kaa abeehnu ne ngahy guum giih me reje.
Dhiilu guum giih me reje ke keehl guge e wu be dhaahr. Nea wu buu udhaahr e naa ka unieng lum Juoge yi cwihnyu ne cohg utoor gihn me daage.
Nea dhaano kiinu yoohn beehdo me beer ge nhyaar Juoge kwihye, e kea kway ngaan nu Juog ge muoj nyoge cang ke med cwihny e ngaa me caye tooro. Kwaye Juog bang gihn ngo ucub Juoge yihre.
Abea nea dhaano ukwahyo e kea gaahne gihn kwaye kedea e yea be diiw. Bang gihn kwaad ngaa yea diiw uroomo wa athewo yi naam duohng ge wiihe loang yame.
Kwaad ngaan nu wiihe keá pare kejea gihn muu ucub Jeacuu Ruohdhe yihre nud,
bang gihn kwaad ngaan nu gihn daahde kwihye noono e ngo neehn uthuohn ariem goohy ariow.
Ngad akuud yaa ayiiho maa angoohng dhiile nhyaam bang gihn wiihe atihng Juoge maalo.
Abea ngad akuud yaa ayiiho maa alony mihn cwihnye bang gihn ngo ameehg Juoge doohng ne ngaa me ne bahdh laah. Lonye noono ukeedh wa mar thiiw yaadh maa aryaaw.

Cahng me moohl e liehdh ge cea ne keehd piny ke leehdho e yaadh ryaawe ryaawo ubeehn thiiw giihe ulwaar gene oogo kedea uryaaw yaadhe raaj mee. Wa gihn nu thiow ngaa maa alony, giih lonye ge uryaaw oogo yi cinge maano e ngo cong yihdh giihe.
Mihn cwihny ngaa guum giih me reje bang gihn nea ngo atum ugoohge nyoge, e kuowo gihn akob Juoge kea ngo ucube yihr yaa anhyaare, ngo uyoade.

Nea dhaano ree ayoade e apahdh yihdh giih utum e keá koohbo kea, “Juog a ameehge pahdh yihdh giih utum.” Keá koohbo wa gihn nu bang gihn Juog be tum gihn me raaje kedea Juog dhaano be tume upahdhe yi gihn me raaj.
Dhaano e keede e ne meehg ree pahdh yihdh giih utum ge yuohd cwihnye rog giih me reje. Noono e cwihnye urwaahnyo upahdhe yihdh giih utum.
Kaano nea gihn ayuohd cwihnye rih ngo, ngo ayoade, e adhemuohm atiihye kedea nea adhemuohm adoongo rih dhaano e ngo kahl thoo.
Jo'a maa anhyaara nea wa gihn nu e rogu keá meehgu dwaahngo upahdhu yihdh giih utum.
Kwaad gihn me beer kedea muuny me ne cohg ge beehn ke bang Juog ke yoohn maalo. Juog e naa acag giih meeny piny ge yi maalo kedea Juog ree be waare wa mar tubo.
Juog en naa apar ngo umuoje won ke kuowo me guge tooro ke dhe yoohn Ciig Beer ge rob adiehr beere wo naa ateehg gihr umodho ge akuong ke cubo yihr Juog keew giih acage cang.
Jo'a maa anhyaara, cubu gihn ni yi cwihnyu beer mee. Beehn kwaad dhaane cege yihdhe beer ne lihng kedea ngo keá guo paahr yi rob, maa cwihnye keá laar rahnyo.
Bang gihn rahny cwihny dhaano be yuge naa abiohgrwaal ke Juog wa kaa adaahd Juoge.
Nea maano kea logu giih reje kedea giih anyoohne ge anyoohr ngahdhu kedea yugu rogu ne nyoge maa now uyiihu lum Juog ge apuohny yihru. Bang gihn lum nu e nuu uboadh wun.
Nahgu yaa tiihy giih apuohny yihru ke nying lum Juog. Rogu keá kangu uyugu rogu ne yaa lihng cog abea gihn me tiihyu tooro.
Ngaa me lihng lum Juoge abea gihn rob lum Juoge be tiihye, uroomo ke ngaa maa aniid kuohme yi madhara ge maany wonge keehde ni.
Batien kaa amaanye wonge, e ngo a'aay. Abea naa a'aaye kar madhara e wiihe aguo wulo ukwihye kaa anaa aniide wonge kii ngo.

Abea ngaa cub cwihnye piny ne cohg ne maany yihdh loohnge maa athiir ge cub laahw wihj kedea e ngo be dhaahr ke maany yihdh loohnge, kedea e yihdh gen deade deado thiow, ngaan tiihy giih nu ngo udooj yi tiihye.
Ngaa me koohbo kea e ngad lum Juog abea leebe be koare urube oogo ne pahy, e ngaan nu ree akange kedea gihn anahge ngad lum Juog gihr nyinge tooro.

Lum Juog me ne cal cal me yea tooro giih nyooro e man: maany kiihye kedea gule me ne yi ngoohng wong, kedea koar rog ubahnge dhaano ree be meehge raanyo yihr giih reje wiih piny. Giih ni ge naa dhe yoohn wuor Juog me ne cohg.
Jo'a wa ka nahgu nyoge maa ayiiho yi lum Ruohdho Jeacuu Kriihjto ge wiihe amoar ni, kiin nyoge keá kwanyu kejea ngaa moogo beer kedea ngaa moogo raaj.

Koohbo kejea nyoge ariow ge abeehn ka maa amahd yaa akuud yaa yiihoe yea. Ngaa moogo kiin gen beehda ngaa maa alony maa angaab waare maa awuob me ngien gen teeg kedea lweede ne joadh gihr dhaahb. Kedea ngaa moogo beehda ngaa maa angoohng maa angaab jwaahd waare.

Nea ngaan angaab waare maa awuob e ne ngahyi ke loro urubi yihre kobi, “Ngaan duohng, kar piih maa awuob e man. Piihi.” Abea yihr ngaan angaab jwaahd waare yih urubo yihre kobi, “Nyieh, cuung kari noono wale beehn ne piih piny yi ngoom kan thaahdh tiena,”
ngahda e kiinu akwanyu kedea rogu ayugu ne nyoge me kihmo abea giih paru ge giih anyoohne ne?

Lihngu gihn jo'a maa anhyaara. Ngahda Juog akwany nyoge maa angoohng me giih wiih piny tooro yihr gen kedea uyuge gen ne nyoge me lony gen beehda yiiho ne? Kedea ngahda Dhaahr Juog gihn akob Juoge kejea ngo ucube yihr yaa anhyaare, ucube yihr gen ne?
Yaa angoohng koohm gen adhahlu ne cohg! Ngahda yaa alony ge ne kaahn wun ke cing nyooro ne? Ngahda ge naa yaa piej wun ne kedh nyum ruohdhe yi lug ne?
Ngahda ge ne rob giih me reje ke nying Jeacuu ngaan adoohngu ne yaae ne?
Yih unahg ngaa maa atiihy gihn maa athiir me ne cohg nea loohng ruohdh gihn agweed yi kitaab Juog naa,
“Nhyaar wadu wa ka nhyaari rihi,”
ngo be dhahli.
Abea nea ke dhe yoohn gihn niidi e ne poji kiin nyoge pojo e adhemuohm ayugi kedea yih ke kihmo wa mar yaa toar loohnge.
Bang gihn keehd maa amagi loohnge cang unahge ke nye gihn me thiin mee e naa atoari yihdh gen, e beehd loohng nu cang ge naa atoari.
Bang gihn ngaa anaa arob ngo kea, “Kea ngaa kaab dhaago,” anaa arubo thiow kea, “Kea ngaa nahg dhaano.” Nea yih kuu akahbo ke dhaago abea dhaano e naa anahgi, e poohde loohng yea atoari.
Nea yih urubo, kea rubi kedea tiihyi neehn nyoge me kedh ne kihmo ke loohng me cub laahw wihj.
Rubi kedea tiihy wa gihn nu bang gihn ukihm me cwihny be duu caahn yug Juoge yihr ngaan cwihnye be duu caahn rih dhaano. Duu cwihny caahn en ne wiihe ne maalo yihr ukihm.
Jo'a gihn e ne konye nea dhaano ukoohbo kea yihre ne yiiho abea giih me beeye me tiihye tooro? Wahye be rom kwaad yiiho me wa gihn nu ke boadho.
Koohbo kejea umiiho wale nyemiiho maa ngad yiiho yihre tooro waare kedea gihn me came.

Nea dhaano kiinu urubo yihre kea, “Yih ucaahdhi ke yoohm rihi. Yih uyihdi ke waaro me wumi rihi yi koohyo kedea cam uyoadi.” Nea giih nu ge arob ngaan nu yihr umen wale nyemen maa ngad yiiho abea gihn me cube tooro ne kony ngo, e ngaan nu akony gihn?
Wa gihn nu thiow, yiiho e keede, nea be caahdh kaa tiihy giih beeye e ngo beehda yiiho me koany gihre tooro.
Abea ngo ubeehr ngaa mooge kea, “Mari yihri ne yiiho abea mara yihra ne giih me beeye maa atiihya.”
Kea noono nyoadh yiiho gihri yihra ge yea tooro tiihy giih me beeye, e yiiho gihra ke dhe yoohn tiihy giih me beeye ngo nyoadha nyoadho yihri.
Ngahdu kejea yiiho kejea Juog beehda acielo cog e ne boadh wun? Keehd atiihb ukeehg e ayiih gene kejea Juog beehda acielo cog kedea ge utudo yihre kwaade tooro.
Yih ngaa maa gihn ge wiihi atahg! Yih daahd gihn me nyoadh ngo yihri kejea yiiho me yea tooro tiihy giih me beeye, ngo yiiho me gihr nyinge tooro ne?
Ngahda kuowo Abraahm anaa anyoadh Juoge ne ngaa maa abiohgrwaal ke en ke nying gihn atiihye naa aceje waahde ke naah ne gihr kweehr yihr Juog wiih kar lam ne?
Kuu aniidu kaa abeehn yiiho gihre kedea giih atiihye ucaahdh gene tiehd kedea e naa kaa abeehn gihn atiihye unienge ne cohg utoor gihn me daage ke nying gihn atiihye.
E naa kaa abeehn gihn agweed yi kitaab Juog upahdhe kare. Agweed naa,
“Abraahm Juog ayiihe ke cwihnye acielo
e naa kaa anyoadh Juoge en ne ngaa maa abiohgrwaal ke Juog.”
Kedea maa acuohne ne gom Juog.
Kuu aniidu kejea dhaano ngo nyoadh Juoge naa abiohgrwaal kaa nying tiihy giih me beeye abea padh ke nying yiiho e keede!

Ke dhe yoohn ni, Raahb ge anahg ajaba, ngo anaa anyoadh Juoge naa abiohgrwaal ke nying gihn atiihye naa acube kar budo yihr yaa Yijarael giih anaa aoohr ne leng kedea unyoadhe ke dhe yooh moogo yihr gen ne aay.
Yiiho neehn kuohm. Nea wahy a'aay oogo rih kuohm e athow. Wa gihn nu yiiho me be tiihy giih me beeye ngo athow thiow.
Jo'a, nyoge me thoohdh kiin nu ge keá doohng ne yaa puohny bang gihn ngo ngahyu kejea wa yaa puohny wa ukihm ke dhe yooh maa angwaahn thiin yea.
Wo cang awuohj beehde tiihyo tiihyo ke dhog yiehdhe me thoohdh. Dhaano me be waahj urobe gihn me raaj, e ngaan nu dhiil nahg ngaa me ne cohg, me ree cang ngahye kaa koaro.
Nea thool kaabo kaabo ukaare yi dhe cieny upaahro wiihe ne meehg ngo yug gihn daahdo, e kare nud ulogo wiih cieny kun daahdo.
Wale baabuur thiow keehd maano nahge gihn me duohng me yamo me teeg e ne kool ngo, e ngo rom dhaane kaa kiiwo keehd coohd ge thiin ne ci ka daahd.
Wa gihn nu thiow, leeb beehda gihn me thiin mee yi kuohm dhaano abea thoohn giih nhyaam me doonge ge robe robo. Thiow maany piin maaj ge waang deeh dom cang.

Leeb thiow uroomo wa maaj, leeb en ne wiihe naa anyoohne giih nud wiih piny kiin giih rih dhaano utaahngo. Noono e gihn akob naa kuohm dhaano cang ngo raanye raanyo kedea uraanye dhe yoohn beehdo gihr dhaano. Batiene e leeb ke ngude gihn cub teeg raahnyo yihre, beehda gihn beehn ke yoohn paar maaj.
Kwaad giih me kuow cang, laahy, winy maa giih muun ke piny kedea giih beed yihdh piih ge rom dhaane kaa maango paajo wa mar diehg. Kedea ge giih maa anaa amaang paajo.
Abea leeb ngaa me rom ngo ke maango tooro udoge wiih ngo. Beehda ngad anyoohne me thare be piih piny. Leeb beehda cim me naah.
Leeb e ne poongo Ruohdho Juog Wuro keehde kedea e noono acielo e ne lam dhaano keehde beere yoad gihn me raaje yoado. Dhaano ge acag Juoge, wa cahd Juog, ngo lam leebe lamo.
Dhog gihn acielo e ne beehn puoje kedea lame oogo kii ngo. Jo'a gihn nu ngo awaahj.
Kare nud ubeehn piih me yihdh gen tooro melo kedea piih melo utuom gen yi abuulo acielo?
Jo'a kare nud ubeehn dhaane upone apuomo wiih gumelo? E naa ka bahnge piih me yihdh gen tooro melo ge be tuom yi abuulo me piihe beehda melo.

Ngaa kiinu e ne ngahy dhe yoohn beehdo me beer kedea e ne ngahy dead yihdh nyepinye? Kwaad ngaa me wa gihn nu nyoadhe dhe yoohn ngahy luube kedea dead nyepinye kaa dhe yoohn tiihy gihn me beer me yea ne ngahy luube kedea beehdo ke bahdh yej.
Abea wu keá nhyaam kedea toohd keá robu ke nying giih tiel kedea lahj cwihny ge apahng yi yihdhu.
Kwaad giih nu ge tooro yi ngahy luube ge yoad ke dhe yoohn Paar Maalo. Giih nu ge yoad ke bang giih wiih piny kedea ke bang atiihb ukeehg.
Bang gihn kuohn ne giih tiele yihdh gen kedea giih lahj cwihny, beehda giih alyaahb kedea kwaad giih reje ge tiihj ge ne yoad yihdh gen.

Abea ngahy beehdo gihn yoad bang Juog ngo ne wag wag yea tooro gihn me raaj, batiene e ngo nhyaar beehdo ke doohr e liny tooro. Thiow yea yoohd kedea yea ne nhyaahro maa wiihe be teeg kedea tiihy giih me beeye kedea kiin nyoge be poje kedea lubo me kane tooro.
Yaa doohr nyoge me nyoadh dhe yoohn doohr ge neehn nyoge maa apiidh kohnho piny noono e gihn tuohl beehda nyoge maa abiohgrwaale.
Gihn e ne kahl weehr kedea liny kiin nu? Beehda giih reje ge yuohd cwihnyu bang gen ge ne kahl weehr kedea liny kiinu.

Cwihnyu yuohd rog giih nyepinye abea kar yoad gen wu goohge goohgo. Noono keehd dhaano utaahngo e ngo nahgu nahgo abea gihn daahdu poohd be yoadu. Noono e wu beehde e cwihnyu ne bang nyepiny keter abea ngo be yoadu e naa gihn weehru kedea ukagu kag. Gihn me yoadu tooro bang gihn wu be kwahyo bang Juog beere wu muoje muojo.
Abea keehd ge kwahyu e gihn ngo be yoadu, bang gihn giih daahdu ge be daahdu kaa nying gihn me beer, ge giih wiih piny ge nhyaar koohmu cog.
Wu yaa nhyaar giih wiih piny wu uroomo ke yaa nhyaar budo ke maahn nyoge abea yihr gen ne maahn, bang gihn nhyaar giih wiih piny beehda mahn ke Juog.
Wale nea maru e lum yea gihn agweed yi kitaab Juog kuu ayiihu, ge anaa agweede naa, “Wahy Juog ge acub Juoge ne beehd ke won piny be rome ke nywaago keehd giih ungoom ge yuohd cwihny rog gen?”
Abea keehd maano e Juog tee me duohng cube cubo yihro beere cwihnyo be yuohd rog giih reje. Wa kaa agweede yi kitaab Juog naa,
“Juog tee cube cubo yihr yaa tooro nhyaame rog gen
abea yaa nhyaam ge atiehnge ater.”
Nea maano e kea cubu rogu yihr Juog. Kweeru ke giih atiihb ukeehg beere ngo goohd oogo rogu.
Beehnu buud Juog beere ngo ubeehdo buudu. Wu yaa cwihnyu be piih yi nyepiny acielo cidhu bang Juog e adhemuohme giihu awiiu ngahdhu kedea e cwihnyu cang.

Cidhu e wu ukuumo wa nyoge me yuog thoo utoor ngaa me ngier woj piih nyingu ke nying giih anyoohne naa atiihyu. Yuog aduunu kedea rahny cwihnyu ke nying giih reje naa atiihyu. Ngaa keá ngiero kedea beehdu kaa kuumo utoor ngaa me cwihnye med.
Yugu rogu ne nyoge me ne bihdh nyum Juog kaano e Juog wudhu utihnge maalo.

Jo'a rogu keá cayu kedea ngaa keá rob giih me reje rih wad gen. Nea giih nu tiihyu tiihyo e loohng Juog ge koohbo kejea, “Nhyaaru rogu,” e naa ayugu ne gihn me raaj kobu ngo padh loohng me tiihy nyoge keehde. Abea ngo padh tiihyu ne rob ngo kejea loohng ngo beer wale ngo raaj. Gihn daahd Juoge yihru beehda tiihj e ne tiihyu giih arob loohnge.

Juog cog e naa ngaa cub loohng kedea e naa ngaa rom rob kejea loohng ngo beer wale raaj. Ngaan nu e ne yihre ne tee cub kuowo kedea thoo. Kare tooro unahge wun e ne piih ne kihm wadu maa ngad wong akeewo ke wun.
Lihngu gihn wu yaa koohbo kejea, “Tihn noon ni wale keroo e wa caa geen angihno ne yug giih thaajir kedea wa ubeehdo kun nu ke kar wong acielo e wa yug giih thaajir beere wa uyihdo ke giih lonyo.”
Gihn utiihy ree keroo ngo ngahyu ne? Nihn ubeehdu wiih piny ge uroom wa mar ruohj. Ruohj nea ke nyango e ngo uneehno abea batien ka me thiin e ngo naa weehny utoore.
Ne beero nea wu ne koohbo kejea, “Nea ngo gihn maa anhyaar Juoge e wa umeehg Juoge beehdo utiihy wane gihn kedea gihn.”
Tooro, e gihru unahg nhyaam kedea maahg ke nying giihu ge gweehgu. Kwaad nhyaam me wa gihn nu, ngo raaj.
Wudhu keá wul thiow. Ngaa ngahy gihn beer ge tiihj, kedea ukweere ke tiihy ngo e ngaan nu ayug adhemuohm.
Kea lihngu mara wu yaa alony. Awaahn ni, e naa cahng yuogu ke cwihnyu me keej ke nying giih me reje ge ubeehn ne pahdh wudhu.
Keehd awaahn kan, e giih alonyu ke gen ge beehd e ge uroomo wa yaadh maa acam uthoadhe. Waare giihu ge beeye ge acam apuohj maahne.

Keehd dhaahb kedea demare giihu ge beehda giih maa akeadh. Keadh gen noono e nuu unyoadh ngo kejea dhe yoohn atiihyu giih lonyo giihu kii ngo padh dhe yooh me beer. Kaano e koohmu urahny cang neehn giih maa awaang maaj, bang gihn giih lonyo ge anaa acongu ne cohg kedea ukanu gen yihdh nihn ni adoohng ukihm Juoge cahng.
Abea noono lihngu gihn! Ngiihny yaa adooy puohdho ge kuu acubu yihr gen, noono e ge ayuog rih Juog ke nyingu, kedea lan yaa akaj giih puohdhu, ngo alihngo yihr Juog Aciehg.
Wu abeehdo wiih piny e wu beed yi mow kedea unahge ke cam e naa acubu yi wudhu. Wu nhyaar cam ucwaadhu noono e wu unahg wa mar muor me nahg yi puohdho.
Anahg wu naa akihm nyoge me yihdh gen tar unahgu gen, nyoge me padh yaa mahn ke wun.

Jo'a wu keá dhaahr abea kuru uwahdhe cahng ubeehn Ruohdhe. Maanyu ka na beehn ngaa me pure ucube cwihnye ne koar cahng ubeehn puohdhe uciege kedea maanyu ka bahnge ngo be dhaahr ke koar puohj kodh uwahdhe gug kuunhe.
Wu thiow, wu keá dhaahr kedea deedu cwihnyu teeg bang gihn beehn Ruohdh adoohng cahng.
Jo'a, rogu keá waayu. Nea maru kuu ngaa me kihm wun tooro ne? Ruohdh duohng ge kihmo, ngo ne dhe kala.
Jo'a romu rogu rog yaa agamloohngjuog ge aguum giih raahyo abea ge kuu adhaahr ge ne rub gene ke nying Ruohdh.

Mihn cwihny gihn ayoad gene awaahn ni ngo ngahyo bang gihn ge aguum. Romu rogu rih Job ge abar maalo ke gaahn Juog maano e deeh raahyo me duohng apahdh wiihe. Yihdh amahr giih me reje ge ayoade cang e gihn agweehg Juoge ke nying Job ge anaa abeehn oogo ne gihn me beer ngo ngahyu. Bang gihn Juog yihre ne nhyaahro kedea cwihnye luue ke bang yaa ayoad raahyo.

Jo'a, gihn wiihe ne maalo beehda ubahnge dhaano ree be kuohnge. Dhaano ree keá kuohnge ke maalo wale ke piny wale ke kwaad gihr nyepiny moogo. Nahge ke lubo acielo cog e ne robi kii ‘Ayiihi’ wale ‘Gahng’ nea gihn ngo beehda athiir wale gihn ngo padh athiir. Beere rogu be yoadu yi ukihm gihr Juog.
Ngaa me gihn me raaj apahdh wiihe keewu kea dhiile Juog ke kwayo ke nying gihn nu. Yaa cwihny gen med ke nying gihn me beer maa ayoad gene, piih gene ne puoj Juog.
Ngaa me ree ledh cuohne yaa doonge giih akuud yaa ayiiho ne beehn ne kway Juog wiihe. Kedea beehn yaa doonge rey gene ngo ke mow e ge rob nying Juog beere ngo ke thiehdho.
Nea jo doonge ge akwahyo ke yiiho yi cwihny gen e ngo udoohng beer bang gihn ngo uthiehdh Juoge yihr gen. Nea atwaany gihre ayoade kaa nying adhemuohm maa atiihye, e adhemuohme uwii Juoge piny yihre.

Nea maano e adhemuohme maa atiihyu keá kanu yihr ngadu beere Juog kwaye kwayo ke nyingu uthiehdh Juoge wun bang gihn kway ngaa maa abiohgrwaal ke Juog giih me teeg ge tiihye tiihyo kedea giih me beeye ge ke yoado ke nying kwaj gihre.
Eliija anahg dhaano utaahngo me neehn won. Abea naa akwahye, e ngo agaahne ke cwihnye acielo kejea kodh buu ucwii, e kodh kuu acwii ke kar run adahg ke nuuj.
Naa adoge kwaj beere kodh ucwii, e ngo acwii utuuy nyepinye ucieg gene.
Jo'a, nea ngaa maa a'aay oogo yi lum Juog kiinu udog ngaa mooge ngo ke duuo yi lum Juog,
e kea paru gihn: Kwaad ngaa kony ngad adhemuohm uduue yi lum Juog, e ngaan nu aboadh wahy ngo yi thoo kedea umeehge Juog wii amahr adhemuohme piny.
I Peter: Yihr yaa akeedho ke yihdh miehy Poantuj kedea Galaadya, maa Kapadoacya kedea Aacya kedea Bihdhihnya. A Piihter ngaan aoohr Jeacuu Kriihjte, a ne gweehdo yihru.

Wu ge beehda aleye wiih piny kan ge angahy Juog Wuur kedea umiege wun kuu umodho kedea Wahy Juog en ne yug wun ne nyoge me beey bang utiihyu ke lum Jeacuu Kriihjto kedea bang ne yor wun ke reme. Beehn Juoge cube deeh muuny kedea doohr me ne cohg yihru.

Nying Juog ge Wur Ruohdho Jeacuu Kriihjto, ke wuoro bang gihn wo angwaahne keraahyo udoohngo ne nyoge maa anyuol nyaahn. Wahy me nyaahn acube yihro, me weehg wo gaahno ke dhe yoohn cahro gihr Jeacuu Kriihjto naa acahre uyedhe maalo yi dahg nihn batien naa athowe.
Kaano arumo e yihru unaa giih me beeye maa aguog Paar Maalo muu ulagu. Giih me ge be kwaahl kedea ge be tob maa ge be rahny.
Giih nu beey ge giihu wu yaa koar Juoge keehd tee gihre ke nying yiiho gihru beere wahy me be gug naa agwiire ke nyingu paare yoadu yoado cahng gug piny.
Kea noono mihn cwihnyu ne cohg bang gihn giih me beeye ge nud wong maalo ke nyingu. Abea keehd maano e wu ukuong toohng yihdh giih me reje umodho.

Wu utoohng yihdh giih reje umodho beere kaa ayiihu kii ngo ke tumo nea yea teeg wale giih nyooro ge ne yea. Ke tumo wa gihr ngiihnyo maa aleehdho upiire. Abea yiiho gihru wiihe ne maalo rih ngiihnyo bang gihn ngiihnyo beehda gihn muu uthumo. Nea yiiho gihru atum uyoade e ngo teeg, e leej kedea puoyo me duohng uyoadu cahng uduu Jeacuu Kriihjte.
Ngo anhyaaru keehd me bahnge kihde kuu aniidu. Abea keehd me bahnge ngo be niidu awaahn ni, e lume ayiihu kedea yihru ne med cwihny me duohng muu uneehno ne dahr.
Cwihnyu med bang gihn akoohg gihn ucub yihru ke nying gihn gaahnu ngo beehda boadh wahy ge uyoadu.
Anahg boadh wahy e naa apiih agamloohngjuoge ne dead yea kedea ucaar gene muuny gihn ubeehn Juoge ne cubo yihru.

Yaa gamloohngjuog ge ake peehyo ke nying giih raahm rog kedea giih moar wihj ge utiihy rog gen rih Ngad Boadh nyoge. Giih nu anahg Wahy Juog ge aoohr Jeacuu Kriihjte, e naa anaa arob gen yi aduun yaa agamloohngjuog. Ge ake peehyo thiow kejea weehne e nuu utiihy giih nu rog gen kedea rog gen utiihy gene ke rih ngaa.

Ngo anaa arob yihr gen kejea padh ke nying mar ngud gen abea anahg ke nyingu. Run ngo ge giih nahgu yihdh gen. Awaahn ni Ciig Beer ge arob yihro cang. Ciig Beer ge apuohny yihro kaa teeg Wahy Juog naa aoohr ke yoohn Paar Maalo. Keehd wuohdjuog e cwihny gen ne bang ngey yihdh Ciig Beer.
Kea noono thubu kaa awaahn kan ke gwiir rogu ne tiihy gihn ubeehn kedea koaru rogu beer mee kedea piihu ne gaahn muuny gihn ucub nea Jeacuu Kriihjto uduuo.
Lihngu lum Juog bang gihn wo beehda nyethen Juog kedea wiiu dhog yiehdh acoon ge na beehdu kii ngo e gihn maa angahyu atooro.
Kwaad giih tiihyu nahg gene giih me yihdh gen tooro giih adhemuohm wa ka nahg Juog ngaa me ree tooro adhemuohm.
Agweed yi kitaab Juog naa,
“Beehdi e rihi tooro adhemuohm
bang gihn riha tooro adhemuohm.”
Me neehn kaano kwahyu yihr Wuru ge ne Maalo kedea ngo ngahyu kejea be luuo ke tiel, kea noono beehdu e wu lwaahr keehde wa ka nahgu aleye wiih piny kan.
Juog gihn maa acube piny nud ne kahl wun oogo yi yoohn rwaahny wun ge adaahd ge wuru wun ke kahlo kii ngo. Gihn acub Juoge piny padh gihn me thum wa mar dhaahb wale damaro me neehn kaano ngahyu ngo.
Juog beehda Ngad Boadh nyoge e naa akaabe ne gihr remo ne nahg piny ke nyingu. Gihr remo me ngiene teeg kedea adhemuohm tooro ree.
Ngo akwany Juoge ne gihr remo me ngiene teeg ke coon e wiih piny poohd kuu acag, unahge kaa awaahn yi gug nihn e naa abeehn Juoge ukahle gihr remo oogo ne naah ne dooj wun.
Juog ngaa atihng Jeacuu maalo yi thoo ucube ruohdh yihr ngo ayiihu kaa bang Jeacuu, noono e yiiho gihru kedea gaahno gihru naa yi cing Juog.

Awaahn ni Juog adhemuohme giihu ge aluoge oogo bang naa ayiihu lume ge adiehr. Ke nying gihn ni e kare nud unud nhyaahre yi cwihnyu ke nying kwaad dhaano utaahngo, adoohng e yaa akuud yiiho ge neehn wun. Kea noono nahgu nyoge me nhyaar rogu ke cwihny cang.

Wu anyuol nyaahn. Wu kuu atuohl ke rih kohnh dhaano ge rahny, abea wu atuohl ke rih kohnh Ngad Boadh nyoge ge be rahny. Kohnh Ngad Boadh nyoge yoad kaa dhe yoohn lum Juog ge kahl kuowo me guge tooro kedea lum ngo be yiid.
Bang gihn kohnh dhaano ngo neehn lum ge tal kedea tee dhaano utaahngo neehn thiiw ge lwaar oogo.
Abea lum Juog ree be waare. Lum nu e naa Ciig Beer gihn anaa apuohny yihru.
Noono wiiu yug giih me reje kedea wiiu giih toohd maa giih waane. Wiiu nyahg kedea wiiu waaj nyoge.

Awaahn ni ngo aniidu e ka beer Jeacuue ke wun. Nea wa maano keá wiiu tiihy giih adhemuohm kedea wiiu giih acamo. Nea wa maano kea nahge ke giih Paar Juog ge ne cubu yi cwihnyu wa mar nyethiin ge cub cwihnye rih caag men. Tiihyu giih nu bang udoongu yi lum Juog.

Awaahn ni ngo aniidu e ka beer Jeacuue ke wun. Nea wa maano keá wiiu tiihy giih adhemuohm kedea wiiu giih acamo. Nea wa maano kea nahge ke giih Paar Juog ge ne cubu yi cwihnyu wa mar nyethiin ge cub cwihnye rih caag men. Tiihyu giih nu bang udoongu yi lum Juog.
Awaahn ni beehnu bang ngaa neehn meehn wod gihn anaa akweer yaa geere keehde maa abeehn Juoge ngo ne kwanyo bang gihn e naa anhyaar Juoge.

Wu thiow, wu neehn meehn wod gihn ugeer Wahy Juoge wod Juog keehd gen. Wu akwanye beere wu udoohng ne yaa lam me Wahy Juog e naa akwany wun yihr Juog. Noono e giih lamu ge nhyaar Juoge nhyaaro ke nying Jeacuu Kriihjto.
Ngo agweed yi kitaab Juog naa,
“Beeh niidu kaa akwanya meehn wod maa anhyaara
me maga wiih wod keehde.
Wod gihn ageera yi geen Jaayon.
Ngaa yiih luma
cwihnye buu udaag yi gihn utiihya yihre.”
Yihru wu yaa ayiiho, ngaan akwanya ngo anhyaaru abea yihr yaa kuu ayiiho,
“E naa kaaw gihn akweer yaa geere keehde e adoohng ne meehn gihn amag
wiih wod keehde.”
Thiow agweed yi kitaab Juog naa,
“Ngaan akwany Juoge
e nuu unahg leen cwahny nyoge keehde
ge umeehg gen pahdho.”
Yaan nu ge nyoge maa acwahnyo bang gihn lum Juog kuu ayiih gene kedea e naa gihn agweehg Juoge ke nying gen.

Abea maru wu beehda nyoge me Juog e naa akwany wun. Wu beehda yaa lam me tiihyo yihr Ruohdh. Wu nyoge maa acub rogu yihr Juog, wu beehda joe. Noono, e kare nud yihru unyoadhu kaa akahl Juoge wun oogo yi muudho kedea ukedhe wun yi daahr gihre me cang ne wij wij kedea wu ukwany ne rob giih beeye ge atiihye.
Umodho coon wu kuu anahg yaa Juog abea awaahn ni wu beehda joe. Coon Juog cwihnye kuu anaa aduue caahn ke nyingu abea awaahn ni ngo ayoadu kejea cwihnye aduue caahn ke nyingu.

Wu goma me nhyaara nhyaaro keraahyo, wu neehn aleye me beed wiih waahdh me piny me beedu tooro. Naa anahgu nyoge me wa gihn nu kea cwihnyu keá yuohd rog giih nhyaar dhaano utaahnge ge yihr gen ne mahn keehd wahy dhaano.
Beehdu beer mee kiin yaa kuu ayiiho keehd maano koohb gene kejea wu tiihy giih me reje, bang gihn cahng ungey gene gihn beer ge atiihyu, e Juog uleej gene cahng beehn Jeacuue ne liew won.
Wuoru ruohdhe giih wiih piny kan ke nying Jeacuu Ruohdho, wuoru ruohdh duohng yi paajo.
Thiow wuoru kwaad yaa acub ruohdh duohnge piny nyum nyoge ne kihm yaa ayug giih me reje, maa ne muohj koohdh yaa yug giih beey.
Beehda Juog e ne daahd wun utiihyu gihn me beer beere yaa kwihj luube ge be rubo rogu.
Beehdu ke beehd nyoge me padh baahng, abea kwaad beehd nu keá logu ne dhe yooh me koolu giih reje ge yugu. Wu dhiil nahg baahng giih Juog.
Nyoge keá dhahlu kedea nhyaaru wadu ge ayiiho, wuoru Juog kedea wuoru ruohdh gihn amag paajo.
Wu baahng wuoru yaa tiihyu yihr gen kedea tiihyu gihn teed gene yihru. Wu keá lihng luub yaa beey cog, lihngu luub yaa reje thiow.
Ngo beehda gihn me beer uyoad gihn me raaj ke nying gihn me beer maa atiihj bang gihn ngahyu gihn daahd Juoge.
Gihn me beer me yoadu tooro ne guum apoohdo gihr gihn me raaj e ayug dhaane. Abea Juog wu udooje ne guum giih raahm me gihn me raaj maa ayugu tooro.
Wu acuohn kaa nying gihn ni: Ngad Boadh nyoge ke ngude abang uguume giih me reje ke nyingu kedea wu naa awiie piny ne yaa ukwany yihdh buy tiene.
Adhemuohm maa atiihy Jeacuue atooro kedea toohd maa arobe atooro.
Naa abeehn nyoge uyeny gene ngo e dhee kuu ne kweg uluunye kedea naa ayoade giih raahm kuohm e ngaa maa acehme tooro. Ree acube yihr Juog ngaa be luuo ke lug tiel.
E ke ngude adhemuohme giihu ge atihnge ke en e ngo ne rih yaadh maa ariihw, beere giih adhemuohm be cahgo ke tiihyo unahge giih beeye ge ne tiihyo. Kuohn ka me ledhe giihe ge naa athiehdh won.
Bang gihn wu ake roomo wa roohme maa arwaahnyo, abea awaahn ni wu aduu bang ngad kwaah ge koar wun.

Wu maahn, tiihyu kwaad gihn arob cuowu yihru. Tiihyu gihn daahd gene keehd me kweer gene ke lihng lum Juog e lum Juog udhiil gene ke yiiho ke nying gihn beehdu beer ke gen. Dhe yoohn beehdo beer gihru ke gen akaal wiih luub na robu yihr gen ke nying Juog.

Wu maahn, tiihyu kwaad gihn arob cuowu yihru. Tiihyu gihn daahd gene keehd me kweer gene ke lihng lum Juog e lum Juog udhiil gene ke yiiho ke nying gihn beehdu beer ke gen. Dhe yoohn beehdo beer gihru ke gen akaal wiih luub na robu yihr gen ke nying Juog.
Wudhu keá paru kejea kahd wihj ke wuohbo kedea ruug rog ke tiiy wale ngaab waare me ne jieng jieng ge ne yug wun ne jur.
Jur me ne cohg naa yi nud cwihny kedea e naa juro me be thum maa e ne nhyaar Juoge bang gihn ngo beehdo e beer.
Bang gihn maahn acoon, ge anhyaar Juog, cuow gen na wuor gene wuoro e naa gihn anahg gene jure.
Wa mar Caara naa awuor Abraahm cuore ucuohne ngo cuohno ne wur paare. Nea gihn me ne cohg atiihyu kedea utoor gihn me tudu yihre e wu unahg kwaay Caara.

E wu cuow thiow yi beehdu gihru ke maahn ngahyu ngo kejea tee gen be room ke tee maru. E naa gihn dhiilu gen ke wuoro thiow bang gihn Juog muuny gihre ge yoad kuowo me be gug buu ucube ke yihru cog, ngo ucube yihr maahn thiow. Beehdu ke maahnu wa gihn nu beere gihn me gahl kwaj gihru yihr Juog tooro.
Lum ni beehda ke nyingu cang: beehdu ke beehd yaa paajo acielo. Beehdo me wudhu be tihngu maalo. Beehdo me yej amad kedea nhyaaru rogu ke dhog yiehdhe beehde.

Wiih gihn me raaj keá coalu ke gihn me raaj kedea wiih ayaany keá duogu kaa ayaany. Abea nea kaa ngo ne cohg kwayu Juog ukonye yaa nu bang gihn wu akwany Juoge ne tiihy giih nu, beere Juog wu dooje doojo.
Wa kaa agweede yi kitaab Juog naa,
“Kwaad ngaa daahd ngo uyoade wahy,
maa uniide giih me beeye kea koare leebe,
kedea dhee keá meehge rob toohd.
Wiie tiihy gihn me raaj uloge wiihe ne tiihy gihn me beer.
E thiow doohre nyoge doohro.
Juog wonge be loge oogo rih ngaa abiohgrwaal,
kedea kwaj gihr ngaa maa abiohgrwaal lihnge lihngo ne cohg.
Abea yaa tiihy giih reje,
Juog wonge beehde aloge oogo rog gen.”
Ngaa e ne kedh ngwiil rihi nea yih nhyaar yug gihn me beer?
E thiow keehd me yoadu ngwiilo ke nying tiihy gihn me beer, e ngo beehda dooj. Wu keá tud yihr gen wale keehd koohdhu keá paahr.
Abea nahge ke gaahn Ngad Boadh nyoge e ne cubu yi aduunu kedea nahge en e naa Ruohdhu. Nea wu ke peehnyo ke nying gihn gaahnu Ngad Boadh nyoge ke nyinge kea beehdu e ka beehru ngo kii ngo ngahyu.

Kedea beehru wiih lum gen ke lubo me beer kedea ke wuohdo. Duogu wiih lum nu e gihn me dieru ke nyinge tooro kedea ke dhe yooh me beere wudh yaa rob giih me reje rogu, wu ge yaa batien Ngad Boadh nyoge, wudh gen ulaahyo ne ngahyu rob.
Ngo ngweehn uyoad dhaane bahng ke nying tiihy gihn me beer, nea gihn ngo beehda kar cwihny Juog, yihr man yoad bahng yi tiihy gihn me raaj.

Ngad Boadh nyoge ke ngude athow ne cielo ke nying adhemuohme giih nyoge cang, Ngad Boadh nyoge ge beehda abiohgrwaal athow ke nying yaa reje. Ngo athow beere wo kedhe ke Paar Juog. Anahg kuohme en naa athow abea wahye ge akuowo.
Noono maa a'aaye uwiie kuohme piny ne ci ne puohny Ciig Beer yihr atiihbe giih anaa acoon ge amag ne maabuuye.

Atiihbe giih yaa acoon yi run Nooh ge anaa akweer ke lum Juog. Yaa anaa abuohj Juoge ke koar gen e cwihnye kuu angol rog gen kaano anaa geer Noohe yaahy geero. Noono unahge ke nyoge abiihjbedahg cog ge naa abodh e ge kuu amud.

Piih nu amud nyoge anyoadh dhe yoohn nud awaahn ni ge yoad piih luogwahy uwoj gen yi wiih dhaano ne cub luogwahy. Luogwahy e ne cub boadh wahy yihr dhaano. Piih woj wihj ge be luog nyooro oogo rog, abea ge nyoadh ngo kejea dhaano ree akuohnge nyum Juog ne beehdo ke dhe yooh me beer. Kedea piih nu wahy dhaano boadh gene boadho ke dhe yoohn abeehn Jeacuu Kriihjte ucahre.
Jeacuu Kriihjto e naa ngaa acidh Maalo kedea upiihe ukwiihy Juog yi ruohdh. Kedea uyug Juoge ngo ne ngad duohng yihr wuohdjuog maa yihr ruohdhe giih atiihbe.
Wa kaa ayoad Jeacuue raahm rog, e wu thiow gwiiru rogu uparu giih raahm rog wa mar Ngad Boadh nyoge. Bang gihn ngahyu ngo kejea raahm kuohm e ne kahl dhaano oogo yi cing adhemuohm.
Kedea wu buu unahg nyoge me koag ke log cwihnyu rog giih adhemuohm uwahdhe cahng thoo. Wu unahg nyoge me koag ke log cwihnyu yi tiihy gihn daahd Juoge.

Yihdh run abar wu abuohj ke tiihy giih reje ge nhyaar yaa kuu ayiih lum Juoge. Giih reje me neehn bal kedea maadh kuong, maa tiihy giih cwaahne maa maang pey yiehdhe me neehn aroap, maalo, macaahrdiihd, bang gihn ge be nhyaar Juoge.
Naa angolu tiihy giih nu ne ngwedh e nyoge ge agaahy. Noono e ge apiih ne rob giih me reje ke nyingu.
Giih nu rob gene rogu ge keá cubu yi cwihnyu bang gihn giih gen noono tiihy gene, yihdh gen ubeehn gene ne kwanyo yihr ngaan agwiir ree ne beehn ne ngol lubo yihr yaa kuow maa yaa athow.
Ke nying gihn nu e naa apuohny Ciig Beer yihr yaa athow, beere keehd maa akihm koohm gen wa ka kihm dhaano ukar upiny kan, e wahy gen dhiil rom kuow wa mar Juog.
Wun, paru wudhu uyabu nyingu maa koaru rogu ne kwaj ne cohg bang gihn gug nyepiny cang acahngo.
Gihn wiihe ne maalo beehda nhyaar rog bang gihn nhyaaro adhemuohme wuunye ke oogo. Nhyaaru rogu naa aciel acielo ke keewu cang.
Loru weehle yihdh miehyu ke mihn cwihny.
Juog wu amuoje kaa amahr muuny me be room me romu tiihy nyepinye. Ngaa keá piih wiih muuny acub yihre. Dhiilu muunye ke nywaag e cwihny be daag keehd nyoge beere ge dooj Juoge doojo thiow.

Ngaa puohnyo e giih robe nahg gene luub Juog kedea ngaa tiihyo dhiile tiihy ke tee acub Juoge yihre. Noono gihn nu e Juog ke leeyo yi kwaad nyepinye cang, ke nying Jeacuu Kriihjto ge e ne wuor kedea e ne yihre ne tee me guge tooro. E noono.
Goma maa anhyaara keraahyo, cwihnyu keá daag kejea gihn me maahn en naa atiihy ree yihru nea giih ajohr ge pahdh wudhu.
Mihn cwihnyu bang gihn ayoadu giih ajohr wa mar Ngad Boadh nyoge. Kaano arumo e cwihnyu umed keraahyo cahng uduue e kaa amoar Juoge wiihe anyoadhe.
Nea wu acay ke nying Ngad Boadh nyoge, e gihn beehda dooj bang gihn ngo nyoadh ngo kejea Wahy Juog, e yihre ne tee, ngo ne rogu.
Nea wu ke joohro e ajohr keá beehno kaa nying nahg dhaano, wale ke nying kahw, wale tiihy gihn me raaj wale paahr yi gihn me nying dhaano tooro yea.
Ngaa yoad giih ajohr ke nying gihn ayiihe Jeacuu, e wiihe keá laahy, abea muohje koohr Juog ke nying gihn amade ngo kiin yaae.
Nihn ngol lug piny ge acahngo kedea lug thub ke wudh yaa ayiih lum Juog. Nea wo ge ayiiho e ne thub luge wudho, nea unahg mar yaa kuu ayiiho, e gihn upahdh wudh gen unahg gihn me teeg.
Wa kaa agweede yi kitaab Juog naa,
“Nea ngo teeg yihr yaa abiohgrwaal uyoad gene boadh wahy,
e mar yaa kuu ayiiho kedea yaa adhemuohm unaa ngihde?”
Nea wa gihn nu kea beehn yaa ayoad giih ajohr wa ka daahd Juoge cub gene rog gen yihr Juog, Juog ge be waar lume kedea bar gene maalo ke tiihy giih beeye.
A ge beehda ukiihj wa wun kedea a ge aniid kaa ajoohr Jeacuu Kriihjto kii ngo kedea ngo ngahya kejea boadh wahy uyoada, nyingu kwaya kwayo wu ukiihye,

ungahyu nyethen Juog ke kwaago beer mee. Kaahnu gen beer mee padh ke nying dhaano maa ater wun yi tiihy nu, abea bang gihn beehda tiihj, me wu naa apar ngo wu keedu wa ka daahd Juoge. Kedea padh tiihj maa adeehju yi cwihnyu ke nying koog.
Ge keá kaahnu ke cing nyooro, kaahnu gen beer bang ungoor gene kaa atiihyu kii ngo.
Kaahnu gen beer mee beere muuny me guge tooro yoadu yoado bang Jeacuu ngad kwaag wun.
Wa gihn nu thiow, wu yaa rihj lihngu lum yaa doonge kedea konyu rogu konyo ke dhe yooh me dhaano ree be leeye. Keá ngaa beel wa kaa agweede yi kitaab Juog naa,
“Juog be daahd ngad nhyaam
kedea muuny gihre cube ke yihr ngaa me padh ngad beel.”
Nahgu nyoge me padh yaa beel nyum Juog ge yihre ne tee me duohng beere cahng pare ngo e wudhu tihnge ke maalo.
Wiiu giih dieru ke nying gen yi cinge bang gihn e naa ngaa kwaag wun.
Ngahyu rogu ke kaahno bang gihn atiihb ukeehg ngad mahnu ngo uwihno ne daahd ngaa me dwaahnge wa gihr nguu maa awaahdh ge cej ngaa me came.
Rogu keá meehgu dwaahngo yihre kedea magu yi yiiho gihru teeg mee kedea ngahyu ngo kejea kwaad giih ajohr ge ayoad wun ge ke tiihyo rog yaa ayiiho ke bang upiny cang.

Juog ngaa cub muuny, ge acuohn wun yi dhaahre ne beehdo tiehd ke Jeacuu Kriihjto, ubeehn ke ngude ucube thaahdhu piny beer mee uyuge wun teeg ubahnge yiiho gihru yea be lwagu batien kaa abuohju yihdh giih ajohr.
Kedea e ne yihre ne tee me guge tooro. E noono.

Beehda warga me thiin mee e gihn agweeda yihru kedea ngo acuba yi Cihla. Cihla, nea ke kur mara, e ngo umiiho maa ayiih lum Juog ne cohg. Ngo gaahna gaahno kejea wargahng ni cwihnyu umeehge teehngo bang gihn, dhe yooh maa adiehr, ge beehn Juoge udoge nyoge, ngo agweeda yihru. Dhe yoohn nu, baru maalo keehde.
Akuud yaa ayiih ge beed geen Baabihloanya ge akuud gen akwany Juoge wa akuud maru, wu amaahdh gene kedea Maarko waahda ke nying Jeacuu wu amaahdhe.
Maahdhu rogu naa aciel acielo ke cing apaar.
Beehdu ke yoohm rogu wu yaa anweehd Juoge ke Jeacuu Kriihjto.
II Peter: A Cimoan ge nying tuoda, Piihter a ge aoohr Jeacuu Kriihjte ne ngad tiihye kedea ne ngaa me oohre.
A ne gweehd yihru wu yaa ayoad yiiho me wiihe ne maalo me neehn mar wan. Ngo ayoadu kaa dhe yoohn nahg Juoge, gihn wuoro, abiohgrwaal kedea unahg Ngad Boadh nyoge Jeacuu Kriihjto abiohgrwaal thiow.
Beehn Juoge cube amahr muunye kedea doohr yihru ke dhe yoohn ka ngahyu Jeacuu Ruohdho.
Juog e naa acub giih daahdo cang ke nying beehdo me beer me nhyaar Juoge yihro ke tee gihn nud yihre. Giih nu ge yoado bang gihn ngahyo Juog ngaa acuohn won ne nywaag beeye kedea tee gihn ne yihre.

Ke nying giih nu e Juog giih me doonge me beeye ge utiihye yihro wa kaa acege ngo piny, giih me meehg won beehdo naa abiohgrwaale wa ka nahg Juoge abiohgrwaal, kedea ge giih me kahl won oogo yihdh giih raahyo ge nud wiih piny ke nying giih reje ge yuohd cwihny rog gen.
Ke nying giih nu beeye, Juog daahd utiihyu keraahyo beere beero madu ke rih yiiho gihru kedea rih beero gihru madu ngahy nyepinye ree
kedea rih ngahy nyepinye madu dhe yoohn koar rog oogo yi gihn me raaj. Thiow madu guum nyepinye rih koar rog oogo yi gihn me raaj kedea rih guum madu dhe yoohn beehdo me beer me nhyaar Juoge.
Kedea rih dhe yoohn beehdo me beer me nhyaar Juoge madu nhyaar nyoge rih ngo kedea rih nhyaar nyoge madu nhyaahro rih ngo.
Bang gihn nea giih nu ge nud yihru ke dhe yooh me rog gen jwag gene jwaa, e wu uyug gene ne nyoge me lumu be dhaahr kedea tiihyu apahdh kare ne cej dhe yooh me ngahyu Jeacuu Kriihjto Ruohdh.
Bang gihn ngaa yihre tooro giih ni uroomo ke ngaa me cwihnye athow kedea wiihe awul ukwihye ngo kejea adhemuohme giih anaa atiihye coon ge akahl Juoge oogo ree.
Kea noono jo'a, tiihyu keraahyo ne nyoadh ngo kejea Juog wu acuohne ne cohg kedea cwihnyu unahgu keew yaa akwanye. Kaano arumo e wu buu ucahg pahdh yihdh giih adhemuohm.
Ke dhe yoohn tiihy nu, e Juog dhe yooh uyabe yihru laaj ne lor wun ne mon yi Dhaahr Ruohdho Jeacuu Kriihjto Ngad Boadh nyoge ge guge tooro.
Ke nying gihn nu e ne beehda e cwihnya ne kwaay rob yihru ke nying giih ni keehd me nahg gene giih me ngahyu ke coon kedea keehd me nahg gene athere maa amagu teeg mee.
Gihn nud, ngo anyoadh Ruohdho Jeacuu Kriihjte kejea nihna wiih ngoom ge cahng ke thumo. Abea ge poohd wonga nud, e giih ni ge roba robo yihru beere wudhu be wul rog gen.
Gihn nud, ngo anyoadh Ruohdho Jeacuu Kriihjte kejea nihna wiih ngoom ge cahng ke thumo. Abea ge poohd wonga nud, e giih ni ge roba robo yihru beere wudhu be wul rog gen.
Thiow a atiihyo keraahyo, beere wudhu be wul rog giih ni, batien thona.
Padh giih teeg wong ge naa ayug wane ne waaj giih puoge yihru ke nying tee ne yihr Jeacuu Kriihjto Ruohdho kedea ge anaa arub wane ke nying duue. Abea tee ne yihr Jeacuu ngo aniid wane ke nying wan.

Wa anaa anudo wiih good beed Juoge kaa anaa alog kaan nyinge rog gen naa abeehn Juog wahne uleeye ngo kedea umoare wiih ngo. Wa anudo kedea duon Juog naa arubo ke yoohn maalo ngo alihng wane e urubo kea, “Gihn e naa Waahda maa anhyaara keter kedea cwihnya med ree.”

Wa anaa anudo wiih good beed Juoge kaa anaa alog kaan nyinge rog gen naa abeehn Juog wahne uleeye ngo kedea umoare wiih ngo. Wa anudo kedea duon Juog naa arubo ke yoohn maalo ngo alihng wane e urubo kea, “Gihn e naa Waahda maa anhyaara keter kedea cwihnya med ree.”

Noono ke nying giih nu e cwihny wan be daag ke nying athere giih agweed yaa agamloohngjuoge. Nea maano e kea cubu wudhu rog giih agweed gene wa gihr ngaa maa acub wiihe rih lama me liel yi muudho. Nea maano kea dhiilu tiihj ke giih agweed uwahdhe cahng uduu Ruohdho Jeacuu Kriihjte kedea cubu wudhu rog giih nu uwahdhe yi ruu piny ge moohl cahnge. Gihn nu e ne room keehd daahr Jeacuu ge meeny wun neehn ciehj ruuwow.

Abea gihn wiihe ne maalo beehda ungahyu ngo kejea giih agweed yi kitaab Juog padh yaa agamloohngjuog ge naa apar gen ke kar wudh gen. Beehda Wahy Juog ge nud ke gen, e naa acub luub Juog yihr gen ne gweedo.

Abea gihn wiihe ne maalo beehda ungahyu ngo kejea giih agweed yi kitaab Juog padh yaa agamloohngjuog ge naa apar gen ke kar wudh gen. Beehda Wahy Juog ge nud ke gen, e naa acub luub Juog yihr gen ne gweedo.

Wa kaa anaa anud yaa agamloohngjuoge maa yaa ucahb kiin nyoge coon, ke dhe yoohn nu thiow yaa puohny lum Juog maa yaa ucahb ge unud kiinu. Ge upiih ne puohny giih toohd ke piny me raany lum Juog kedea ngo upiem gene kejea Jeacuu Ruohdh kuu athow kaa nying gen ne boadh wahy gen. Ke nying giih nu e naa gihn uguo gihn me raaje pahdh wudh gen urwaahny nying gene.
Abea nud ke nyoge me thoohdh muu upiih ne ngoor giih cwaahne ge tiihy yaa ucahbe. Noono e naa ka ubeehn nyoge urob gene gihn me raaj ke nying adiehj anyoadh Juoge.

Bang gihn yaa ucahb ge nyoge me nhyaar giih lonyo, noono e giih lonyo ge uyoad gene ke nyingu ne cam gene wun e ge puohny giih puoge. Abea keehd maano e ge beehda nyoge maa akihm Juoge coon kedea gihn me gug wudh gen ge urwaahny nying gen ngo adoohng e ka me pahdhe wudh gen.
Bang gihn Juog wuohdjuog giih anaa ayug adhemuohm ge keá wiio e ge be kihme. Ge akihme uthoohre gen Paar Maaj ne beehd yihdh kuohn me reje maa muudho ne koar Cahng Lug Juog.

Kedea yaa adhemuohm abeed wiih ngoom umodho coon e aboar poohd kuu ayug ree ge keá wiio e ge be kihme. Ge anaa akihme cang naa akahle aboar maa amud gen, unahge Nooh ngaa puohny dhe yoohn beehd naa abiohgrwaal ke Juog e naa akonye ke jo paare kar ge abiihjberiow.

Juog thiow geedh Codom maa Gomoarah ge kea wiio e ge be kihme. Ge akihme naa awaange geedh nu udoohng gene ne bur. Geedh nu ge awaange beere gihn atiihy Juoge rog yaa adhemuohm naa abeed geedh nu ngahy yaa udog giih adhemuohm ke tiihyo cahng moogo.
Abea keehd maano awaange geedh nu, e Juog akony ngaa me nyinge Lod bang gihn ngo ngaa me beer me cwihnye anaa abeehdo e raaj ke nying nihn ke nying giih reje ge tiihy yaa adhemuohme yi wonge.
Abea keehd maano awaange geedh nu, e Juog akony ngaa me nyinge Lod bang gihn ngo ngaa me beer me cwihnye anaa abeehdo e raaj ke nying nihn ke nying giih reje ge tiihy yaa adhemuohme yi wonge.

Me neehn maano atiihy Juoge wa gihn nu, e kea gaahnu bang gihn Juog dhe yoohn ukonye nyoge me beeye ngo ngahye nea rog gen ayoad gene yihdh giih utum me reje. Kedea ngo ngahye ka umeehge yaa reje beehdo e ge akihme ne koar Cahng Lug.
Adoohnge yaa nhyaar giih reje ge yuohd cwihny dhaane rog gen maa yaa dhahl giih kuow yi maalo, ge ukihme keter.
Yaa ucahb ge nyoge maa yaa nhyaam me nying gen be tud ne dhahl jo doonge maalo.
Maanyu wuohdjuog ge yihr gen ne tee me tooro yihr yaa ucahb, nea ge piih ne rob giih reje naa ayug jo doong maale yihr Juog e ge be rob gene kaa dhe yoohn ayaany nyum Juog.

Yaa ucahb giih dhaahl rob gene robo rih Juog kedea dhe yoohn pahr laahye kii ngo e ne pahr gene kii ngo. Noono e ge rub oogo ne pahy now ke nying giih me kwihy gene. E naa gihn urwaahny Juoge nying gen wa mar laahy ge mag unahge.

Unahg giih raahm kuohm ge nuu uyoad gene. Giih raahm kuohm me room keehd giih raahm kuohm ge anaa ayug gene rog nyoge mooge. Mihn cwihny mar gen beehda yug giih maa cwaahne kii diehr cahng. Ge nyoge me jwaahl cam ke giih cwaahne kedea diihd cwihny ge tiihy gene kaano piih gene ne cam yihdh yaaye giih yugu.

Yaa ucahb gihn nhyaar gene beehda kwaay kaab maahn. Ge nyoge me raany wudh maahn ubeehd gene e ge pahdh yihdh giih adhemuohm. Padh maahn keed gen ge ne wudh gen raany gene, abea keehd yaa yiiho, giih yiiho gihr gen thiin, wudh gen raany gene raanyo thiow. Ge nyoge muu udhiil Juoge ke kihmo ke nying giih nu cang.

Giih nu reje ge tiihy gene bang gihn ge akweer ke dhe yooh me beer. Ge apiih ne ngoor giih atiihy ngaa cuohn ne Balaam waahd Biohr. Balaam anaa anhyaar ngiihny yoade ke nying giih me reje maa atiihye.
Abea maanyu kaa anaa acuow akaje Balaam ke nying awuohj gihn atiihye. Akaja ge be rubo, arubo yihre wa dhaano utaahngo beere giih ngaa maa amuohl ge tiihye ge wiie wiio.

Yaa ucahb ge nyoge me gihn me beer me yoad bang gen tooro. Ge neehn abuulo. Abuulo me ge wahnh dhaane wiihe, e yuude e yea atal. Ge nyoge me ne thal thal ke luube wa mar lwahd me keedh yame ke bang yi poohlo. Kaa akoj Juoge nuu ucub gen yea beehda ka me col ne cihd cihdi.

Ke dhe yoohn nhyaam me gihr nyinge tooro, cwihny nyoge meehg gene ke yuohd rog giih nyooro ne leel nyoge ne tiihy giih adhemuohm. Yaa nu daahd gene ke leelo ge nyoge maa akweer ke giih adhemuohm ka me cahng mee.
Ge ukoohbo kejea, yaa lihng luub gen ge buu unahg baahng. Abea yaa puohny giih ni ge beehda baahng giih adhemuohm, bang gihn dhaano beehda ubaahng gihn akwahg ngo piny.

Noono, ngaa maa agwahny bade yihr dhog yiehdh reje giih wiih piny naa angahye Jeacuu Kriihjto Ruohdho Ngad Boadh nyoge kedea udoge pahdh yi cing adhemuohm, udoohnge ne baahng yihre, e ngaan nu ne yi gihn me raaj maa akaal wiih mar umodho ge anea yea.
Ngweehn me toor gihn maa angahy gene ke nying dhe yoohn doohng naa abiohgrwaal ke Juog yihr man ngahy gene dhe yoohn nu kedea udog gene ngahdh gen ke loo bang loohnge giih Juog ge anaa acub yihr gen.

Dhe waahnyo maa acoon nud me koohbo, “Guohg doo wudh ngoog giihe ne cam gen, kedea kudhruug, keehd me luoge ke piih e doo ne nween ree ke cuohdho. Wa gihn nu thiow keehd yaa dog ne tiihy giih adhemuohm.”

Goma maa anhyaara gihn e naa riown wargahng gweeda yihru. Ge agweeda yihru ne meehg wun par giih me beeye kedea beere wudhu be wul rog giih agweed yaa agamloohngjuoge kedea giih arob wane yihru ne tiihyo wa jo oohr. Giih arob wane yihru ge beehda luub Ruohdho ge Ngad Boadh won.

Goma maa anhyaara gihn e naa riown wargahng gweeda yihru. Ge agweeda yihru ne meehg wun par giih me beeye kedea beere wudhu be wul rog giih agweed yaa agamloohngjuoge kedea giih arob wane yihru ne tiihyo wa jo oohr. Giih arob wane yihru ge beehda luub Ruohdho ge Ngad Boadh won.
Gihn wiihe ne maalo beehde ungahyu ngo kejea nud ke nyoge me cood yihdh giih arob ke nying lum Juog muu ulog beehno yihdh gug nihn. Ge upiih ne yug giih reje ge yuohd cwihny gene rog gen.
Ge ukoohbo kejea, “Wa anaa arob Jeacuue kea e uduu abea ngo ne kee maa abeehno! Ke naa athowe ke weehne e gihn maa awaar ree tooro ke naa acag wiih piny cago.”

Abea ge daahd uwul wudh gene rog giih maa athere me neehn: Juog coon umodho maalo kedea piny ge acage ke dhe yoohn lume naa arobe. Juog piny acage une wiihe piihdh kiin piih kedea utiege piny ke piih.
Thiow anahg ke dhe yoohn piih e naa abeehn Juoge uraanye wiih piny yaa acoon naa amoale ngo piny kaa aboar.

Ke dhe yoohn lum Juog naa arobe maalo kedea piny ge nud awaahn ni, ge akihm kejea ge uwaang ke maaj Cahng Lug. Ge poohd e ge ke wiio tudi ne koar cahng ubeehn Juoge urwaahnye nying yaa akweer ke lum Juog.
Abea goma maa anhyaara, wudhu keá wul rih lum ni acielo ni: Yihr Juog, run alihb acielo ge uroomo ke cahng acielo kedea cahng acielo ngo uroomo ke run alihb acielo. Yihr Juog ge beehda acielo.
Juog be gaal nea ngo tiihy gihn acege piny wa ka teed nyoge mooge. Giih nii ngo Juog be dhaahr ke koar bang gihn daahd dhaano cang uwiie tiihy adhemuohm beere ngo be rwaahny.

Abea nea cahng akob Juoge kea Jeacuu uduu, e ngo uduu keehd maa akoohb Juoge kea e koar wun. Jeacuu uduu ne kwaan wa beehn ngad kahw. Cahng uduu Jeacuue e maalo une mad e ngo umahro udoohng kare ne weehny. Juog, giih ne yi maalo ge uwaange utoor gene. Thiow piny, kedea giih ni yea, giih acag Juoge kedea giih ayug dhaane ke cinge ge uwaange cang utoor kihd gihn me doohng.
Me neehn maano ubeehn Juoge uraanye giih nu cang e wu unahg nyoge me ngihde?
Nahge ke cahng Juog e ne bange yuogu beere ngo meehgu ke beehno piow piow. Cahng ubeehn Juoge uwaange maalo kedea ubeehn giih ne yi maalo uleeny maaje gen cang.

Keehd me beehn piny kedea maalo uwaang gene e ngo gaahno gaahno kejea maalo moogo me nyaahn kedea piny moogo me nyaahn ge utuohl. Ge utuohl bang gihn Juog e naa arob ngo. Yea maahl nu kedea wiih piny nu, unahg yaa abeehdo naa abiohgrwaale ke Juog ge nuu ubeehd kuohn nu.
Kea noono goma maa anhyaara, me neehn kaano nahge cahng nu e ne bange yuogu kea tiihyu keraahyo beere wu ke yuudo e rogu cang e adhemuohm tooro rogu kedea e wu ubeehdo ke nhyaahro ke rogu.
Wudhu keá wul rih gihn kur Jeacuue ke nyinge. Jeacuu ukuro bang gihn ngo daahd uboadhe nyoge. Umiiho e nyinge Poal anaa agweehdo yihru ke nying giih ni bang gihn ngo ameehg Juoge dead yihdh giih.

Dhe yoohn agweehd Poale yihdh wargae giih cang, ke nying giih ngo, keá waaro. Adiehr muon, yihdh wargag nu giih mooge me teeg ge nud me yihdh gen be rom nyoge mooge ke deado. Kwaad giih agweed ge be rom nyoge mooge ke deado ge naa giih yihdh gen cood yaa gihn me ngahy gene tooro ge yiiho gihr gen thiin. Mooge maa agweed yihdh kitaab Juog ge cood gene coodo thiow abea gihn nu e nu unahg gihn me rwaahny nying gen.

Kea noono wu goma maa anhyaara me neehn kaano beehd e giih ge ngahyu kea koaru rogu beer mee beere e wu be pahdh yaa awuohje maa ayug yaa dhahl yihdh loohnge. Koaru rogu beere wu be dog caahn karu noono beer nu.
Beehn beero kedea ngahy nyepinye ge yoad bang Ruohdho Jeacuu Kriihjto Ngad Boadh nyoge kony gene wun udoong yiiho gihru. Moaro wiih Jeacuu ke wong ke wong. E noono.
I John: A gweehdo yihru kaa nying ngaa beehda Ciig Juog naa acub Juoge yihr nyoge. Ngaan nu e ne cub kuowo me ne cohg yihr nyoge. Ngo ngaa maa anudo umodho e piny poohd kuu acag. Abea wa jo aoohr ngo aniid wane uboar wane ngo. Duone alihng wane e ngo urubo kedea giihe anaa atiihye ge aniid wane uboar wane en. Ngo amaahdh wane ke cing wan.

Ngaa cub kuowo me ne cohg ameehg Juoge doohng ne dhaano beere ngo niid nyoge niido. E naa kaa aniid wane ngo noono. Gihn teed wane yihru beehda gihn maa atiihy ree kedea uniid wane ngo. E naa gihn koohb wane yihru kejea ngaa cub kuowo me ne cohg ngo anudo tiehd coon ke Juog Wuur. Abea ngo abeehn Juoge ne nyoadho yihr wan.

Awaahn ni wa rubo yihru kaa nying ngaan aniid wane kedea ulihng wane duone. Wa rubo yihru ke nyinge beere giih anaa arobe naa ayiih wane ge yiihu yiiho thiow beere wu unweehd naa acielo keehd wan. Kaano arumo e wo unweehd ke Juog Wuur kedea Waahde Jeacuu Kriihjto.
E naa gihn gweehda yihru ke nying giih me nweehd wun ke wan, beere med cwihny me duohng yoado yoado.
Awaahn ni, Ciig gihn alihng wane bang Waahd Juog, ge daahd wane ke kahl yihru e gen: Juog beehda daahr. Kedea tiihj yi muudho tooro yihre.
Nea wo tiihy giih yi muudho abea wo ukoohbo kejea wo anweehd ke Juog e wo beehda yaa toohd, maa akweer ke tiihj ke giih beeye ge anyoadh Juoge.

Abea nea wo beed yi daahr gihr beey Juog wa kaano nahg Juoge abiohgrwaal ke dhe yoohn beeye nu, e nyoadh ngo kejea wo anweehd ne cohg, kedea e rem Jeacuu Kriihjto Waahde naa awoj piny ke nyingo adhemuohme giiho ge luoge ke oogo udoohngo ne nyoge me beeye yihr Juog.
Nea wo ukoohbo kejea adhemuohme be yugo, e rogo akango kedea adiehj gihn anyoadh Juoge ngo kwihyo ne weey weey.

Abea nea ayiiho nyum Juog kejea adhemuohme ayugo, e Juog adhemuohme giiho ge wiie ke piny kedea ukahle ge oogo wudho. Ke dhog yiehdh nu wo beehne ke ne yugo ne nyoge me beeye yihre. Giih nu ge arob Juoge kejea ge utiihye kedea gihn arobe ngo tiihye tiihyo bang gihn Juog beehda abiohgrwaal.

Abea nea wo ukoohbo kejea adhemuohme maa akuongo ke yugo tooro, e Juog ke ngude e naa akoohbo toohd. Akoohbo toohd bang gihn akob Juoge kejea nyoge cang ge yaa adhemuohm. Kaano e naa ka bahnge luub arob Juoge ge be yiiho naa adiehr.

Nyethena a gweehd yihru ke nying giih beere giih adhemuohm ge be tiihyu. Abea nea dhaano kiino adhemuohm ayuge, e adhemuohm gihre uwii Juoge piny yihre. Uwiie piny yihre bang gihn nud ke dhaano me cuung nyum Juog Wuur me rubo ke nyingo beere adhemuohme giiho ge wii Juoge ke piny. Beehda Jeacuu Kriihjto e ree tooro adhemuohm e naa ngaa rubo ke nyingo.

Jeacuu athow beere ukihm gihr Juog pahdh wiie ke nying adhemuohme giiho. Kaano e Juog adhemuohme ge uwiie piny; padh adhemuohme giiho cog abea keehd adhemuohme giih nyoge me beed kuohn mooge wiih piny beehd.
Gihn nyoadh ngo yihro ne cohg kejea wo nyoge me Juog ngahyo beehda tiihj gihn arob Juoge kea dhiilo ngo ke tiihyo.
Ngaa koohbo kejea Juog ngahye abea gihn akob Juoge be tiihye, e ngaan nu rob toohd kedea giih beey ge anyoadh Juoge ge kwihye.
Abea ngaa tiihy gihn arob Juoge, e ngaan nu Juog anhyaare ne cohg. Gihn nyoadh ngo yihro ne cohg kejea wo anweehd keehd Juog, e man:
kwaad ngaan koohbo kejea e anweehd tiehd ke Juog kea dhiile beehdo ke dhe yoohn kaa abeehd Jeacuue kii ngo.

Jo'a maa anhyaara gihn gweehda yihru ke nyinge padh loohng me nyaahn me kuu akuong ke lihngo. Ngo beehda loohng me ngahyu ke coon ge anaa ayiihu lum Jeacuu. Nyoadh ngo kejea beehda loohng maa arob yihru ke coon, bang gihn beehda Ciig gihr Juog naa arob yihru.

Abea keehd maano e gihn me nyaahn nud yi loohng gweeda yihru. Dhe yoohn kaa abeehd Jeacuue kedea dhe yoohn ka beehdu ge ne nyoadh ngo yihro kejea gihn me nyaahn nud yi loohng ni. Gihn me nyaahn nud yea bang gihn wu nyoge me giih reje ge adoohng e ge wiiu ke piny. Noono e nyoge giih beeye, ge anyoadh Juoge, ge niid gene niido yi kaa abeehd Jeacuue kii ngo kedea ka beehdu kii ngo.

Nea neehn gihn nu, kwaad ngaa rubo kejea e ngahy beehdo ke dhe yoohn nhyaar Juoge abea wad gen maa ngad akuud yaa ayiiho maane maano, e ngaa nu poohd nhyaar tiihy yi muudho kedea uwahdhe awaahn ni e giih nyepinye kwihye.
Beehda ngaa nhyaar wad gen, maa ngad akuud yaa yiiho, e naa ngaa beehdo ke dhe yoohn nhyaar Juoge kedea gihn me ne ree me meehg ngo pahdh yihdh giih adhemuohm tooro.

Kwaad ngaa yug giih ajohr rih wad gen maa ngad akuud yaa ayiiho e naa ngaa me beed yi muudho me gihn me ngahye tooro. Ngo ngaa me tiihy giih me reje kedea ngo be tiihyo ke dhe yoohn daahd Juoge. Noono e gihn tiihye ngo kwihye bang gihn giih reje e tiihye ge naa acoore.
Wu nyethena loohnge giih ni
ge gweeda ke yihru bang gihn
Juog adhemuohme giihu ge awiie piny yihru
ke nying gihn ayug Jeacuu Kriihjte yihru.
Wu jo ayiih lum Juog coon,
loohnge giih ge agweeda yihru
bang gihn wu adoohng ne nyoge me ngahy Jeacuue.
Jeacuu ge abeehdo e nud ke coon umodho
e piny poohd kuu acag.
Wu yaa nyaahn ge ayiih lum Juog,
loohnge giih ni ge agweeda yihru
bang gihn atiihb ukeehg ngo ataaju.
Wu nyethena loohnge giih ni
ge gweeda ke yihru bang gihn wu adoohng
ne nyoge me Juog Wuur ngahyu.
Wu jo ayiih lum Juog coon,
loohnge giih ni ge gweeda ke yihru,
bang gihn wu adoohng ne nyoge me ngahy Jeacuu.
Jeacuu ge abeehdo e nud ke coon
e piny poohd kuu acag.
Wu yaa nyaahn ge ayiih lum Juog,
loohnge giih ni ge gweeda ke yihru
bang gihn Jeacuu gaahnu gaahno keter
kedea Ciig Juog acubu yi cwihnyu
maa atiihb ukeehg ataaju.
Awaahn ni aroba yihru cang kejea giih reje ge nud wiih piny kan ge keá deehju yi cwihnyu bang gihn kwaad ngaa nhyaar giih reje ge nud wiih piny kan, kare tooro unhyaare Juog Wuur thiow.

Giih reje wiih piny wa nhyaar giih me kahl mihn cwihny yihr dhaano e keede wa kwaad me neehn thama kedea nhyaam ke nying giih ne yihr dhaano; dhog yiehdh nu cang ge beehn kaa nying nhyaar giih me reje ge nud wiih piny. Ge padh giih arob Juog Wuure kejea tiihyo gen.
Thiow Juog athubo ke raany giih reje ge nud wiih piny kedea yaa nhyaar giih nu ge uthow. Abea ngaa tiihy gihn daahd Juoge, yihre unaa kuowo me guge tooro.

Nyethena, aroba yihru kejea rahny piny adoohng cahng. Ngahyu kejea anaa arob wane yihru kejea ngad mahn Jeacuu ngo ubeehn nea rahny piny adoohng cahng. Wa kaa arob wane ngo yihru, ngo aniidu ke nyingu awaahn ni, kejea jo mahn giih Jeacuu me thoohdh ge atuohl. Gihn nu e ne nyoadh ngo yihru kejea cahng rahny piny ngo adoohng cahng.

Yaa mahn Jeacuu ge anaa bango kedea awaahn ni ge a'aay oogo bango. Ne cohg ge kuu anahg jo'o. Nea ge ne nahg jo'o maa yaa ayiiho, e ge be ne aay oogo bango. Abea waahdh gen nyoadh ngo kejea gahng ke dhaano acielo kiin gen maa anahg ngado.
Abea wun, Jeacuu Wahy Juog acube yihru kedea giih beeye ge anyoadh Juoge ni, ge beehde e ge ngahyu cang.

Warga gihn agweeda yihru padh ke nying me kwihyu giih beeye ge anyoadh Juoge. Agweeda yihru bang gihn giih beeye ge nyoadh Juoge ge ngahyu ne cohg kedea bang gihn ngo ngahyu kejea giih beeye ge anyoadh Juoge puohny me raaj tooro yihdh gen.

Abea aroba yihru kejea ngad toohd raaj ni beehda ngaa koohbo kejea Jeacuu ngo padh Ngad Boadh nyoge naa aoohr Juoge wiih piny. Ngaa me rubo kea Jeacuu ngo padh Ngad Boadh nyoge, e beehda Juog Wuur kedea Jeacuu Waahd Juog ge naa akweere ke gen. Kedea gihn nu nyoadh ngo kejea ngaa nu e ne room keehd ngaan ngahj e wiihe ne mahn keehd Jeacuu.

Gihn beehda lubo maa athiir bang gihn ngaa kweer ke Waahd Juog e ngo be rom nweehd keehd Juog Wuur. Abea ngaa yiih ngo nyum nyoge kea Jeacuu beehda Waahd Juog, e ngaa nu ngo anweehd naa acielo keehd Juog Wuur thiow.
Nea wa gihn nu, e kea magu puohny gihn ngahyu coon ke nying Jeacuu beer mee. Nea puohny gihn nu amagu beer mee, e naa ka ubaru maalo e wu anweehd naa acielo keehd Waahd Juog kedea keehd Juog Wuur.
Nea wo abeehdo e wo anweehd keehd Juog wa maano, e kuowo me guge tooro ngo yoado yoado. Kuowo gihn akob Jeacuue kea ngo ucube yihro.
A toohn wun yi warga gihn kejea yaa nu a'aay oogo bango, ge daahd udwaahng gene wun keehd puohny giih gen noono.

Abea nea ke kur maru, e ngaa me romu ke dwaahngo tooro bang gihn Wahy Juog naa acub Jeacuue yihru wu konye konyo. Nea wa gihn nu, e wu padh nyoge me cahg daahd ke ngaa me puohny wun keehd giih mooge me ne keede me padh giih nyoadh Juoge yihru. Gihn ni ngo beehda Wahy Juog ge aoohr Jeacuue yihru e ne puohny wun ne ngey athiir ke nying giih nu cang. Thiow gihn puohny Wahy Juoge yihru yea tooro toohd. Nea wa maano e aroba yihru kejea beehdu e wu anweehd keehd Kriihjto wa kaa arob Wahy Juoge ngo yihru.
Noono nyethena, aroba yihru ubaru maalo ke beehdo e wu anweehd keehd Kriihjto. Beehdu e wu anweehd keehde beere e duue wiih piny kan ke yoohn Paar Maalo, e wo ungahmo utoor laahy wihje rogo ne lore.
Ngo ngahyo kejea Jeacuu beehda ngaa maa abiohgrwaal ke Juog. Nea wa gihn nu kea dhiilu ngo ke ngahyo kejea kwaad ngaa beehda abiohgrwaal ke Juog e ngaan nu beehda nyethiin Juog.

Juog Wuur wo anhyaare ne cohg! Wo anhyaare keter adhaahr ucuohne won ne nyethene. Adiehr muon, wo adoohng ne nyethen Juog. Abea keehd maano, e yaa nhyaar giih wiih ngoom ngo be yiih gene kejea wo nyethen Juog. Ngo be yiih gene bang gihn, Juog kwihy gene.

Wu jo'a ge anhyaara, awaahn ni ngo ngahyo kejea wo beehda nyethea Juog. Abea ka udoohngo kii ngo, ngo poohd kuu anyoadh. Abea gihn ngahyo, cahng uduu Jeacuue wiih piny, e naa ka ungeyo ngo utoor gihn me cahgo ke kwihyo ke nyinge. Kaano e wo udoohng wa en.
Thiow kwaad ngaa me yihre ne gaahno kiinu kejea ngo uneehn Jeacuu Kriihjto ree keá meehge pahdh yaa adhemuohm. Ree keá meehge pahdh yaa adhemuohm wa mar Jeacuu e ree tooro adhemuohm.
Abea ngaa me koag ke yug giih adhemuohm, ngo beehda ngaa maa akweer ke loohng Juog. Adiehr muon, ngad adhemuohm beehda ngaa maa apaahr oogo rih Juog.

Ngo beehda gihn me ngahyu kejea Jeacuu abeehn wiih piny kan beere ukihm gihr Juog ke nying adhemuohme giihu kahle ke oogo wudhu. Kedea ngo dhiilu kaa ngahyo kejea adhemuohm maa akuonge ke yugo ngo tooro.

Nea ne maano e ngaa maa anweehd tiehd keehd Jeacuu keá beehdo e yug giih adhemuohm. Ngaa beehd e yug giih adhemuohm, nyoadh ngo kejea gihn me rome ke deado ke nying Jeacuu tooro, kedea Jeacuu kwihye ne weey weey.
